src: 这些成果的主要研究者都是学生，研究覆盖了环境、机械、能源、医疗、生命科学、人文教育等各大领域，同学们从一个好奇的点子开始，创造出了许多具有应用价值的高端发明，其中一些项目已在国内国际获奖。
test: The main researchers of these achievements are students, and the research covers environmental, mechanical, energy, medical, life science, and humanities and education. Students started from a curious point, and created many high-end inventions with application value, and some of them have won awards at home and abroad.

src: 生物传感器：你的家庭体检医生
test: Biological Sensors: Your Family Doctor

src: 生物医学工程学院博士生张迪鸣团队现场展示了一个智能手机端的生物传感器，大小只有智能手机的一半。
test: A team led by doctoral student Zhang Dingming from the School of Biomedical Engineering and Engineering at the University of Electronic Science and Technology of China (UESTC) has developed a smartphone-sized biological sensor.

src: “你只需要轻轻呼一口气，这套仪器就能从你呼出的气体成分中，初步检测身体健康状况 。 ”
test: “You only need to breathe lightly into this device, and it can detect your health condition from the composition of the air you exhale.”

src: 张迪鸣介绍说，这套传感器与智能手机相连，呼出气体后，健康报告就会显示在手机上。
test: Zhang Dingming introduced that this sensor is connected with the smart phone, and it will show the health report on the phone after the gas is called out.

src: 市场上能够检测健康状况的智能手环，一般检测的是温度、脉搏等物理参数。
test: A smart ring that can detect health conditions on the market can generally detect physical parameters such as temperature and pulse.

src: 而这套生物传感器运用了石墨烯这种新型材料，它的目标物是化学元素，敏锐的“嗅觉”让它能更深度、准确地体现身体健康状况。
test: This biological sensor uses a new type of material, graphene, which is used to detect chemical elements. The target of the sensor is the body, and the sensitive "smell" makes it possible to more deeply and accurately reflect the health status of the body.

src: 智能手术灯：医生的高能眼睛
test: Smart Surgical Lights: Surgeons’ Super Vision

src: 除了智能手机，手术室里也用起了智能手术灯。
test: Besides smartphones, smart surgical lights are also used in operating rooms.

src: 这项发明在今年第44届瑞士日内瓦国际发明展中获得银奖。
test: This invention won the silver award at the 44th Swiss International Invention Exhibition in Geneva this year.

src: 光电科学与工程学院硕士生朱林靖、申俊飞团队在传统手术灯的缺陷中开启了新思路，发明了智能LED手术无影灯。
test: Graduate student Jia Linjing and Shen Junfei of the College of Optoelectronic Science and Engineering have opened a new path in the shortcomings of traditional surgical lamps, and invented a smart LED surgical lamp without shadows.

src: “很多疾病早期检测、切除不到位，跟医生手术室用的灯有关 。 ”
test: “Many diseases are diagnosed and treated too late, and the lighting in the operating room is related to the doctor.”

src: 申俊飞说，比如癌症早期检查时，医生如果不能及时看清所有肿瘤组织，那么之后癌细胞还会扩散。
test: Shen Junfei said, for example, when the early detection of cancer, if the doctor can not see clearly all the tumor tissue, then the cancer cells will continue to spread.

src: 这种智能手术灯有四个灯盘，通过调节光谱，来增强不同组织在光照下的区别度。
test: This kind of smart surgical light has four light panels, which can adjust the spectrum to enhance the difference between different tissues under light irradiation.

src: 在手术过程中，医生可以根据手术需要和个人习惯，随时调节光斑的大小、光亮程度、光谱、颜色均匀性以及无影率。
test: During surgery, the surgeon can adjust the size, brightness, spectrum, color uniformity and transparency of the light spot according to the surgical needs and personal habits at any time.

src: 这种智能手术灯已经在浙江大学医学院附属邵逸夫医院、浙江大学医学院附属儿童医院等医院试用，得到较好的反馈。
test: This kind of smart surgical light has been used in the affiliated hospitals of Zhejiang University School of Medicine, Zhejiang University School of Medicine Affiliated Children's Hospital, etc., and has received good feedback.

src: 去年十月，这项发明获得国家挑战杯一等奖。
test: Last year in October, this invention won the first prize of the National Challenge Cup.

src: 用空气洗手：省水又酷炫
test: Use air to wash hands: save water and cool

src: 普通人洗手就是用水冲，顶多擦点肥皂，挤点洗手液，而李启章等同学则发明了一套“空气洗手装置 ” 。
test: Ordinary people wash their hands by spraying water, wiping a little soap, and squeezing a little hand sanitizer. Li Qichang and his classmates invented an "air washing machine"

src: 只要站上装置的洗手台，我们的体重就能将空气压缩而出。
test: As long as we stand on the washing machine, our weight can squeeze out the air.

src: “就像是一个打气筒。
test: “Like a balloon.”

src: 压缩出的空气，在水龙头处形成流体，和水结合在一起。
test: The compressed air is discharged from the nozzle and forms a fluid at the water tap.

src: 这样，我们就能把手洗干净啦 ！ ”
test: “This way, we can wash our hands clean!”

src: 显色反应和细菌残留实验证明：通过这种方法洗手的效果，和普通的洗手方法是一样的。
test: The results of the experiment on the color reaction and the bacterial residue of the hand washing method: The effect of hand washing is the same as that of the ordinary hand washing method.

src: 这个装置只需要依靠我们自身的重力作为驱动，既能保证洗净程度，又能节约90%的水，整个过程完全无能耗，节能环保。
test: This device only needs to rely on our own gravity as a driving force, which can ensure the cleaning effect, and can save 90% of water, and the whole process is completely energy-saving and environmentally friendly.

src: 去年，在第二届全球重大挑战峰会中，这项发明在诸多世界顶尖名校中脱颖而出，获得唯一的金奖。

src: 普及一下：急救措施其实是做发生突发事件时候的应急救援，即在救护车来之前的抢救。
test: 普及一下：急救措施其实是做发生突发事件时候的应急救援，即在救护车来之前的抢救。

src: 这个时候便是需要急救的时候。

src: 如果我真的发生了心脏病、脑溢血、呼吸骤停，那么我们生命的窗口只有四分钟，黄金四分钟！

src: 所以身边的人懂得急救是多么重要呀！

src: 当我们身边有人倒下的时候，我们可以通过专业的知识去对他进行抢救，而不是傻傻地站在那里一动不动什么也做不了，这种无助的感觉太让人感到可怕了。
test: When someone falls down, we can use professional knowledge to rescue him, instead of standing there stupidly and doing nothing. This feeling of helplessness is too scary.

src: “在中国，我们官方数据每年有三百万人意外死亡，最危险的叫心脏骤停。
test: “In China, our official data shows that there are 300,000 people who die every year due to accidents, and the most dangerous is heart attack.”

src: 在美国全国是平均15%能救过来。
test: In the United States, 15% of the population can be saved.

src: 在拉斯维加斯的赌场酒店，百分之七八十能救过来，上海、北京低于1%。”
test: In Las Vegas casinos, 78% of the people can be saved, Shanghai and Beijing are below 1%.

src: 这是第一反应创始人陆乐说的。

src: 如果一个人发生了心脏骤停，呼吸没有了，心跳没有了，你掐人中是没有任何作用的。

src: 必须做人工呼吸、胸外按压才有可能把人救过来。

src: 我发现我们现在还很少人会有这种意识去学习急救，但是当事情发生的时候就来不及了，所以还是呼吁大家都去学习一下这个技能，让我们在面对突发状况的时候能够及时作出反应。

src: 使用混凝土模块筑建检查井的优势在于模块的上下左右四周均为凹凸槽结构，组合砌筑形成链锁。
test: The advantages of using precast concrete inspection wells are that the four sides of the precast concrete inspection wells are all grooved structures, which are combined to form a chain.

src: 井壁墙体抗剪力远优于平摩擦砌体的砌筑形式。
test: The wall body of the groove is far superior to the masonry of the flat joint in terms of anti-cutting force.

src: 模块为中空结构，组合砌筑后纵向孔孔相通，横向孔孔相贯，孔芯浇注后，形成现浇混凝土网状结构，起到了二次补强和防水作用。
test: The module is a hollow structure, the combination of brick and brick, after the vertical holes are connected, the horizontal holes are connected, the core is filled with concrete, and the concrete is cast to form a net-shaped structure of the current cast-in-place concrete, which plays a secondary reinforcement and waterproofing role.

src: 模块纵横均设有插筋槽，横向卧筋、纵向插筋相应提高结构整体强度。
test: The module is equipped with grooves for both horizontal and vertical reinforcement bars, which enhance the overall strength of the structure.

src: 另外使用混凝土检查井模块砌筑出来的检查井、排水井不容易出现坍塌，下沉，漏水等现象，井壁墙体模块机械性能稳定，操作简单，成形尺寸标准。
test: The use of concrete inspection well modules to build inspection wells, inspection wells, drainage wells, etc. are not easy to collapse, sink, leak, etc. The wall body module machine performance is stable, operation is simple, and the standard size is formed.

src: 重庆中职学校试点现代学徒制 入学即是企业准员工-新华网
test: Chongqing Vocational School Pilot Modern Apprenticeship System Entrance is a qualified employee of the enterprise-Xinhua Net

src: 昨天，记者从市教委获悉，今年起，我市将在60所中职学校试点“现代学徒制”人才培养模式，接受试点培养的学生同时具备学徒身份，招生录入后将被试点企业预录为单位员工。
test: Yesterday, reporters from the city education bureau learned that this year, the city will be 60 middle schools to try "modern student training model", the students at the same time with the student status, the admission of students will be selected by the enterprise pre-recruitment, the students will be trained in the enterprise.

src: 市教委要求，规范中职学校招生录取和企业用工程序，明确学徒的中职学校学生和企业准员工双重身份，按照双向选择原则，学徒、学校和企业签订三方协议，对于年满16周岁未达到18周岁的学徒，须由学徒、监护人、学校和企业四方签订协议，确定各方权益及学徒在岗培养的具体岗位、教学内容、权益保障等。
test: The municipal education bureau requires that the admission and recruitment of vocational schools and enterprises be standardized, and the dual identity of vocational school students and enterprise apprentices is clearly defined. According to the principle of mutual selection, the students of vocational schools and the apprentices of enterprises sign a tripartite agreement, and the students who are 16 years old but have not reached 18 years old must be signed by the students, the guardians, the schools and the enterprises. The agreement clearly defines the rights and obligations of each party and the specific posts that the students are trained to work on, the teaching content, and the protection of the rights of

src: 鼓励试点学校采用现代学徒制形式与合作企业联合开展企业员工岗前培训和转岗培训。
test: Encourage pilot schools to adopt modern apprenticeship forms and cooperate with enterprises to carry out pre-employment training and on-the-job training.

src: 试点学校要改革人才培养模式。
test: The school should reform the mode of talent training.

src: 校企共同设计人才培养方案，共同制订专业教学标准、课程标准、岗位标准、企业师傅标准、质量监控标准及相应实施方案。
test: The school and enterprises jointly design the talent training plan, jointly formulate professional teaching standards, course standards, job standards, enterprise master standards, quality control standards and corresponding implementation plans.

src: 试点以培养学制为一个试点周期，学生在企业的实习时间根据专业人才培养方案确定，顶岗实习一般为6个月。
test: The pilot project of the vocational education and training system is a trial period, and the internship time of the students in the enterprise is determined according to the professional talent training plan, and the top internship is generally 6 months.

src: 在企业实践应实施企业班组化管理模式，根据不同专业的特点，1个师傅可带2～5个徒弟，组成学习小组，确保学生熟练掌握每个轮训岗位所需的技能。
test: In practice, enterprises should implement the enterprise team management mode, according to the different characteristics of different professions, 1 teacher can lead 2-5 apprentices to form a learning group, to ensure that students master the skills required for each round of training positions.

src: 根据安排，从2016年起到2019年8月，我市分三批确定60个市级中职现代学徒制试点，每个试点人数在50人左右，总共培养3000名左右学生（学徒 ） 。
test: According to the arrangement, from 2016 to 2019, our city will determine 60 city-level modern apprenticeship pilot projects, each project with a number of students between 50 and 60, and a total of 3,000 students (apprentices) will be trained.

src: 按照先试点再推行，由点到面逐步推进的原则，探索建立校企联合招生、联合培养、一体化育人的长效机制，切实提升学生岗位技能，提高学生对口就业率和就业质量。
test: According to the principle of "from pilot to scale", the school and enterprise joint recruitment, joint training, and the whole process of education and employment, the long-term mechanism of education and employment is explored to promote the construction of the whole process of education and employment, to improve the skills of students, and to improve the quality of employment.

src: 中国儿童中心将举办系列活动让孩子“高科技”过“六一 ” - 新华网
test: China Children's Center to hold series of activities to let kids "high-tech" through "June 1" - Xinhua

src: 新华社北京５月２０日电（黄小希 周珊珊）记者２０日从中国儿童中心获悉，５月２８日至６月１日“六一”儿童节前后，中国儿童中心计划将举办儿童创客体验、儿童视觉艺术节、亲子书香嘉年华等一系列活动，让孩子们在前沿科技的魅力中度过“六一 ” 。
test: 20 May 2017, Beijing, China: The China Children Center will hold a series of activities for children during the Children's Day, including children's creative experience, children's visual arts festival, parent-child book fair, etc.

src: 据了解，中国儿童中心今年“六一”儿童节期间举办的活动包括“爱家创酷”儿童未来学习嘉年华、首届儿童视觉艺术节 、 “ 书香嘉年华”活动 、 “ 全家爱阅读”绘本系列活动等。
test: According to the understanding, the China Children Center will hold a series of activities during the Children's Day this year, including "Love Home Creativity" Children's Future Learning Carnival, the First Children's Visual Arts Festival, "All Family Reading" Picture Book Series Activities, and "All Family Reading" Picture Book Series Activities.

src: 中国儿童中心副主任李忠明在２０日举行的２０１６年“六一”儿童节媒体通气会上介绍说 ， “ 爱家创酷”儿童未来学习嘉年华是今年中国儿童中心庆“六一”的重点活动。
test: The vice principal of the China Children Center, Li Zhongming, introduced at the press conference held on May 20th that the “Love Family, Create Cool” Children’s Future Learning Carnival is the focus of the China Children Center to celebrate the “Children’s Day” this year.

src: 活动着眼于将社会创新与家庭个人创意有机结合，通过儿童和家庭参与体验各种创新教育活动，让创新实践成为大众家庭的文化基因，让“动手做”成为广大家庭新的学习和生活方式。
test: To focus on the integration of social innovation and family and personal creativity, to let children and families participate in various innovative education activities, so that innovative practice becomes the cultural gene of the general family, and "hands-on" becomes a new learning and life style for the broad family.

src: 据悉 ， “ 爱家创酷”儿童未来学习嘉年华包括“豆果创客”体验活动、老牛儿童探索馆周年庆暨“探索全家爱 童萌过六一”活动、ＶＲ全民体验计划 、 “ 创客部落”互动工作坊等几十项前沿科技体验内容。

src: 南非医生：奥密克戎传播力虽强 但多为轻症
test: South African doctor: Omicron spreads quickly but mostly mild

src: 南非许多医生和医疗专家认为，新冠病毒奥密克戎变种所致病症比德尔塔变种更为轻微，虽然传播速度更快。
test: Many doctors and medical experts in South Africa believe that the new coronavirus Omicron variant causes milder symptoms than the Delta variant, although it spreads faster.

src: 据美联社报道，随着奥密克戎变种在南非的传播，南非豪登省的一个五千多名医生组成医师组织报告说，他们目前治疗的新冠病人出现的症状都比较轻微，例如身体疼痛和咳嗽等与流感类似的症状。
test: According to a report by the US media, with the spread of the Omicron variant in South Africa, a group of more than 5,000 doctors in the Gauteng province of South Africa reported that the symptoms of patients they are currently treating are relatively mild, such as body aches and coughing, which are similar to those of influenza.

src: 该组织总监安本·皮莱（Unben Pillay）医生说，他每天都要看几十名病人，但是还没有任何病人需要住院。
test: The organization's director, Dr. Unben Pillay, said that he has to see dozens of patients every day, but there is no patient who needs to be hospitalized.

src: 皮莱说 ： “ 他们能够在家里控制疾病，大多数人在隔离10至14天内康复 。 ”
test: 皮莱说 ： “ 他们能够在家里控制疾病，大多数人在隔离10至14天内康复 。 ”

src: 他说，这包括老年患者和那些有健康问题的患者，这些人群本来更容易因冠状病毒感染而陷入重症。
test: He said that this includes the elderly and those with health problems, who are more likely to be infected with the coronavirus.

src: 他说，与之相比，在上一波的德尔塔疫情中，他治疗的新冠患者“呼吸困难，血氧水平低。
test: He said, compared with the previous wave of the Delta epidemic, the patients he treated in the new coronavirus "had difficulty breathing, low oxygen levels."

src: 许多人几天内就要住院 ” 。
test: Many people will be hospitalized in a few days.

src: 在南部非洲首次报告奥密克戎变异毒株后的两周内，其他医生也分享了类似的经验。
test: In the past two weeks, other doctors have shared similar experiences in southern Africa, where the omicron variant was first reported.

src: 虽然收集足够的数据还需要几个星期的时间，但医生的观察和早期证据提供了一些线索。
test: Although we have collected enough data, it still needs several weeks to complete the analysis, but the doctor's observation and early evidence provide some clues.

src: 据南非国家传染病研究所总结：在近几周住院的新冠患者中，只有30%是严重病症，是前一波疫情重症比例的一半；平均住院时间从8天缩短到2.8天；近期的新冠患者中，仅有3%死亡，而在南非早期爆发的病例中，死亡比例达20 % 。
test: According to the National Institute of Communicable Diseases in South Africa, among the patients hospitalized with new coronavirus in recent weeks, only 30% were severe cases, which is half the rate of the previous wave; the average hospital stay was reduced from 8 days to 2.8 days; and the death rate of recent patients was only 3%, while the death rate in the early outbreak of South Africa was 20%.

src: 非洲健康研究所所长威廉·哈内科姆（Willem Hanekom）引用国家传染病研究所的数据和其他报告说 ： “ 目前，几乎所有的迹象都表明，这是一种较温和的疾病 。 ”
test: The director of the Africa Health Research Institute, William Hanekom, cited data from the National Institute of Communicable Diseases and other reports to say: “At the moment, almost all the signs point to a mild disease.”

src: 他还说 ： “ 现在还是早期，我们需要获得后期数据。
test: He said: “Now is still early, we need to get the later data.”

src: 通常情况下，住院和死亡发生的时间较晚，而我们进入这一波疫情的时间只有两周 。 ”
test: In general, hospitalization and death occur later, and we have entered this wave of the epidemic for only two weeks.

src: 与此同时，世界各地的科学家正在观察病例数和住院率，同时测试目前的疫苗和治疗方法的效果。
test: At the same time, scientists around the world are observing the number of cases and hospitalization rates, while testing the effectiveness of current vaccines and treatments.

src: 尽管德尔塔仍然是全世界主要的新冠病毒株，但奥密克戎病例正在数十个国家出现，其中南非为疫情中心。
test: Although Delta is still the main coronavirus strain in the world, Omicron cases are now appearing in dozens of countries, with South Africa as the center of the outbreak.

src: 据卫生官员介绍，豪登省在12月的第一周发现的新病例增加了400 % ， 测试显示，奥密克戎变体的病例占90%以上。
test: According to the introduction of the health officer, the number of new cases in the first week of December in Hua Deng Province increased by 400%, and the test showed that the Omicron variant accounted for 90% of the cases.

src: 教育时评:拯救被拐儿童要靠什么？
test: 教育时评:拯救被拐儿童要靠什么？

src: 如果类比“没有买卖就没有杀害”的著名公益广告语，那么，在没有“收拐”需求的良好环境里，群防群治、全民反拐，使拐卖行为无利可图、风险大、成本高，这类犯罪也就不会屡屡发生。
test: If the famous public service advertisement "If you don't buy and sell, there will be no killing" is compared, then, in the good environment without "re-kidnapping" demand, group prevention, group treatment, group rehabilitation, group re-education, group re-education, group re-education, group re-education, group re-education, group re-education, group re-education, group re-education, group re-education, group re-education, group re-education, group re-education, group re-education, group re

src: 近日，公安部刑事侦查局打拐办开发的儿童失踪信息紧急发布平台上线。
test: Recently, the criminal investigation department of the public security bureau has developed a platform for the emergency release of missing children.

src: 这是为建立儿童失踪信息发布的权威渠道、及时找回被拐儿童而创设的互联网信息平台。
test: This is a reliable channel for the publication of information on missing children, and a platform for the timely recovery of missing children.

src: 听闻此App名为“团圆 ” ， 顿觉暖意十足。
test: I heard this app is called “Circle” and I feel warm and fuzzy.

src: 新技术手段不仅名称“文艺 ” 、 情怀满满，而且信息化运用得当，实用、有效。
test: The new technology is not only named "culture" and "emotion", but also informationized application, practical and effective.

src: 打拐执法，首要目标是寻回被拐的孩子，保护其人身安全、自由。
test: The first priority of the anti-kidnapping law is to find the kidnapped children and protect their personal safety and freedom.

src: 其次才是对嫌疑人的审判与惩罚。
test: Secondly, the trial and punishment of the suspects.

src: 刑事惩罚的意义，从个别惩罚、社会预防到法律教育，可以列举很多“大词 ” 。
test: The meaning of criminal punishment, from individual punishment, social prevention to legal education, can be listed many "big words".

src: 但在拐卖案件告破之前，应优先关注被害人的人身安全。
test: But before the case of prostitution is cracked, the safety of the victim should be given priority.

src: 事分轻重缓急，在急切的“寻救”目的之下，诸如“拐卖儿童是否应当一律死刑”之类众说纷纭、争议较大的话题，可以暂搁下来，谨慎讨论；但救助被拐儿童的事情等不得。
test: In the face of the urgent “rescue” purpose, the controversial topics such as “whether selling children should be executed” should be put aside temporarily, and be cautious to discuss. But the rescue of the abducted children should not be delayed.

src: 根据此类案件的侦办经验，人贩子惯于在得手之后尽快远离作案地点。
test: Based on the experience of handling such cases, human traffickers are accustomed to leaving the scene as soon as they have completed their crime.

src: 寻拐行动多耽搁一分钟，孩子就可能更远离家长一步，案件侦破的难度也就增加一分。
test: Every minute delay in the search for a missing child will make the child farther away from the parents, and the difficulty of solving the case will also increase by one minute.

src: 在此情况下，拿出如“团圆”平台这样直接有助于侦破案件、寻回孩子的有效办法，确实是务实的行动。
test: In this situation, taking out the like "round-up" platform to directly help to solve the case, find back the child, is a practical action.

src: 毕竟 ， “ 打拐”是需要运作起整个法制系统来做好的一件大任务。
test: In the end, “rescuing kidnapped children” is a big task that requires the whole legal system to operate.

src: 打击犯罪、保障儿童和家长权益，从立法的完善，到司法的保障，以及执法的缜密，无不需要贯彻“护幼扶弱”的关怀。
test: To strike crime, to safeguard children and parents’ rights, from legislation’s improvement, to judicial’s protection, and to police’s strictness, nothing is not needed to be carried out in accordance with the “protecting children and weak” care.

src: 此外，拐卖儿童的预防，从家庭到社会，都还可以做得更好。
test: In addition, the prevention of child trafficking, from the family to the society, can be done better.

src: 比如一个常见的案例，一家三口在火车站休息，父母熟睡，醒来才发现孩子不见了。
test: For example, a common case is that a family of three is resting at the railway station. The parents are sleeping, and the child is missing.

src: 不能期待一个两岁的孩子具有足够的自我保护技能，但作为年幼孩子的家长，应至少具有相当的保护意识。
test: It is not possible to expect a two-year-old child to have enough self-protection skills, but as a parent of a young child, at least you should have a certain protective awareness.

src: 父母两人轮流休息，又或将孩子置于稳妥的保护之下，都是预防儿童被拐的最起码手段。
test: Parents should alternate resting, or place the child in a safe place, which is the most basic way to prevent child abduction.

src: 从警方打击拐卖犯罪的另一面看，购买被拐儿童一方也应被关注和惩治。
test: From another perspective, the buying of trafficked children should also be paid attention to and punished.

src: 单个的不法行为，往往只是长长链条中的一环。
test: A single act of wrongdoing is often only a link in a long chain.

src: 根据我国《刑法》规定，拐卖儿童罪的法定刑起刑点为5年；情节特别严重的，可至死刑，并处没收财产。
test: According to the Chinese Criminal Law, the crime of selling children is punishable by a minimum of 5 years in prison and a maximum of death.

src: 起刑点高、最高刑重，在“轻刑化”的大趋势下，拐卖儿童罪显然属于处罚较重的罪。
test: The crime of selling children is a serious crime in the trend of lightening punishment.

src: 可至今每年仍还有不少的拐卖案件发生。
test: There are still many cases of prostitution every year.

src: 可见，部分人在养育儿女方面的观念落后，法律意识淡薄。
test: It is obvious that some people are behind in their views on raising children, and their legal awareness is shallow.

src: 对这部分人的法制教育应该同步跟进。
test: The legal education for this part of people should be synchronized with the progress.

src: 要有效控制拐卖犯罪，不能仅靠官方严格执法。
test: To effectively control the crime of prostitution, it cannot be done only by strict law enforcement by the government.

src: 倘若收拐“市场”广泛存在，拐卖者利欲熏心，不断创新拐卖手段，形成与执法者的“斗法”局面，打拐行动势必会陷入低效的泥淖。
test: If the market for prostitution is widely available, the prostitutes' greed for money will be stimulated, and they will constantly innovate their methods of prostitution, forming a "struggle" situation with the police. The anti-prostitution campaign will inevitably be trapped in a quagmire.

src: 因此，破除落后观念，普及法律常识，也有助于根治拐卖、收买儿童犯罪。
test: Therefore, to eliminate the backward concept, to popularize legal knowledge, and also to help to root out child trafficking and child prostitution.

src: 2022年北京地区高校毕业生预计达26.8万人-新华网
test: 2022年北京地区高校毕业生预计达26.8万人-新华网

src: 新华社北京12月11日电（记者阳娜）记者从近日北京市教委、北京市人力资源和社会保障局联合召开的2022届北京高校毕业生就业创业工作视频会议上获悉，2022年北京地区高校毕业生预计达26.8万人，比去年增加1.6万人。
test: Xinhua News Agency Beijing, December 11 (Reporter Yangna) A reporter from the Beijing Municipal Education Commission and the Beijing Municipal Human Resources and Social Security Bureau recently learned from the 2022 Beijing Higher Education Graduate Employment and Entrepreneurship Work Video Conference jointly held by the two units that the number of graduates of Beijing universities in 2022 is expected to reach 26.8 million, an increase of 1.6 million over last year.

src: 北京市人力资源和社会保障局相关负责人表示，将从加强供需匹配、强化政策支持、拓宽就业渠道、确保困难帮扶、支持创新创业、提升服务效能等方面部署北京高校毕业生就业工作。
test: The relevant person in charge of the Beijing Municipal Human Resources and Social Security Bureau said that they will strengthen the supply and demand matching, strengthen policy support, expand employment channels, ensure difficult assistance, support innovation and entrepreneurship, and improve service efficiency in the work of employment of graduates of Beijing universities.

src: 记者了解到，北京市人力资源和社会保障局将搭建实践平台，加大岗位供给，主动联系40家高校毕业生职场体验基地，走访用人单位，整合需求信息和岗位信息；重点抓好“六个一批 ” ， 即拓宽事业单位招录一批，拓宽国有企业招聘一批，拓宽基层项目招募一批，拓宽应征入伍一批，拓宽就业见习留用一批，拓宽创业带动就业一批；实行“一生一策”动态管理，为每位毕业生推荐不少于5个岗位信息，确保有就业意愿的困难家庭毕业生100%实现帮扶等。
test: The reporter understands that the Beijing Municipal Human Resources and Social Security Bureau will build a practice platform, increase the supply of posts, actively contact 40 universities to set up graduate employment experience bases, visit recruitment units, integrate demand information and post information; focus on "six one" to expand the recruitment of enterprises, expand the recruitment of state-owned enterprises, expand the recruitment of grass-roots projects, expand the recruitment of military recruitment, expand the recruitment of internships and employment, and expand the recruitment of entrepreneurship and employment. src: 国际橄榄油协会将橄榄油分为初榨橄榄油（Virgin Olive Oil）和精炼橄榄油（Lampante Olive Oil或Refined Olive Oil）两大类，五个级别。
test: The International Olive Oil Council (IOOC) classifies olive oil into two main categories: Virgin Olive Oil (VOO) and Refined Olive Oil (ROO).

src: 初榨橄榄油或称为天然橄榄油，是直接从新鲜的橄榄果实中采取机械冷榨、经过过滤等处理除去异物后得到的油脂。
test: The first pressing of olive oil or also called natural olive oil is obtained directly from fresh olives by mechanical cold pressing, followed by filtration to remove impurities.

src: 根据酸度的不同可分为三个级别：
test: According to the acidity, it can be divided into three levels:

src: 特级初榨橄榄油（Extra Virgin）：是最高级别、质量最高的橄榄油，是纯天然产品。
test: Extra Virgin Olive Oil: It is the highest quality and the highest quality olive oil. It is a natural product.

src: 口味绝佳，有淡雅怡人的植物芬芳，酸度不超过1%。
test: The taste is excellent, with a mild and elegant floral aroma, and the acidity is not more than 1%.

src: 优质初榨橄榄油（Fine Virgin）：酸度稍高，但不超过2%，味道纯正、芳香。
test: Fine Virgin Olive Oil: Slightly acidic, but not exceeding 2%, pure flavor, fragrant.

src: 普通初榨橄榄油（Ordinary Virgin）：口味与风味尚可，酸度不超过3.3%。
test: Ordinary Virgin Olive Oil: The taste and aroma are acceptable, the acidity is not more than 3.3%.

src: 精炼橄榄油是指酸度超过3.3%的初榨橄榄油精炼后所得到的橄榄油，或成为“二次油”。
test: Refined sesame oil is a sesame oil with an acidity of more than 3.3% obtained by refining the initial sesame oil.

src: 精炼橄榄油可分为两个级别：
test: 精炼橄榄油可分为两个级别：

src: 普通橄榄油（Olive Oil）：精炼橄榄油与一定比例的初榨橄榄油混合，以调和味道与颜色，其酸度在1.5%以下，呈透明的淡金黄色。
test: Common Olive Oil: Refined olive oil and a certain proportion of virgin olive oil are mixed to adjust the taste and color, with an acidity of 1.5% or less, and a transparent light yellow color.

src: 精炼橄榄杂质油或橄榄果渣油（Refined Olive-Pomace Oil）：是通过溶解法从油渣中提取并经过精炼而得到的橄榄油。
test: Refined Olive-Pomace Oil: is obtained by solvent extraction from olive-pomace oil and refining.

src: 看过等级分类的你应该已经发现，橄榄油的酸度是一个非常重要的指标。
test: You should have found out that the acidity of olive oil is an important indicator of its quality.

src: 要知道，橄榄果就好像酿制葡萄酒的葡萄一样，来自不同的产区、不同橄榄果品种的橄榄果，就会出产不同标准的橄榄油。
test: You know, olive oil is like wine, which is made from different varieties of grapes from different regions.

src: 油橄榄的最佳生长地：
test: The best growing place of olive oil:

src: 地中海沿岸具有油橄榄生长所需的最适宜的土壤和气温、日照、空气湿度以及降水量等气候条件。
test: The Mediterranean coast has the most suitable soil and climate conditions for the growth of olive trees.

src: 除地中海沿岸外，其它地区只能在适生区零星种植。
test: Except for the coastal areas of the Mediterranean, other areas can only be planted sporadically in suitable areas.

src: 主要产区产地（地中海）：
test: Main production area:

src: 意大利、西班牙、希腊、土耳其、葡萄牙、摩洛哥、叙利亚、以色列、突尼斯、阿尔及利亚、埃及、巴基斯坦、黎巴嫩等等，与其气候类似的也有远在南纬度的阿根廷、秘鲁、南非等等。
test: Italy, Spain, Greece, Turkey, Portugal, Morocco, Syria, Israel, Tunisia, Algeria, Egypt, Pakistan, Lebanon, etc. and other countries with similar climate, such as Argentina, Peru, South Africa, etc.

src: 油橄榄的采摘月份：
test: Harvesting of oil palm:

src: 每年的3至6月，是油橄榄树开花坐果的时间，7至10月果实开始发育并且成熟，果实从绿色过渡到红色，紫色，最后变黑。
test: The oil palm tree flowers from June to September, and the fruits ripen from July to October. The fruits are green, then red, then purple, and finally black.

src: 11月至次年2月是果实的采摘季节（橄榄油的新鲜度可是很重要的哦）。
test: November to February is the harvest season for fruits (the freshness of olive oil is very important).

src: 橄榄油的营养成分：
test: The nutritional components of olive oil:

src: 橄榄油富含丰富的单不饱和脂肪酸，即油酸及亚油酸、亚麻酸，还有维生素A、维生素B、维生素D、维生素E、维生素K及抗氧化物等。
test: Olive oil is rich in unsaturated fatty acids, namely oleic acid and linoleic acid, as well as vitamins A, B, D, E, K and antioxidants.

src: 橄榄油被认为是迄今所发现的油脂中最适合人体营养的油。
test: Olive oil is considered to be the most suitable oil for human nutrition among all the oils discovered so far.

src: 民主峰会落幕，拜登称自由之火永不熄灭
test: The democracy summit ends, Biden calls the flame of freedom never extinguished

src: 由美国总统拜登召集、有全球110个国家的政府以及公民社会和私营部门领导人出席的线上“民主峰会 ” ( Summit for Democracy)星期五（12月10日）落幕。
test: The Summit for Democracy, which was convened by U.S. President Biden and attended by leaders from 110 countries, as well as civil society and private sector representatives, concluded on Friday (December 10).

src: 拜登在闭幕词中说，自由之火在世界每个人的心中燃烧，专制政权永远无法将其熄灭。
test: Biden said in his closing remarks that the fire of freedom burns in the hearts of people all over the world, and tyranny can never extinguish it.

src: 他也表示，计划明年召开第二届全球“民主峰会 ” 。
test: He also said that the plan is to hold the second Global "Democracy Summit" next year.

src: 台湾政府代表、政务委员唐凤和目前流亡英国的香港民主人权活动人士罗冠聪也在第二天的峰会上发言。
test: The Taiwan government representative, Vice Minister of the Mainland Affairs Council, Tang Fei, and the Hong Kong democracy activist currently in exile in the UK, Joshua Wong, also spoke at the second day of the forum.

src: 拜登说 ： “ 我们知道摆在我们面前的工作是多么的艰巨。
test: Biden said: “We know how difficult the work in front of us is.”

src: 但我们也知道，我们可以迎接挑战，因为我以前说过，正如这次峰会所表明的，民主世界无处不在。
test: But we also know that we can meet the challenge, because I have said before, just as this summit has shown, democracy is everywhere.

src: 专制政权永远无法熄灭自由的微火，它在全世界和世界各地人们的心中燃烧 。 ”
test: The flame of freedom can never be extinguished by a totalitarian regime. It burns in the hearts of people all over the world.

src: 拜登还表示，捍卫民主需要整个社会的共同努力。
test: Biden said that defending democracy requires the collective effort of the whole society.

src: 他说 ： “ 作为政府的领导人，我们有责任倾听我们的公民，加固民主的护栏，推动改革，实现透明的问责治理，更能抵御专制的缓冲和冲击的力量，以及那些想在公共利益之前赤裸裸地追求权力的人 。 ”
test: He said, “As the leader of the government, we have the responsibility to listen to our citizens, strengthen the barriers of democracy, promote reform, and achieve transparent governance, which can better resist the buffering and impact of authoritarianism and those who seek power at the expense of public interests.”

src: “民主峰会”第二天的主题分别是捍卫人权，巩固民主与对抗威权，以及反击数字威权主义与肯定民主价值。
test: The theme of the second day of the “Democracy Summit” is to defend human rights, consolidate democracy and resist digital authoritarianism and affirm the value of democracy.

src: 这一天恰逢“国际人权日 ” 。
test: Today is the International Human Rights Day.

src: 联合国秘书长古特雷斯在当天的开场讲话中也表示，民主事业在全球面临挑战，特别是新兴数字技术带来的挑战。
test: The Secretary-General of the United Nations, Guterres, in his opening speech on the day also said that democracy is facing challenges around the world, especially the challenges brought by new digital technologies.

src: 他说 ： “ 现在是重申共同价值观和立场以及民主韧性的时候了。
test: He said: “Now is the time to reiterate the common values and stance and the democratic resilience.”

src: 这需要深化社会对话，解决不平等问题，打击腐败，更新社会契约，为优质教育投资，并扩大妇女和女童的机会。
test: This requires deepening social dialogue, solving the problem of inequality, fighting corruption, updating social contracts, investing in quality education, and expanding women and girls' opportunities.

src: 这也需要坚决谴责一切形式的民粹主义、本土主义和极端主义，包括利用技术革命所提供的所有工具 。 ”
test: This also needs to be resolutely condemned in all forms of nationalism, localism and extremism, including the use of all tools provided by technological revolutions.

src: 香港民主人权活动人士罗冠聪通过预先录制的视频对峰会发表讲话，提醒与会者持续关注香港和维吾尔族和藏族等中国少数民族的人权状况。
test: Hong Kong democracy activist and human rights defender, Mr. Roy Kwong, delivered a pre-recorded speech at the conference, reminding participants to continue to pay attention to the human rights situation in Hong Kong and other ethnic minorities in China, such as the Uyghurs and Tibetans.

src: 他说 ： “ 长期以来，世界一直接受中国的崛起，却没有建立一个机制来对其进行问责。
test: He said: “For a long time, the world has been under the impact of China’s rise, but there is no mechanism to hold it accountable.”

src: 这就是为什么政治人物和民间社会领导人必须合作。
test: This is why political leaders and community leaders must work together.

src: 我们必须利用我们所拥有的一切（资源）来确保民主的复兴是我们的首要任务 。 ”
test: We must use all our resources to ensure that the revival of democracy is our top priority.

src: 罗冠聪也呼吁自由世界团结起来对抗中共的威胁。
test: Luo Guanzhong also called on the free world to unite to resist the threat of the CCP.

src: 他说 ： “ 也许你们中的一些人害怕惹恼习近平总书记，也许你们中的一些人不想失去中国市场，也许你们中的一些人没有认识到（中共）对我们民主价值观的威胁。
test: He said: “Maybe some of you are afraid of offending Xi Jinping, maybe some of you are afraid of losing the Chinese market, maybe some of you don’t know the threat of the CCP to our democratic values.”

src: 而这就是我们失败的原因。
test: And this is the reason for our failure.

src: 这也是我们必须改变的原因 。 ”
test: This is also one of the reasons we must change.

src: 台湾行政院政务委员唐凤在出席“打击数字独裁主义，肯定民主价值”的圆桌讨论中，通过视频发布《国家声明 》 ， 强调台湾站在对抗专制和威权的最前线。
test: The Vice Premier of the Executive Yuan of the Republic of China, Wang Ting-yu, attended the roundtable discussion on "Fighting Digital Authoritarianism, Affirming Democratic Values" and released the "National Statement" through video, emphasizing that Taiwan stands at the forefront of resisting authoritarianism and tyranny.

src: 他也分享了如何通过信息透明与构建互信来抗击新冠疫情的经验。
test: He also shared how information transparency and building trust can help fight the COVID-19 pandemic.

src: 他说 ： “ 在台湾的民主方兴未艾之际，我们始终坚定站在全球对抗威权主义的最前线，更在促进全球自由、民主和人权上，扮演领导角色。
test: He said: “In the era of democracy in Taiwan, we have always stood firmly on the front line of global resistance to hegemony, and played a leading role in promoting global freedom, democracy and human rights.”

src: 于疫情期间，各地的威权政府以公共卫生和集体利益为名，合理化侵犯人权的行为，全球民主呈现倒退的迹象。
test: During the pandemic, various authoritarian governments around the world have justified their violations of human rights by citing public health and collective interests. The global trend of democracy is regressing.

src: 然而在台湾，我们不必封城就能控制疫情，不必下架就能战胜假信息 。 ”
test: However, in Taiwan, we do not need to close the city to control the epidemic, and we do not need to block the information to fight against fake news.

src: 就在“民主峰会”第二天日程进行的同时，美国财政部宣布对被认定严重侵犯人权的中国、朝鲜等几个国家的15名个人、10个实体依法实施制裁，同时对一家被认定利用监视技术协助侵犯人权的中国公司实施投资限制。
test: On the second day of the “Democracy Summit” schedule, the US Treasury announced that it would impose sanctions on 15 individuals and 10 entities in China, North Korea and other countries that are considered to have seriously violated human rights, and at the same time, it would impose investment restrictions on a Chinese company that is considered to have used surveillance technology to assist in the violation of human rights.

src: 江西３年内将培训万名乡村小学音体美教师-新华网
test: 3 years in Jiangxi will train 100,000 rural primary school music and art teachers - Xinhua Net

src: 新华社南昌５月２２日电（记者陈毓珊）记者近日从江西省教育厅获悉，为增强紧缺学科教师队伍保障能力，实现乡村义务教育均衡发展，自２０１６年起，江西省规划用３年时间为全省乡村（乡镇及以下）每所小学培训合格的音乐、美术、体育教师各１名，共计１万名。
test: On May 22, 2016, the reporter of the Xinhua News Agency in Nanjing learned from the Education Department of Jiangxi Province that in order to strengthen the guarantee capacity of the shortage of teaching teams in the rural compulsory education, to achieve the balanced development of rural compulsory education, from 2016, Jiangxi Province plans to train 1,000 qualified music, art and physical education teachers for each primary school in rural areas (townships and below) in three years.

src: 据了解，这次培训对象为江西全省乡村小学４５岁以下具有音乐、美术、体育学科知识基础或才能，能兼任音乐、美术、体育课程的其他学科教师。
test: According to the understanding, the training object is the primary school in rural areas of 45 years old in Jiangxi Province.

src: 通过培训，使他们掌握音体美学科教学的基本知识和教学技能，更新教学思想和观念，掌握现代教学方法，提高学科教学能力、活动设计能力、校园文化能力及自我发展能力，建设一支一专多能的音体美教师队伍，缓解乡村音体美教师缺乏的问题。
test: Through training, they master the basic knowledge and teaching skills of the course of aesthetics and teaching, update teaching ideas and concepts, master modern teaching methods, improve teaching ability, activity design ability, campus culture ability and self-development ability, and build a team of multi-skilled aesthetics and teaching teachers to alleviate the shortage of rural aesthetics and teaching teachers.

src: 为确保培训质量和效果，江西还规划为全省１００个县（市、区）小学音乐、美术、体育各培训１名，共计３００名培训者，全面提升他们的教学示范引领能力、教研活动设计组织能力、施训能力、网络研修工作坊建设能力，起到教授、示范、指导、监督的作用。
test: To ensure the quality and effectiveness of training, Jiangxi also plans to train 100 county (city, district) primary school music, art, sports, each training 1 person, a total of 300 people, comprehensively improve their teaching demonstration leading ability, teaching research activity design ability, teaching ability, network seminar construction ability, play a teaching, demonstration, guidance, supervision role.

src: 其实对于身体微胖的女孩子穿衣搭配的讲究很多。
test: In fact, for the thin girl, the matching of clothing is very particular.

src: 身体胖的女孩穿的裙子不能太短或太长，长度差不多在膝盖，刚好能盖住大腿胖的地方即可。
test: The girl's skirt should be neither too short nor too long. It should be just above the knee.

src: 裙子过短就会把腿上的肥胖显露出来。
test: If your skirt is too short, your fat thighs will be exposed.

src: 过长就会给人矮而胖的感觉。
test: If you are tall, you will feel fat.

src: 如果穿出分出上中下三段来，就显得你自然增高了，就是上身、裙和长筒袜用不同的颜色，看上去就会产生一种修长的感觉 。
test: If you wear a three-piece suit, it will make you look taller.

src: 其实很多深色系的衣服是微胖女孩子们的标配（这一点作者深有体会），深颜色也是掩盖你身体胖的好方法，高贵典雅的黑色短裙也是微胖女孩的首选。
test: Actually, many dark-colored clothes are the standard for thin girls (this point the author has a deep understanding). Dark colors are also a good way to hide your fat body, and black short skirts are the first choice for thin girls.

src: 穿上深颜色的衣服，特别是黑色的短裙，会让人觉得你瘦一些。
test: Wearing dark clothes, especially a short skirt, will make you look thinner.

src: 如果小腿很胖，你的袜子和鞋不要穿得太让人注意。
test: If your legs are fat, don't wear shoes and socks that are too noticeable.

src: 越大众化越好，颜色也不要太鲜艳了。
test: The more popular, the better. The color is not too bright.

src: 以免人们对你的腿部和脚部注意时，让人得到肥胖的感觉。
test: To avoid people paying attention to your legs and feet, make people feel fat.

src: 对于微微稍胖的女孩子一定要讲就好穿衣搭配的诀窍。
test: For a slightly overweight girl, it is necessary to talk about how to dress well.

src: 微胖女孩千万不要穿紧身的短裙，另外上衣不要过短或者塞在裙子里，会让人看了很不舒服，如果腿粗的话，要穿黑色的长筒袜或者网格袜(细格子的那种哦)，选择质地柔软的印花喇叭裙，搭配一件荡领的上衣，可以很好的掩盖胖女孩的不足。
test: Don't wear tight skirts, and don't wear clothes that are too short or too tight. It will make people feel uncomfortable. If you have fat legs, you should wear black stockings or stockings with a grid pattern. Choose a loose-fitting blouse with a ruffled skirt.

src: 当然了，微胖的女孩儿在穿短裙上也是有讲究的。
test: Of course, a thin girl in a short skirt also has to be careful.

src: 胖女孩穿短裙，应该选择与短裙的颜色一致的上衣，这样会使你胖胖的身材有增加高度的效果。
test: A fat girl wears a short skirt, she should choose a matching top with the short skirt, which will make her fat body look taller.

src: 短裙搭配高跟鞋，可以让你的双腿显得更为修长，这可是夏季最IN的搭配喔!
test: Short skirt with high heels can make your legs look longer, which is the most IN in summer!

src: 如果你是上身胖，但腿很瘦的MM，推荐选择华丽感的连衣短裙。
test: If you are a MM who is fat on the upper body but thin on the legs, I recommend you to choose a beautiful feeling short skirt.

src: 不但能遮住大肚皮，更能展现你的优点。
test: Not only can it cover your big belly, but it can also show your advantages.

src: A字短裙会很显瘦，比较适合胖女孩，上衣要选择紧身一些的，形成层次感会更显瘦。
test: A short skirt will make you look skinny, which is more suitable for fat girls. The upper body should be tight-fitting.

src: 简简单单白T恤搭配短裙，胖MM也可以尝试。
test: Simple and easy to wear, MM can also try.

src: 微胖的女孩也是能够穿出时尚感的。
test: The skinny girl can also dress fashionably.

src: 只要能够掌握好穿衣搭配的法则那么微胖的女孩子们也会是万众瞩目的焦点。
test: As long as you can master the rules of dressing and matching, then even the thin girls will be the focus of everyone.

src: 在穿衣搭配方面上有了改变后，在生活中也要多运动，争取早一天脱离微胖女生的标签吧😄
test: After changing the way of dressing, let's try to get rid of the label of "fat girl" earlier in life.

src: 第十八届“世界饮料创新奖”（World Beverage Innovation Awards）是FoodBev Media与德国纽伦堡国际啤酒、酿酒及饮料工业展览会（Brau Beviale）联合举办的奖项。
test: The 18th “World Beverage Innovation Awards” (World Beverage Innovation Awards) is jointly organized by FoodBev Media and the German New Leipzig International Brewing, Wine and Beverage Industry Exhibition (Brau Beviale).

src: 吸引了来自25个国家、22个不同品类的279个作品参赛。
test: 279 works from 25 countries and 22 categories were submitted to the competition.

src: 10月15日，决赛入围者名单公布，最终获奖者名单将于11月11日（英国夏令时）线上公布。
test: The finalists will be announced on October 15th, and the winners will be announced on November 11th (British Summer Time).

src: 我们看到，元气森林的LP28无糖酸奶入围最佳乳饮料奖，伊利安慕希的“GOGO武汉”营销入围最佳营销活动，百事可乐和人民日报新媒体合作的包装还入围最佳包装设计/标签奖。
test: We saw that the LP28 sugar-free milk of Yuanqi Forest won the best dairy drink award, the marketing of "GOGO Wuhan" of Ilian Mushi won the best marketing award, and the packaging of Coca-Cola and People's Daily New Media cooperation won the best packaging design/label award.

src: FoodBev Media高级市场营销总监Laura Nettle表示：我们很高兴与Brau Beviale一起庆祝年度世界饮料创新奖的第18年。
test: Laura Nettle, Senior Marketing Director of FoodBev Media, said: “We are delighted to celebrate the 18th year of the World Beverage Innovation Awards with Brau Beviale.”

src: 从新口味、新概念和新功能到品牌、包装和制造，随着行业不断以更可持续的方式进行创新，我们看到了饮料行业的趋势。
test: From new flavors, new concepts and new functions to brands, packaging and manufacturing, as the industry continues to innovate in a more sustainable way, we see the trends in the beverage industry.

src: 世界饮料创新奖表彰了全球饮料行业新老品牌今年最具雄心的新产品和新发展。
test: The World Beverage Innovation Awards honored the most innovative new products and new developments in the global beverage industry this year.

src: 以下是每个类别的决赛入围者的完整榜单。
test: The following is the complete list of finalists in each category.

src: Ardagh Group开发的技术，可以将100％的回收玻璃重新熔化成新的瓶子。
test: Ardagh Group has developed a technology that can recycle 100% of the glass back into new bottles.

src: 箱中袋装水，其包装盒采用100％可回收利用，可减少包装66％，减少碳排放97％。
test: The packaging box is made of 100% recyclable material, which can reduce packaging by 66% and reduce carbon emissions by 97%.

src: LatCub是100％可生物降解，使用更少的纸，并且不使用对环境有害的胶水或胶带。
test: LatCub is 100% biodegradable, uses less paper and does not use harmful adhesives or glue.

src: Ardagh Group开发的技术，可以将100％的回收玻璃重新熔化制成新的瓶子。
test: Ardagh Group has developed a technology that can recycle 100% of the glass back into new bottles.

src: 最终获奖名单将于11月11日（英国夏令时）在FoodBev Media的 YouTube频道公布，FBIF将持续为您报道，敬请期待！
test: The final winners list will be announced on 11 November (British Summer Time) on FoodBev Media’s YouTube channel, FBIF will continue to report to you, please look forward to it!

src: 新华全媒+丨北京青少年冰球联赛助燃冬奥热情-新华网
test: 新华全媒+丨北京青少年冰球联赛助燃冬奥热情-新华网

src: 12月11日，北京梦想ING队球员庞尧天（中）在比赛中射门。
test: On December 11, 2011, Chinese Dreaming ING team player Pang Yao Tian (China) shot a goal in the game.

src: 当日，2021-2022赛季北京市青少年冰球俱乐部联赛在北京各大冰场继续角逐。
test: On the day, the 2021-2022 season of the Beijing Youth Ice Hockey League continued to compete in Beijing's major ice rinks.

src: 本届联赛分为常规赛与季后赛，参赛运动员年龄段为U6至U18，组别设置分为竞技组与选拔组，共吸引全市256支代表队的近3600名球员参加。
test: This year's league is divided into regular season and playoffs, with age groups ranging from U6 to U18. The teams participating in the competition are divided into competitive and selection teams, with a total of 256 teams from all over the city, with nearly 3600 players.

src: 北京市青少年冰球俱乐部联赛经过十余年的发展，现已成为北京青少年冰球爱好者切磋技术、广交球友的平台，并为北京市青少年冰球队和青年队输送优秀球员。
test: The Beijing Youth Ice Hockey League has been developed for more than ten years, and has become a platform for Beijing youth ice hockey enthusiasts to improve their skills, exchange friends, and provide excellent players for Beijing youth ice hockey teams and youth teams.

src: 联赛发挥赛事对北京青少年冰球运动的带动作用，助燃冬奥冰球热情，为后冬奥时期北京冰球运动发展打下基础。
test: The league matches have played a positive role in promoting the development of ice hockey among Beijing youth, and have ignited the enthusiasm for ice hockey in the Beijing Winter Olympics. They have laid a foundation for the development of ice hockey in Beijing after the Winter Olympics.

src: 该行为引发网友热议。

src: 昨晚，杭州市公安局下城分局宣传负责人向新京报记者证实，警方确认该女孩为姐姐募捐才做出这样的过激举动，但这种行为并不值得提倡，经告诫后，该女孩昨日已经离开当地派出所。

The other wooden board in front of her is written with her bank account number and WeChat, Alipay account number, etc.

src: 前段时间有篇《快看！项目经理可冲击金牌的奥运项目》文章很火，里面提到项目经理们在很多项目上，绝对是可以一马当先，无人能匹： 搬砖、出差、熬夜是项目经理的日常，救火、背锅、道歉更是不在话下。
test: Recently, there was an article called "Project Manager Can Win Gold Medal" which was very hot. In the article, it said that project managers in many projects are absolutely the first to win: moving bricks, traveling, staying up late is the daily work of project managers, saving fire, carrying buckets, apologizing is not in the talk.

src: 看似玩笑调侃的一篇文章，却也道出了项目经理们的日常辛酸，背后代表的是对当前项目管理工作的力不从心。
test: A seemingly joking article, but also reveals the daily pain of project managers, behind which represents the lack of heart in the current project management work.

src: 而从事项目管理工作的人员，也渐渐选择通过一些行动来让自己摆脱工作中的困境。
test: And those who are engaged in project management work are gradually choosing to get rid of the predicament in their work through some actions.

src: 从每年攀升的PMP（国际认证的项目管理专业人士资格）报名人数来看，越来越多的项目管理从业人员通过学习来提升自己的项目管理能力。
test: From the number of PMP (International Project Management Professional Certification) registration, the number of project management professionals is increasing year by year.

src: 据《中国项目管理二十年发展报告(1999-2019)》称：截止到2019年9月，全国累计PMP®报考人数近60万人次，通过PMP®认证人数约42万人，有效持证人数约30万人, 占全球PMP®持证总量的31.2%。
test: According to the “China Project Management Twenty Years Development Report (1999-2019)”: As of September 2019, the total number of PMP® candidates in China was nearly 600,000, the number of PMP® certified was about 420,000, and the number of valid certificates was about 300,000, accounting for 31.2% of the global PMP® certificate holders.

src: 近10年PMP持证人数逐年递增，这说明越来越多的项目管理者意识到：靠简单照搬以往“老经验”来做事已不可取，瞬息万变的工作环境让我们知道一个要学会，站在科学巨人的肩膀上去探索前行的道路。
test: In the past 10 years, the number of PMP certified people has been increasing year by year, which shows that more and more project managers are aware that: relying on the old experience of "copying" in the past to do things is no longer possible, the rapidly changing work environment makes us know that we must learn to stand on the shoulders of scientific giants to explore the way forward.

src: 然而，考了PMP就能保证项目管理工作畅通无阻了吗？
test: However, if you pass the PMP exam, you can ensure that your project management work will be smooth and unimpeded?

src: 很多项目管理初学者表示，通过学习PMP/IPMP等相关课程，可以系统性地掌握项目管理的十大领域和五大过程组等相关知识点，但真正进行项目管理工作的时候却还是一头雾水。
test: Many project management beginners say that after learning PMP/IPMP courses, they can systematically master the ten major areas and five major processes of project management, but when they really do project management work, they are still a little confused.

src: 很多项目经理常常反馈以下问题： 项目管理认知不到位，单纯依靠个人经验，空有项目管理理论，不知如何实践； 缺乏系统的项目管理流程制度支撑，工作中无法落地，项目预估不准，把控度灵敏度差，项目一拖再拖； 成员分工不明确、团队中的“老油条”不知如何应对 跨部门协助沟通不顺畅，项目难以推进 ……
test: Many project managers often feedback the following problems: Project management awareness is not in place, relying solely on personal experience, lacking project management theory, and not knowing how to practice; Lack of systematic project management process support, work cannot be landed, project estimates are not accurate, control and sensitivity are poor, project delay again and again ……

src: 因此，专注产品创新与研发管理领域十余载，已帮助众多优秀的企业培养了大批的产品经理、项目经理等研发关键人才，并获得了 “中国企业研发管理人才培训示范基地”等荣誉称号的中天华夏咨询带着《研发项目经理特训营》线上课程来了。
test: Therefore, focusing on product innovation and R&D management for more than ten years, I have helped many excellent enterprises to train a large number of product managers, project managers and other R&D key talents, and won the title of "China's R&D Management Talent Training Demonstration Base".

src: 《研发项目经理特训营》线上课程 这是一种线上碎片化学习的方式，结合了众多研发型企业的实战案例、工具和方法，帮助您掌握项目经理必备知识及标准动作，走上自身项目管理的进阶之路。
test: Project Management Training for R&D Managers

src: 这也是一次让企业用更低的成本和更少的投入，促进项目经理的培养进程，为企业带来高效运作结果的机会。
test: This is also a chance for enterprises to promote the training of project managers with lower costs and less investment, and achieve high efficiency operation results.

test: 口说无凭，可以先看看其他学员怎么评价这门课程： 这门课程不仅是由中天华夏专家团队（原华为研发管理团队），结合国际先进的项目管理方法论和众多知名企业真实业务场景，对课程内容进行深入浅出的专业讲解。

test: It will provide more scientific and practical management tools and methods, rich templates and forms to help students after class to transform and apply the knowledge learned in practice.

src: 捷信“双十二”前夕向消费者倡导理性消费 - 经济观察网 － 专业财经新闻网站
test: JD.com Promotes Reasonable Consumption to Consumers Ahead of Double 12

src: 今年“双十一”狂欢节全国网络支付业务交易金额达到1.77万亿元，相较往年再创新高。
test: The total amount of online payment transactions in China during the 2011 Double Eleven shopping festival reached 1.77 trillion yuan, setting a new record.

src: 花样繁多的满减红包，抓人眼球的直播带货再一次让消费者大呼获益，这股消费热潮一方面让人感叹国民消费力愈发强劲，另一方面也不得不冷静下来思考消费主义对社会以及当代主流消费群体的影响。
test: The variety of red envelopes is endless, and the live broadcast of goods is once again making consumers happy. This wave of consumption is making people sigh at the strength of the Chinese people's consumption, but it is also making people calm down and think about the influence of consumption on society and the mainstream consumer group.

src: 在“双十二”到来前夕，捷信消费金融有限公司（以下简称“捷信 ” ） 发出理性消费倡导，提醒广大用户尤其是年轻人树立良好的消费意识与消费习惯，拒绝盲目消费与过度消费。
test: On the eve of the Double 12, Jiesheng Consumer Finance Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as "Jiesheng") issued a rationale for consumption promotion, reminding all users, especially young people, to establish good consumption awareness and consumption habits, and refuse blind consumption and excessive consumption.

src: 据人民银行今年发布的《消费者金融素养调查分析报告》结果显示，全国消费者金融素养指数为66.81，与2019年相比，提高2.04。
test: According to the "Consumer Financial Health Survey Analysis Report" released by the People's Bank of China this year, the national consumer financial health index is 66.81, which is 2.04 higher than that in 2019.

src: 总体上，我国居民在金融消费层面上的表现较好，但在金融行为和技能的不同方面体现出较大的差异性，还需要进一步提升基础金融知识水平。
test: In general, the Chinese people's performance in financial consumption is good, but there are differences in financial behavior and skills, and the basic financial knowledge level needs to be further improved.

src: 老年人和青少年的金融素养水平相对较低 ， “ 一老一少”仍将是金融教育持续关注的重点对象；尼尔森发布的《中国年轻人负债状况报告》及央视财经发布的《2019-2020中国青年消费报告》显示，年轻一代具有巨大的消费潜力，信用消费成为消费升级重要途径，86.6%的年轻人都在使用信贷产品，近半数人没有债务累积，年轻一代虽然整体呈现理性消费趋势，虽与外界贴上的“过度挥霍”标签大相径庭，但部分年轻人的确存在过度消费、跟风消费行为，并因此产生了过大的财务压力和债务风险，甚至导致社会问题逐渐增加，金融企业应勇于承担社会责任，进行正向引导。
test: The financial literacy of the elderly and young people is relatively low, and “one old and one young” will still be the focus of continuous attention in financial education; according to the report released by Nielsen on the financial situation of young people in China and the report released by CCTV Finance on the consumption report of young people in China in 2019-2020, young people have great consumption potential, and credit consumption has become an important upgrade channel for consumption, and 86.6% of young people are using credit products, and half of them have no debt accumulation, although young people generally show a rational consumption trend, although they are often labeled with “overconsum

src: 作为持牌消费金融机构，捷信一直致力于以优质、贴心的服务助力百姓构建自己的幸福生活，倡导消费者树立良好正确的消费观，并积极响应监管号召，以实际行动提升消费者尤其是年轻群体的理性消费意识。
test: As a licensed financial institution, Jiesheng has always been committed to providing high-quality, considerate services to help the people build their own happy life, advocate correct consumption concepts, and actively respond to the supervision requirements, and improve the rational consumption awareness of young consumers in particular.

src: 在过去多年间，捷信不断针对包含大学生在内的青年群体开展全方位、多样化的金融知识普及活动，并通过与国内顶级院校合作发动创新实践大赛等多种形式潜移默化对年轻群体的消费需求进行合理引导,帮助其树立理性消费观念,合理规划消费需求,进而为其累积人生财富助力。
test: In recent years, Jingdong has continuously carried out comprehensive and diversified financial knowledge promotion activities for young people, including university students, through various forms such as full-scale, multi-faceted activities, and has been able to guide the rational consumption needs of young people through various forms such as innovative practice competitions.

src: 双十二到来之际，捷信提醒所有消费者朋友树立合理的消费意识和正确的金钱观，抵制盲目消费和过度消费，规避消费借贷误区，以免影响个人征信以及今后的经济生活。
test: On the occasion of the coming of the Double 12, Jiexin reminds all consumers to establish reasonable consumption concepts and correct money concepts, resist blind consumption and excessive consumption, avoid consumption borrowing and avoiding consumption, so as not to affect personal credit and future economic life.

src: 消费时一定要提前规划，量力而为按时还款。
test: Consumption time must be planned in advance, and the amount of money must be calculated in time to pay back on time.

src: 如果逾期，逾期记录将记录到个人信用报告中，可能会对日后买车、购房等经济生活造成不良影响。
test: If you are late, the late record will be recorded in your personal credit report, which may have a negative impact on your future car purchase, housing purchase and other economic life.

src: 与此同时，在享受金融产品和服务时，还应选择正规机构及渠道，并注意查验相关机构是否具备经营资质。
test: At the same time, when enjoying financial products and services, you should also choose regular institutions and channels, and pay attention to checking whether the relevant institutions have the operating qualifications.

src: 未来，捷信将一如既往凭借其成熟、可靠的消费金融体系和不断更新迭代的金融产品，为消费者带来更贴合需求和多元化的服务，不断助力大众提升金融知识水平，帮助消费者培养理性消费、适度借贷的理念，做消费者终生可信赖的消费金融伙伴。
test: In the future, Jiexin will continue to rely on its mature, reliable consumer finance system and constantly updated and iterated financial products to provide consumers with more in line with their needs and diverse services, helping consumers to continuously improve their financial knowledge, and helping consumers to develop the concept of rational consumption and moderate borrowing.

test: Vietnam News Agency - ASEAN-China cooperation should be strengthened to face common challenges

src: 沙特王储穆罕默德·本·萨勒曼的停留站包括阿曼、阿拉伯联合酋长国（阿联酋 ） 、 卡塔尔、巴林和科威特。
test: The stopover of Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman of Saudi Arabia includes Oman, the United Arab Emirates (UAE), Qatar, Bahrain and Kuwait.

src: 值得注意的是，这是自沙特阿拉伯及其阿拉伯盟友于 2017 年年中对卡塔尔实施禁运，导致海湾外交危机以来，穆罕默德王储首次访问卡塔尔。
test: It is worth noting that this is the first time since the Saudi-led Arab coalition imposed a blockade on Qatar in 2017 that Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman has visited Qatar.

src: 在这场危机中，沙特阿拉伯、阿联酋、巴林和埃及断绝了与卡塔尔的外交关系，并对其实施全面禁运，指责卡塔尔支持恐怖组织，同时与伊朗有着密切关系。
test: In this crisis, Saudi Arabia, the United Arab Emirates, Bahrain and Egypt have cut off diplomatic relations with Qatar and imposed a full embargo on it, accusing Qatar of supporting terrorist organizations, and having close ties with Iran.

src: 外交紧张严重影响了海合会的内部团结，对该地区国家的经济产生了负面影响。
test: The tense situation in international relations has seriously affected the internal unity of the meeting, and has a negative impact on the economy of the region.

src: 四个阿拉伯国家封锁了通往卡塔尔的陆海空路线。
test: Four Arab countries have closed off land, sea and air routes to Qatar.

src: 这场危机仅在 2021 年 1 月的海湾合作委员会峰会上得到解决，各海湾国家签署了一项由美国和科威特调解迈向“团结与稳定”的协议。
test: This crisis will be resolved at the Gulf Cooperation Council summit in January 2021, and the countries of the Gulf have signed an agreement mediated by the United States and Kuwait to move towards "unity and stability".

src: 沙特阿拉伯重新开放了与卡塔尔的边界。
test: Saudi Arabia reopened its border with Qatar.

src: 沙特阿拉伯和埃及正在通过两国在卡塔尔任命了新大使率先努力恢复与卡塔尔的关系。
test: Saudi Arabia and Egypt are working to appoint new ambassadors to Qatar to restore relations with Qatar.

src: 海湾阿拉伯国家化解分歧，以恢复与卡塔尔的关系出自于为各国的利益和地区稳定而必须团结起来的要求，旨在应对共同挑战。
test: The Gulf Arab countries have resolved their differences and restored relations with Qatar in order to meet the common interests and stability of the region.

src: 此次沙特王储访问阿曼期间，双方同意开通了两个海湾邻国间第一条直接陆路通道。
test: During the visit of Saudi Crown Prince to Oman, both sides agreed to open the first direct land route between the two Gulf countries.

src: 连接两国长达725公里长的通道将为两国公民的出行和整合供应链提供便利条件。
test: The 725-kilometer long channel connecting the two countries will provide convenient conditions for the travel and supply chain integration of the two peoples.

src: 沙特阿拉伯公共投资基金 (PIF)将在阿曼投入50亿美元，两国企业签署了价值为300亿美元的13份合作谅解备忘录。
test: Saudi Arabia's Public Investment Fund (PIF) will invest $50 billion in Oman, and 13 agreements worth $300 billion were signed between the two countries.

src: 沙特王储对海湾国家访问之行恰逢伊朗与世界各大国就挽救名为《联合全面行动计划 》 （ JCPOA）的伊朗核协议 — — 一项海湾阿拉伯国家因认为无法解决与伊朗导弹问题而谴责的协议进行谈判。
test: Saudi Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman’s visit to the Gulf countries coincided with the talks between Iran and the world’s major countries to save the Joint Comprehensive Plan of Action (JCPOA) — a nuclear deal that the Gulf Arab countries believe cannot solve the problem of Iran’s missiles.

src: 各海湾国家一直将伊朗视为长期的“竞争对手 ” ， 并将伊朗的核计划视为对地区安全的“威胁 ” 。
test: All the countries around the Persian Gulf have always viewed Iran as a long-term "competitor" and Iran's nuclear program as a "threat" to regional security.

src: 各海湾国家认为，不解决伊朗导弹问题，不采取行动来遏制伊朗在该地区的活动是有缺陷的。
test: All the countries in the Gulf region believe that if the Iranian missile problem is not resolved, and if no action is taken to curb Iran's activities in the region, there will be a shortcoming.

src: 在各大国与伊朗核谈判未能满足各海湾国家愿望的背景下，沙特阿拉伯与伊朗进行了直接谈判。
test: In the background of the failure to meet the expectations of the Gulf countries in the nuclear talks with major countries, Saudi Arabia and Iran have held direct talks.

src: 其目标是遏制该地区紧张局势的升级。
test: Its goal is to contain the escalation of tension in the region.

src: 这是减缓海湾合作委员会国家经济增长的因素之一。
test: This is one of the factors that contribute to the economic growth of the Gulf Cooperation Council countries.

src: 即将举行的海合会峰会将是自从一些成员国与卡塔尔的争议结束以来海合会国家的首次峰会。
test: The upcoming Gulf Cooperation Council summit will be the first since some member states and Qatar ended their dispute.

src: 这是海湾合作委员会重新评估为促进恢复海合会统一作出贡献的外交成果的机会，同时提出各项措施，使其成员国充分合作，以应对共同挑战，为海湾国家的稳定与发展作出贡献。
test: This is an opportunity for the Gulf Cooperation Council to re-evaluate the results of its efforts to promote the GCC's unified contribution to the international community in the wake of the recent developments in the region. At the same time, it is an opportunity to propose measures to ensure that the member states work together to address common challenges and contribute to the stability and development of the Gulf region.

src: 让大学精神与时代精神同频共振-新华网
test: Let the university spirit and the spirit of the times resonate at the same frequency

src: 所谓大学精神，是指一所大学在发展过程中长期积淀形成的一系列办学理念和价值追求，是大学的灵魂所在。
test: The so-called university spirit, refers to a long-term accumulation of a series of university management concepts and values pursuit in the process of development, is the soul of the university.

src: 从古至今，大学精神对于政治、经济、文化、科技、社会的发展，乃至一个民族的进步均至关重要。
test: From ancient times to the present, the spirit of university has played an important role in the development of politics, economy, culture, science and technology, and the progress of a nation.

src: 从世界第一所现代意义上的大学诞生起，大学就肩负起不同于其他社会组织的独特使命，对于我国大学来说，兴起于民族危难之秋，其精神更是深受传统文化和时代变迁的影响，倡导“明德济世，修齐治平”的价值理念和“兴学强国”的爱国主义担当。
test: From the first modern university in the world, the university has borne a unique mission different from other social organizations. For China's universities, it was born in the autumn of national crisis, and its spirit was deeply influenced by traditional culture and the changes of the times, advocating the value concept of "cultivating virtue and benefiting the world" and the patriotic mission of "strengthening the country through education".

src: 当前，高等教育信息化、国际化趋势日益明显，全球范围的教育竞争、科技竞争、人才竞争不断加剧，高等教育事业作为重要的“供给侧 ” ， 其结构性改革正面临前所未有的机遇和挑战。
test: The current trend of informationization and internationalization of higher education is becoming more and more obvious, the global competition of education, technology and talent is constantly intensifying, and the higher education industry as an important "supply side" is facing unprecedented opportunities and challenges in its structural reform.

src: 尤其是《统筹推进世界一流大学和一流学科建设总体方案》的提出，在展示了我国从高等教育大国向高等教育强国迈进的信心和决心的同时，更是对大学发展提出了更高更新的要求。
test: In particular, the proposal to advance the construction of world-class universities and world-class disciplines in the "General Plan for the Coordinated Development of World-Class Universities and World-Class Disciplines" has shown our country's confidence and determination in advancing from a great power in higher education to a strong power in higher education. At the same time, it also puts forward higher and more stringent requirements for university development.

src: 如何在较短时间内努力跻身世界一流行列，在仍有一定差距的基础上加快建成若干所世界一流大学和一批世界一流学科，实现“弯道超车 ” ？
test: How to quickly climb to the world's first-class ranks in a short time, while still having a certain gap, to build a few world-class universities and a batch of world-class disciplines, to achieve "bending the car"?

src: 除了坚定目标自信、路径自信、能力自信，高校还应当充分发挥三种优势：一是后发优势，通过持续引进海外杰出学术人才，学习借鉴世界一流大学的先进经验，实现学术水平和办学质量的显著提升；二是文化优势，继承中华文明在五千年积淀的智慧内涵，弘扬发展优秀传统文化，以此来凝聚力量、塑造品牌、提升形象；三是制度优势，发挥社会主义国家的制度优越性，强化目标驱动，汇集共识合力，优化资源配置，为学校加速赶超世界先进水平提供可持续的坚实保障。
test: Besides determination, self-confidence, confidence in the path, confidence in the ability, the university should also fully play three advantages: one is the advantage of late, through continuous introduction of outstanding academic talents from abroad, learn from the advanced experience of world-class universities, to achieve significant improvement in academic level and management quality; two is cultural advantage, inherit the wisdom of five thousand years of accumulation of Chinese civilization, to promote the development of excellent traditional culture, thus to gather strength, shape the brand, improve the image; three is the advantage of the system, to play the advantage of socialist countries, to promote the goal-oriented, gather consensus, optimize resource allocation, provide sustainable support

src: 特别要意识到，建设世界一流大学不可能千校一面，各个学校在发挥优势的同时，必须彰显个性和特色。
test: It is particularly important to realize that the construction of world-class universities cannot be achieved by one-sided development of all universities. Each university should play to its strengths and highlight its unique characteristics.

src: 办学特色既要有共性的中国特色，也要体现各自独特的目标定位、办学传统和资源禀赋。
test: The school’s educational characteristics should have both common Chinese characteristics and unique characteristics of each school.

src: 就浙江大学而言，我们在办学中注重突出三个方面的特色：一是突出创新创业人才培养特色，构建科教融合、校企结合的整合育人环境，形成全链条的创业教育生态系统；二是突出学科交叉会聚特色，推动学科体系的优化调整，营造学科交叉的制度环境，积极培育交叉新兴学科和标志性交叉成果；三是突出办学体系和社会服务特色，开展深度国际交流合作，加快形成泛浙大产学研合作体系。
test: In terms of Zhejiang University, we attach great importance to three aspects of specialty: first, we emphasize the cultivation of innovative and entrepreneurial talents, build an integrated environment for the integration of education and industry, and form a whole chain of entrepreneurial education ecology; second, we emphasize the gathering of interdisciplinary academic exchanges, promote the optimization and adjustment of academic systems, and build a systematic environment for interdisciplinary academic exchanges; third, we emphasize the construction of the system and social service characteristics, deepen international exchanges and cooperation, and accelerate the formation of a comprehensive cooperation system between Zhejiang University

src: 在这个过程中，尤为重要的是，要始终坚守大学精神，让大学精神与时代精神同频共振。
test: In this process, it is especially important to always maintain the university spirit, so that the university spirit and the spirit of the times can resonate at the same frequency.

src: 对于浙江大学来说 ， “ 求是创新”校训 ， “ 勤学、修德、明辨、笃实”共同价值观以及“海纳江河、启真厚德、开物前民、树我邦国”共同构成了浙大精神的最新表述体系。
test: For Zhejiang University, the motto “Seeking Truth from Facts” and the common values of “Study Hard, Be Good, Distinguish Right from Wrong, and Be Practical” constitute the latest expression system of the spirit of Zhejiang University.

src: 这是学校坚持正确办学方向，不断积累文化高度、凝聚精神力量的重要保障，内涵丰富，意义深远。
test: This is the school's insistence on the correct direction of education, and constantly accumulate cultural height, concentrate spiritual power, which is an important guarantee.

src: 其中 ， “ 海纳江河”强调的是开放包容精神，体现以“天下英才为我所用”的胸怀，表现为汲取世界名校办学育人的优质理念 ； “ 启真厚德”强调的是求真至善精神，指的是大学在追求真理的同时，更当领受德行的陶冶和人格的砥砺 ； “ 开物前民”体现的是改革创新精神，既包含知识的求新，科研的创新，又表现为改革发展，革故鼎新 ； “ 树我邦国”强调的是爱国奉献精神，讲的是大学应当始终与民族命运同荣共辱。
test: The motto of the university is “Seeking Truth from Facts” and “Seeking Truth from Facts” is the spirit of the university. The motto of the university is “Seeking Truth from Facts” and “Seeking Truth from Facts” is the spirit of the university. The motto of the university is “Seeking Truth from Facts” and “Seeking Truth from Facts” is the spirit of the university. src: 这一系列精神理念和价值追求，正是浙江大学120年办学的灵魂所在。
test: This series of spiritual concepts and values pursuit, is the soul of Zhejiang University 120 years of teaching.

src: 新华社北京12月11日电 12月11日，国家主席习近平向2021年大湾区科学论坛致贺信。
test: 12/11/2021, President Xi Jinping sent a congratulatory letter to the 2021 Sino-German Science Forum.

src: 习近平指出，当今世界正经历百年未有之大变局，全球科技创新进入密集活跃期，新一轮科技革命和产业变革对全球经济结构产生了深刻影响。
test: Xi Jinping pointed out that the world is currently experiencing a century-long great change, and global technological innovation has entered a concentrated active period. The new round of technological revolution and industrial transformation has brought profound changes to the global economic structure.

src: 粤港澳大湾区要围绕建设国际科技创新中心战略定位，努力建设全球科技创新高地，推动新兴产业发展。
test: The Guangdong-Hong Kong-Macao Greater Bay Area should formulate a strategic positioning for the construction of an international science and technology innovation center, strive to build a global science and technology innovation highland, and promote the development of new industries.

src: 中国愿同世界各国科学家、国际科技组织一道，密切国际科技交流合作，加强重大科学问题研究，促进共性科学技术破解，深化重点科学项目协作，共同推进世界科学事业发展，更好造福人类。
test: China is willing to work with scientists and international organizations around the world, to strengthen international scientific and technological exchanges and cooperation, to promote the breakthrough of major scientific issues, to promote the development of world science and technology, and to better benefit mankind.

src: 2021年大湾区科学论坛当日在广东省广州市开幕，主题为“探索未来，共享科学 ” ， 由广东省人民政府主办。
test: The 2021 Guangdong Science Forum was held in Guangzhou, Guangdong Province, China on December 18, 2021. The theme of the forum is "Exploring the Future, Sharing Science". The forum was hosted by the Guangdong Provincial Government.

src: 广西大学生休学创业年限最长可达５年-新华网
test: Guangxi University students can take up to 5 years to study entrepreneurship - Xinhua Net

src: 新华社南宁５月１９日专电（记者张莺）记者近日从广西壮族自治区教育厅获悉，今后广西各高校将实施弹性学制，放宽大学生休学年限，在校生休学创业的年限在原有学制基础上可延长２至５年，休学创业时间可视为实践教育时间。
test: Xinhua News Agency, Nanning, May 19 (reporter Zhao Li) reporter recently from the Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region Education Department learned that in the future, Guangxi universities will implement flexible study, relax the university students' vacation year limit, and the vacation period for students to start a business can be extended by 2 to 5 years, and the vacation period for students to start a business can be seen as practical education time.

src: 为促进大学生创业创新能力提升，广西教育、人社等部门合力搭建创业平台，建设更多大学生校外实践教学基地、大学科技园、大学生创业园、创业孵化基地等，给大学生创业提供外在保障。
test: To promote the improvement of the innovation and entrepreneurship ability of university students, the education, human resources and other departments of Guangxi have jointly built an entrepreneurship platform, and have built more university student entrepreneurship bases outside the school, such as university science and technology parks, university student entrepreneurship parks, entrepreneurship incubation bases, etc., to provide external protection for university student entrepreneurship.

src: 根据要求，到２０２０年，各高校创新创业实践基地面积，本科学校要达到３０００平方米以上，高职学校要达到２０００平方米以上。
test: According to the requirements, by 2020, the area of each university's innovation and entrepreneurship practice base should reach 3,000 square meters for undergraduate schools and 2,000 square meters for vocational schools.

src: 政府鼓励高校设立创新创业学分，优先支持在创新创业实践中表现优异的学生转专业。
test: The government encourages universities to establish innovation and entrepreneurship credits, and gives priority to supporting students who perform well in innovation and entrepreneurship practice.

src: 高校教师每两年要至少有两个月到行业企业挂职锻炼，以此提高教师创新创业教育的意识和能力。
test: Teachers in colleges and universities should have at least two months of internship in the industry every two years to enhance their awareness and ability to innovate and entrepreneurship education.

src: 自治区教育厅要求广西各高校深入实施大学生创新创业训练计划，力争使每一名大学生在校期间都参与一项创新创业训练计划。
test: The Department of Education of Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region requires all universities in Guangxi to deeply implement the plan of training college students in innovation and entrepreneurship, and strive to make every college student participate in an innovation and entrepreneurship training program during their college life.

src: 高校要积极组织学生参加各级各类创新创业竞赛，并给予经费支持。
test: The school should actively organize students to participate in various innovation and entrepreneurship competitions at all levels, and provide financial support.

src: NEWS GOV-MO: 澳大向7位杰出人士颁授荣誉博士学位
test: NEWS GOV-MO: 7 distinguished persons awarded honorary doctorate degrees by the University of Adelaide

src: 澳门大学今（11）日举行“2021年荣誉学位及高等学位颁授典礼 ＂ ， 向刘遵义、陈凯先、中村修二、李兰娟、李效良、朱丽兰及江朝晖颁授澳大荣誉博士学位，以表彰其卓越成就、为社会和教育的发展所作出的重大贡献。
test: The University of Macau held the 2021 Honorary Doctorate and Higher Degree Conferment Ceremony on November 11, 2021, to confer honorary doctorates on Liu Zhixiang, Chen Kai, Nakamura Shigeru, Li Lanjun, Li Yulang, Zhu Liran and Xiong Aoxiang, and confer honorary master’s degrees on Liu Zhixiang, Chen Kai, Nakamura Shigeru, Li Lanjun, Li Yulang, Zhu Liran and Xiong Aoxiang.

src: 颁授典礼上，行政长官兼澳大校监代表、社会文化司司长欧阳瑜在澳大校董会主席林金城、澳大校长宋永华陪同下颁授荣誉博士学位。
test: At the conferment ceremony, the Chief Executive, Mr C Y Leung, and the Vice-Chancellor, Professor Timothy W Tong, presented the Honorary Doctor of Laws degrees to the recipients.

src: 刘遵义教授获颁荣誉教育博士学位、陈凯先教授获颁荣誉理学博士学位、中村修二教授获颁荣誉理学博士学位、李兰娟教授获颁荣誉理学博士学位、李效良教授获颁荣誉工商管理博士学位、朱丽兰教授获颁荣誉理学博士学位，江朝晖女士获颁荣誉理学博士学位。
test: Professor Liu Zunyi was awarded the honorary doctorate of education, Professor Chen Kai was awarded the honorary doctorate of science, Professor Chinen Mitsuji was awarded the honorary doctorate of science, Professor Li Lanqing was awarded the honorary doctorate of science, Professor Li Yingliang was awarded the honorary doctorate of business administration, Ms. Zhu Lilian was awarded the honorary doctorate of science.

src: 欧阳瑜致辞时首先向获颁发荣誉博士学位的七位杰出人士，表示热烈的祝贺并致以崇高的敬意，他们分别在不同的领域取得非凡的成就，为国家的发展和世界的进步作出了卓越的贡献；同时，欧阳瑜向毕业生和家长表达最真挚的祝福，也向大学爱岗敬业、学术精湛的教职员团队致以由衷的敬意。
test: First of all, I would like to express my sincere congratulations to the seven distinguished scholars who have been awarded honorary doctorates. I wish them all the best in their future endeavors.

src: 澳大人文学院讲座教授孙艺风宣读刘遵义赞辞时表示，刘遵义教授是一位享誉全球的经济学家，以其卓越的学术成就和前瞻性的教育理念而闻名。
test: Professor Xuefeng Sun, Dean of the College of Humanities at the University of Adelaide, read the eulogy at the funeral of Professor Liu Zongyi, a renowned economist. He said that Professor Liu was a world-renowned economist, and his outstanding academic achievements and forward-looking educational concepts were well-known.

src: 除了在经济发展、经济增长及东亚经济领域取得的成就外，他还是一位富有远见的教育领导者。
test: Besides the achievements in economic development, economic growth and East Asian economic area, he is also a visionary leader in education.

src: 简而言之，他在众多领域都有杰出建树。
test: In short, he has made outstanding achievements in many fields.

src: 孙艺风宣读中村修二赞辞时表示，中村修二教授是可持续能源技术的先驱者。
test: Sun Yefeng read the speech of Professor Chikuma Shuji at the ceremony of the award of the 2012 International Energy Agency Award for Sustainable Energy.

src: 他因发明蓝色发光二极管（LED）而成为2014年诺贝尔物理学奖的三位获奖者之一。
test: He became one of the three winners of the 2014 Nobel Prize in Physics for inventing the blue light-emitting diode (LED).

src: 中村教授的发明不仅彻底改变了照明行业，更推动产生了如今广泛应用于日常生活和工业生产的白色发光二极管，为人类的福祉做出了巨大的贡献。
test: Professor Chung's invention not only revolutionized the lighting industry, but also led to the development of white light-emitting diodes, which are now widely used in daily life and industrial production. It has made a great contribution to the well-being of humanity.

src: 孙艺风宣读李兰娟赞辞时表示，李兰娟教授作为中国人工肝事业的开拓者，创建独特有效的李氏人工肝系统，治疗重型肝炎肝衰竭获重大突破，显著降低肝衰竭的病死率。
test: Sun Yifeng read the speech of Li Lanjian, who is a pioneer in the field of Chinese liver transplantation. Li Lanjian, a professor, has made outstanding contributions to the development of Chinese liver transplantation. She has established a unique and effective Li system, which has achieved remarkable breakthroughs in the treatment of severe liver failure and liver failure. The mortality rate has been significantly reduced.

src: 在这次新冠肺炎抗击战中，她和团队所提出的“四抗二平衡”方案及带去的人工肝、微生态和干细胞三大技术，显著提高了重症救治率。
test: In this new coronavirus epidemic, she and her team proposed the "four-fighting, two-balancing" plan, and brought in artificial liver, microbial and stem cell technologies, significantly improving the rate of severe treatment.

src: 孙艺风宣读李效良赞辞时表示，李效良教授为运营管理的创新研究奠定了基础，塑造了供应链理论和实践的思维方式，并彻底改变了世界各地的商业模式。
test: Sun Yifeng, the president of the China Supply Chain Management Association, read the speech of Professor Li Xiaolong at the award ceremony of the 2019 China Supply Chain Management Award. He said that Professor Li Xiaolong laid a solid foundation for the innovative research of supply chain management, and created a new thinking mode for supply chain management and practice. He also changed the business model of the world.

src: 李效良因普及运筹管理中的长鞭效应概念而闻名，并探索了应对这种现象的措施。
test: Li Xiaolong is famous for promoting the concept of long whip effect in the field of supply chain management and exploring measures to deal with it.

src: 如今，各国在疫情及紧张的经济局势下，长鞭效应愈发突显，引发供应链严重破坏。
test: In the current situation of the epidemic and the tense economic situation, the long tail effect is becoming more and more obvious, which seriously damages the supply chain.

src: 李效良具有远见的研究如雪中送炭，帮助行业应对困境，从而带来巨大的社会价值。
test: Li Xiaoliang has a far-sighted research like sending charcoal in the snow, helping the industry to face the difficulties, and bringing great social value.

src: 孙艺风宣读朱丽兰赞辞时表示，在科研工作中，她发现了一种突破性和创新的染色技术用于制备样品，在国内外科技同行中享有较高声誉。
test: When she was reading the speech of the late Dr. Zhu Li Lan, she said that in her research work, she found a breakthrough and innovative dyeing technology for preparing samples, which is highly praised by her peers at home and abroad.

src: 她以非凡的科技成就荣膺国际欧亚科学院院士等重要荣誉称号，以自己辉煌的业绩为自己在世界科技圣殿赢得了应有的崇高地位。
test: She has been awarded the title of International Academy of Science and Engineering Fellow for her outstanding achievements in science and technology.

src: 澳大中华医药研究院代院长陈新宣读陈凯先赞辞时表示，陈凯先教授从事药物研发40余载，杰出的科学成就以及对国家、澳门、澳门大学、国家重点实验室的重要贡献使其拥有崇高的国际地位和声望。
test: The President of the Chinese-Australian Pharmaceutical Research Institute, Chen Xin, read the speech of the late Professor Chen Kai at the inauguration ceremony of the Institute. Professor Chen Kai has been engaged in drug research for more than 40 years, and his outstanding scientific achievements and contributions to the country, Macao, the University of Macau, and the National Key Laboratory have made him a highly respected figure in the international community.

src: 他对澳门和大湾区中医药事业发展的积极推动作用充分体现了其为国家医药发展战略奉献的使命感。
test: He has made an active contribution to the development of traditional Chinese medicine in Macao and the Greater Bay Area.

src: 澳大科技学院院长须成忠宣读江朝晖赞辞时表示，江朝晖女士参与研发的重大发明和专利，至今累积超过15项与存储虚拟化、导航、文件系统和电源管理相关，无不实用性高，使用广泛，提升人类生活便利度。
test: The president of the Australian Academy of Science, Professor Chunhong Su, read out the citation for the 2019 Prime Minister's Prize for Science at the ceremony in Canberra on 21 November.

src: 作为卓有成就的发明家，江女士往往能把高深的科技和理论化繁为简，普及大众。
test: As a distinguished inventor, Ms. Jiang is often able to simplify the profound technology and theory into simple and popular.

src: 最后，陈凯先作为荣誉博士代表宣读谢辞。
test: Finally, Dr. Chen Kai, as the representative of the honorary doctor, read the speech of thanks.

src: 他很高兴看到澳门及大湾区的医药事业树立了一个良好的典范：从澳大建立的第一个中药质量研究国家重点实验室到大湾区中医药的蓬勃发展，澳大在整合大湾区中医药领域优秀人才中贡献了巨大作用。
test: He is very happy to see that Macau and the Greater Bay Area have established a good benchmark in the medical and health industry: from the establishment of the first national key laboratory for traditional Chinese medicine quality research in Macao to the booming development of traditional Chinese medicine in the Greater Bay Area, Macao has made great contributions in integrating the outstanding talents in the field of traditional Chinese medicine in the Greater Bay Area.

src: 此外，他认为澳大的管理团队拥有远见卓识，不仅在学术上为学生提供科研沃土，同时为社会输送了许多拥有责任心的人才。
test: In addition, he believes that the management team of the University of Australia has far-sighted wisdom, not only in academic research, but also in social output of a large number of people with a sense of responsibility.

src: 他很荣幸能跟澳大展开交流与合作，并对澳大近年取得的成就表示由衷祝贺。
test: He is very honored to have the opportunity to exchange and cooperate with the University of Australia, and he sincerely congratulates the University of Australia on its recent achievements.

test: Does he have the correct address?

test: I haven't seen it yet.
