src: 在NFT火速出圈之时，加密社区又冒出了一个新概念。
test: At the time of NFTs going viral, the cryptocurrency community has come up with a new concept.

src: 2021年，一款名为《Axie Infinity》的区块链游戏在东南亚地区产生了巨大影响，一些因疫情失去了工作机会的居民开始在这款游戏中获得稳定收入。
test: In 2021, a blockchain game called “Axie Infinity” had a huge impact in Southeast Asia, and some people who lost their jobs due to the epidemic began to earn stable income in this game.

src: 《Axie Infinity》是一款以区块链技术为底层的宠物养成游戏，集合了NFT在内的多种玩法，是目前交易额最高的NFT项目，截止目前已超过30亿美元。
test: Axie Infinity is a blockchain-based game that combines NFTs and gameplay, with a trading volume of over $30 billion.

src: TokenTerminal 数据显示，Axie Infinity 日收入超过 820 万美元，直逼《王者荣耀》。
test: TokenTerminal Data shows that Axie Infinity's daily income exceeds 820 million US dollars, surpassing Honor of Kings.

src: 今年8月6日，Axie Infinity官方称其日活用户已超100万。
test: On August 6, 2021, Axie Infinity announced that its daily active users had exceeded 100,000.

src: 《Axie Infinity》的火热将一种新的“palytoearn”模式传递给更多人，通过区块链与智能合约的帮助，玩家不再是单一的角色，除了能从游戏里获得乐趣及经济收益以外，还可以参与到游戏生态的治理之中。
test: The hotness of “Axie Infinity” will spread a new “playtoearn” mode to more people, through the help of blockchain and smart contracts, players are no longer single roles, in addition to being able to get fun and economic benefits from the game, they can also participate in the governance of the game ecosystem.

src: 这种主体性并不由游戏制作方授予，而是由区块链技术保证。
test: This is not a game-producing body, but a guarantee by blockchain technology.

src: 看到一则关于朋友股价的新闻，我最大的感触是企业在赛道的选择，也就是指投资标的行业的选择，首先要选择成长空间大的行业，至少1000亿以上的市场规模；其次，要选择未来增长性好的行业，考虑在未来3-5年后行业增长性达到最佳状态的行业；最后，要选择有政策扶持的行业。
test: When I saw a news about a friend's stock, my biggest feeling was the choice of enterprises on the track, that is, the choice of investment industries, first of all, choose the industry with a large growth space, at least 1000 billion yuan; secondly, choose the future growth industry, consider the industry in the future 3-5 years later; finally, choose the industry with policy support.

src: 赛道有多宽指的是市场规模，赛道有多长指的是行业所处发展阶段，赛道是平坦还是崎岖指的是行业的竞争格局。
test: The width of the race track refers to the scale of the market, the length of the race track refers to the stage of industry development, and the race track is flat or hilly refers to the competitive situation of the industry.

src: 为对的赛道加油！
test: Let's go for the right track!

src: 新的一年，第一件事是总结2021 调整2022战术布局。
test: The first thing in the new year is to summarize the 2021 strategy adjustment and adjust the 2022 tactical layout.

src: 战术在于“do the things right”，也就是把事做对。
test: The strategy is to “do the things right”, which means to do things right.

src: 而战略在于“do the right thing”,也就是做正确的事。
test: The strategy is to “do the right thing”, which is to do the right thing.

src: 战略在于找方向，战术在于落地，在大多数战术思考之上，都有战略思考的空间。
test: Strategy is to find direction, tactics is to land, in most tactical thinking, there is still a strategic thinking space.

src: 比如如何增加顾客数（战术思维）之上，可以思考是在当前领域持续深化还是横向领域延展（战略思维）；比如提升顾客留存率（战术思维）之上，可以思考如何提升核心顾客和高价值顾客的留存率（战略思维）；在提升活动参与度（战术思维）之上，可以考虑如何设置正确的活动KPI，达到正确的活动目标，比如提升目标顾客参与度、激活高价值沉默客、精准拉新；在提升DAU（战术思维）之上，可以考虑目前的增长是否健康可持续。
test: How to increase customer numbers (tactical thinking) above, you can think about whether to continue to deepen the current field (strategic thinking); how to improve the retention rate of core customers and high-value customers (strategic thinking); in the improvement of participation rate (tactical thinking), you can consider how to set up the correct KPI, to achieve the correct activity goals, such as increasing the participation rate of target customers, activating silent high-value customers, and precision recruitment; in the improvement of DAU (tactical thinking), you can consider whether the current growth is healthy and sustainable.

src: 诞生12年，比特币在2021年迎来了几个里程碑事件。
test: Bitcoin was born 12 years ago, and in 2021, it has achieved several milestones.

src: 9月7日，中美洲小国萨尔瓦多将比特币定为法定货币，这是比特币第一次成为一个国家或地区的法定货币。
test: On September 7, 2018, the small country of Central America, El Salvador, will declare Bitcoin as legal tender, which is the first time Bitcoin has become a legal tender of a country or region.

src: 10月12日，美国证监会八年来首次批准ProShares公司推出比特币ETF，并在纽约证券交易所上市，这标志着第一支合规的比特币期货ETF登陆美国资本市场，加密货币投资敞口的再次扩大。
test: On October 12, 2021, the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission approved the first Bitcoin ETF in eight years, and the ProShares Bitcoin ETF was listed on the New York Stock Exchange, marking the first regulated Bitcoin ETF in the United States. This means that the investment in cryptocurrencies has been further expanded.

src: 2021年11月14日比特币进行了一次名为“Taproot”的软分叉升级，该升级提高了比特币网络交易的匿名性，且通过改变区块本身的数据结构来减少交易中的数据负担。
test: On November 14, 2021, Bitcoin underwent a soft fork upgrade called "Taproot", which increased the anonymity of Bitcoin network transactions and reduced the data burden of transactions by changing the data structure of blocks.

src: 美亚裔团体投诉耶鲁等3所常春藤名校招生歧视-新华网
test: Chinese-American groups sue Ivy League schools over discrimination in admissions-Xinhua

src: 新华社华盛顿５月２３日电（记者徐剑梅）美国１３０多个亚裔团体２３日向美国教育部和司法部提交申诉，抗议３所常春藤名校 — — 耶鲁大学、布朗大学和达特茅斯学院在招生过程中歧视亚裔申请学生。
test: Xinhua, Washington, May 23 (Reporter Xu Jianmei) More than 130 Asian American groups in the United States submitted a petition to the U.S. Department of Education and the Justice Department on May 23, protesting against three Ivy League universities - Yale University, Brown University and Dartmouth College - in the admission process. Discrimination against Asian American applicants.

src: 牵头发起申诉的亚裔教育联盟当天在华盛顿召开新闻发布会。
test: The Asian American Education League, which initiated the lawsuit, held a press conference in Washington on the day of the lawsuit.

src: 该团体主席赵宇空在发布会上说，过去１０年里，符合美国名校录取条件的亚裔申请人数量成倍增长，但在这３所美国名校中，亚裔所占比例基本维持在同一水平。
test: The president of the organization Zhao Yuchun said at the press conference that in the past ten years, the number of Asian applicants who meet the admission criteria of American universities has increased by ten times, but in these three American universities, the proportion of Asians has basically remained at the same level.

src: 许多研究表明，这些高校在所谓“综合考量”的招生过程中 ， “ 长期持续性以及系统化地歧视亚裔申请学生 ” 。
test: Many studies have shown that these universities in the so-called "comprehensive consideration" of the admission process, "long-term and systematic discrimination against Asian applicants"

src: 赵宇空介绍说，２０１４年桑德斯等学者的研究显示，在这３所高校里，相对申请者人数，亚裔在所有族裔中录取率最低。
test: Zhao Yuchun introduced, in 2014, Sanders and other scholars found that in these three universities, the number of applicants, the Asian race is the lowest in the admission rate.

src: 美国教育部的数据也显示，在所有常春藤盟校中，布朗大学和达特茅斯学院对亚裔学生的录取比例最低，耶鲁大学和布朗大学对亚裔申请学生实施了事实上的种族配额达２０年以上。
test: Data from the U.S. Department of Education also shows that among all Ivy League schools, Brown University and Dartmouth College have the lowest admission rates for Asian students, while Yale University and Brown University have been practicing de facto racial quotas for more than 20 years.

src: 赵宇空告诉新华社记者，他们期望提交申诉后，美国教育部、司法部能够展开调查，并在认定事实后采取措施阻止这些高校继续在招生中歧视亚裔。
test: Zhao Yuchen told the reporter of Xinhua News Agency that they hope to submit an appeal after the investigation, and the US Department of Education and the Department of Justice can carry out an investigation and determine the facts after the investigation, and take measures to stop these universities from continuing to discriminate against Asian students in the admission process.

src: 他们也期望被投诉高校能够主动重视这一问题，改变对亚裔的招生政策。
test: They also hope that the universities can actively take this issue into consideration, and change the admission policy for Asian students.

src: 目前，被投诉的３所高校尚未作出回应。
test: As of now, the three schools have not responded to the complaints.

src: 亚裔教育联盟成立于２０１５年，当时曾投诉哈佛大学招生歧视，但美国教育部以程序理由未予受理。
test: The Asian American Education Alliance was founded in 2015, when it filed a complaint with the U.S. Department of Education against Harvard University for discriminating against Asian-American applicants. However, the U.S. Department of Education rejected the complaint on procedural grounds.

src: 此次参与申诉的除美国华裔团体外，还包括美国印度裔、韩裔、日裔、巴基斯坦裔教育团体。
test: This time, in addition to the Chinese American groups, the Indian American, Korean American, Japanese American and Pakistani American education groups also participated in the lawsuit.

src: 2020年9月，陆先生从房屋中介了解到一处位于浙江余姚丈亭镇的厂房，在多次现场看房后，陆先生决定购买该厂房。

src: 同年12月，陆先生就购买厂房的细节与房屋所有权人的家属林某进行磋商后，于当天通过银行转账汇款20万元作定金。
test: In December of the same year, Mr. Lu paid 200,000 yuan as a deposit to the owner of the factory building.

src: 林某在《厂房买卖定金收条》上作为收款人签名，其中载明，“若买方不想买此厂房，此定金归卖家，如卖方不愿意卖此厂房，定金将双倍返还卖方，双方约定一周内签订厂房买卖合同。”
test: Mr. Lin signed the “Factory House Sale and Purchase Agreement” as the payee, which stated that “If the buyer does not want to buy this factory house, the deposit will be returned to the seller. If the seller does not want to sell this factory house, the deposit will be doubled and returned to the seller. Both parties agreed to sign the factory house sale and purchase agreement within one week.”

src: 然而，之后双方因厂房出售范围、付款方式等主要合同条款未能形成一致意见，导致房屋买卖合同迟迟未能签订。
test: However, the two sides were unable to reach an agreement on the scope of the factory sale, the payment method, etc., which led to the delay in signing the house purchase contract.

src: 考虑到双方未能就合同内容达成共识，几天后，林某将20万元定金退回给了陆先生。
test: After several days of negotiation, Mr. Liu could not reach an agreement with Mr. Lu on the terms of the contract, so he returned the deposit of 20,000 yuan to Mr. Lu.

src: 好不容易看中的房子，定金交了，房款也准备好了，就差“临门一脚”签合同，卖方却不卖了，这让陆先生无奈又愤怒。
test: It is not easy to find a house that you like, and you have paid the deposit and the down payment. You have signed the contract, but the seller does not sell it. This makes Mr. Liang very angry.

src: 为此，陆先生将林某起诉至余姚市人民法院。
test: Therefore, Mr. Liu sued Mr. Lin to the People's Court of Yueyang City.

src: 法院经审理认为，双方最终未能签订正式合同，不能仅归责于被告，应合理推定为磋商不成，故本案不应适用定金罚则，被告无需承担双倍返还定金的违约责任。
test: The court held that the parties had not signed a formal contract, and the defendant could not be held responsible for the failure to sign a contract. src: 一审判决后，原告提起上诉。

src: 【律师提醒】 在交易过程中要尽到必要的审慎注意义务。

src: 在签订合同时，作为买方要尽到必要的审慎注意义务，比如，核实房屋所有权人信息、房屋是否被人占用等相关信息，并在合同中明确关于交付的具体时间、地点，以防履行合同时双方产生争议。
test: When signing a contract, as a buyer, you should be careful and cautious, such as verifying the information of the property owner, whether the property is occupied, etc. And clearly stipulate the specific time and place of delivery in the contract to avoid disputes when performing the contract.

src: （德国之声中文网 ） " 民主峰会"周五结束后，中国外交部发言人周六（12月11日）发表谈话表示，美国举办"领导人民主峰会 " ， 是"以意识形态划线，把民主工具化、武器化，假民主之名行反民主之实，煽动分裂对抗，转移国内矛盾 " 。
test: (German Voice of China) "Democracy Summit" ended on Friday, the Chinese Foreign Ministry spokesperson on Saturday (December 11) issued a statement saying, the United States held the "Leaders' Summit for Democracy," is "the ideological line, the democratic tool, the democratic weapon, the democratic name, the real anti-democratic, inciting division and confrontation, shifting domestic contradictions."

src: 中国政府认为 ， " 长期以来，美国将自己的政治制度和价值理念强加于人，推行'民主改造 ' ， 滥施单边制裁，策动'颜色革命 ' ， 造成灾难性后果。
test: The Chinese government believes that, "For a long time, the United States has forced its own political system and values on others, and has promoted 'democratic reform' by imposing unilateral sanctions, instigating 'color revolutions', and causing disastrous consequences.

src: '民主'早已成为美国干涉别国的'大规模杀伤性武器 ' 。
test: Democracy has long become the US's massive lethal weapon of interfering in other countries.

src: 此次峰会是拜登兑现其竞选承诺的行动。
test: This summit is Biden fulfilling his campaign promise.

src: 为期两天的会议以视频方式进行，全球111个国家领导人应邀与会，其中包括台湾领导人，但中国和俄罗斯没有受到邀请。
test: The two-day meeting was held via video conference, with 111 countries represented, including Taiwanese leaders, but China and Russia were not invited.

src: 峰会前夕，中国和俄罗斯就以美国自身民主出现问题抨击美国，称美国没有资格主持召开这样的峰会。
test: On the eve of the summit, China and Russia criticized the United States for the problems of democracy in the United States, saying that the United States has no right to host such a summit.

src: 而国际上和美国国内也有质疑声音，例如批评受邀与会的包括一些有威权专制倾向的领导人，比如菲律宾、波兰和巴西等国的领导人，有人怀疑拜登政府的真正意图并非为了民主而是为了地缘政治目的组织了这次峰会。
test: There are also doubts about the summit in the international community and in the United States, for example, criticism of the invitees including some authoritarian leaders with a tendency to hegemony, such as the leaders of the Philippines, Poland and Brazil, etc., some people doubt the true intention of the Biden administration in organizing the summit is not for democracy but for geopolitical purposes.

src: 刚上任的德国总理肖尔茨也参加了视频民主峰会
test: The newly appointed German Chancellor Scholz also attended the video democracy summit.

src: 中国外交部周六的声明称 ， " 今天的美式民主病态尽显，金钱政治、身份政治、政党对立、政治极化、社会撕裂、种族矛盾、贫富分化等问题愈演愈烈 " ， 美国的民主是建立在资本基础上的"富人游戏 " 。
test: The Chinese Foreign Ministry issued a statement on Saturday, saying that "today's American democracy is in a sick state, with money politics, identity politics, political polarization, political extremism, social division, racial discrimination, and wealth disparity becoming more and more serious." The democracy of the United States is built on the basis of capital and is a "game of the rich."

src: 美国总统拜登在发言中表示 ， " 作为政府的领导人，我们有责任倾听我们的公民，加固民主的护栏，推动改革，实现透明的问责治理，更能抵御专制的缓冲和冲击的力量，以及那些想在公共利益之前赤裸裸地追求权力的人 。 "
test: President Biden said in his speech, "As the leader of the government, we have the responsibility to listen to our citizens, strengthen the barriers of democracy, promote reforms, and achieve more transparent and accountable governance, which can better resist the buffering and impact of authoritarianism and those who seek power at the expense of the public interest."

src: 他强调，民主并不是想当然的 ， " 我们必须在每一代人当中不断更新它，在我看来，这是我们这个时代的决定性挑战 。 "
test: He stressed that democracy is not something that is taken for granted, "We must constantly update it in every generation, in my view, this is the decisive challenge of our time."

src: 拜登还说，全球民主及人权"面对持续且令人忧心的挑战之际，民主需要斗士来捍卫 " 。
test: Biden said, "Democracy and human rights around the world are facing persistent and worrying challenges. At this critical moment, democracy needs defenders."

src: 美国方面承诺，在本次民主峰会后，将展开为期一年的行动，包含一项金额4.244亿美元的倡议，以加强世界各地的民主，并对独立新闻媒体提供支持。
test: The United States has pledged to launch a one-year action plan, including a proposal worth $4.244 billion, to strengthen democracy around the world and support independent news media.

src: 美国希望各国在计划于2022年底举行的实体民主峰会前，作出具体的公开承诺，以改善其民主制度。
test: The United States hopes that each country will make specific public commitments before the end of 2022 to hold an in-person democracy summit, in order to improve its democratic system.

src: 拜登说 ， " 让我们所有国家都落实我们的承诺并在明年报告我们所取得的进展 " 。
test: Biden said, "Let's make sure that all countries implement our commitments and report on our progress next year."

src: 每个人的爱好不同，有人喜欢收藏，有人喜欢美食，当然也有人喜欢品酒，红牌威士忌是目前各个国家最畅销的苏格兰威士忌之一，而且红牌威士忌曾获国际洋酒大赛金奖。
test: Everyone has different hobbies, some people like collecting, some people like food, of course, there are also people who like wine, and red label whiskey is one of the most popular scotch whiskey in the world, and it has won the gold medal in the international wine competition.

src: 每一瓶红牌威士忌都有独特的味道，不过如果不知道如何品味它，岂不是糟蹋了它的醇香。
test: Every bottle of red label whiskey has its own unique flavor, but if you don't know how to taste it, you're wasting its fragrance.

src: 那么红牌威士忌怎么喝呢？
test: How to drink red label whiskey?

src: 小编为大家简单介绍下。
test: 小编为大家简单介绍下。

src: 红牌威士忌喝法：
test: How to drink red label whisky:

src: 尊尼获加红牌威士忌由约35种苏格兰威士忌调配而成，具有浓郁芳香及传统苏格兰威士忌的特质，浓郁芳香中带有甘甜及烟熏香味。
test: Johnnie Walker Red Label is a blended Scotch whisky produced by the Johnnie Walker whisky brand, owned by the Scottish company Diageo. It is the best-selling Scotch whisky in the world.

src: 入口浓醇清新，略带香草及浓烈的烟熏麦芽味道。
test: The nose is fresh and clean, with a hint of grass and a strong smell of malt.

src: 该酒可以直接加冰饮用，或者与最喜爱的饮品混合饮用。
test: This wine can be drunk directly with ice, or mixed with your favorite drink.

src: 红牌威士忌进入国内,为了适应国人的口味,红牌威士忌+可乐或雪碧或新奇士等气泡饮料成为一种经久不衰的时尚。
test: Red Label whisky has entered the Chinese market, in order to adapt to the taste of the Chinese people, Red Label whisky + Coca-Cola or Pepsi or 7-Up has become a fashion that lasts forever.

src: 这些甜味的饮料，除了可以中和酸味,在视觉上能给人带来愉悦，加入饮料,起到冲淡酒味改变口感的效果。
test: These sweet drinks, besides being able to neutralize the sour taste, can give people a pleasant feeling in visual, and add drinks to change the taste of the wine.

src: 红牌威士忌+切片柠檬+方糖(砂糖亦可),是最正宗、最传统的喝法.
test: Red Label whisky, cut with lemon and sugar, is the most authentic, traditional way to drink it.

src: 正宗的红方威味道有些酸涩,加入糖可以中和其中的酸味,柠檬则会给酒带来清新的香味,当然,甜酸度可根据个人的口味爱好调配。
test: The original red wine has a sour and bitter taste, adding sugar can neutralize the sour taste, lemon can bring fresh flavor to wine, of course, the sweetness can be adjusted according to personal taste.

src: 以上三种都是红牌威士忌的最好喝法，大家可以作为参考尝试下，希望小编的介绍可以帮助到大家。
test: The above three are the best ways to drink red label whiskey, and everyone can try it as a reference. I hope that the introduction of the editor can help everyone.

src: 教育思考：大学考试如何让“学霸 ” “ 学渣”各得其所-新华网
test: Thoughts on Education: How to Make "Genius" and "Dunce" Get What They Deserve - Xinhua Net

src: 兰州交通大学3名学生给校领导写信，反映对大学考试的困惑，并提出提高考试难度，变换考试题型，让考试真正体现学生实际水平的诉求。
test: 3 students from Lanzhou University wrote a letter to the school leaders, expressing their confusion about the university examination, and proposed to increase the difficulty of the examination, change the examination type, and let the examination truly reflect the level of students' actual situation.

src: 的确，长期以来，大学考试都是一个“热门话题 ” 。
test: Yes, for a long time, the college entrance examination has always been a "hot topic".

src: 在大学校园，学生来自五湖四海，能力水平各不相同，再加之学习程度不一，学习的情况千差万别。
test: In the university campus, students come from five seas and four oceans, their ability levels are different, and their learning conditions are also different.

src: 对于具有如此多元特征的群体进行考核，存在不同感受，在所难免。
test: For a group with so many characteristics, there will be different feelings, which is inevitable.

src: 当然，如果考试试题题型单一、重复率高，题目过于简单，必然会造成另一种截然不同的感受。
test: Of course, if the test questions are single-type, repeated, and the questions are too simple, it will inevitably lead to a different feeling.

src: 不用功的学生，可能考前集中突击就能及格，如若再想其他办法，有可能达到事半功倍的效果。
test: Students who don't study hard may pass the exam by cramming before the exam, but if they want to do other things, they may achieve twice the effect.

src: 如此一来，就出现“学渣”平时不投入也能过关、甚至得了高分 ； “ 学霸”平时从不落课，作业、笔记样样好，考试也没高出多少的“怪现状 ” 。
test: If you are a student, you will be able to pass the examination even if you do not study. If you are a genius, you will be able to pass the examination even if you do not study.

src: 这样看来，兰州交大的学生反映大学考试中存在的问题并非毫无来由，相信这种状况也不只兰州交大存在。
test: It seems that the students of Lanzhou University reflect the problems in the university entrance examination, which is not without reason. I believe that this kind of situation is not only in Lanzhou University.

src: 从这层意义上讲，要为这3名写信直陈的学生点赞。
test: From this perspective, I should write a letter to praise these 3 students who wrote to me.

src: 其实，上过大学的人都清楚，突击备考、想各种办法从老师处“套取”考题，争取划考试范围，求得考前得到“重点辅导”的现象并不少见，甚至在考试中夹带小抄、考后求老师高抬贵手的情况也不是奇闻。
test: In fact, people who have graduated from college are clear, they are eager to find various ways to "steal" questions from teachers, and to get the "targeted guidance" before the exam. Even in the exam, they bring small notes and ask teachers to raise their hands after the exam.

src: 在笔者看来，作为一种教学质量评估导向，衡量一所大学考试的合格与否，更在于教师对教与学的全面把握，以及在此基础上的科学命题。
test: In my opinion, as a teaching quality evaluation guidance, to measure the university examination qualification, more in the teacher's overall grasp of teaching and learning, and on this basis, scientific questions.

src: 进入大学本科阶段，专业开始细分，很多专业课程以基础知识为主。
test: Entering the undergraduate stage, professional division, many professional courses are based on basic knowledge.

src: 毋庸置疑，是否全面掌握一个学科的基本知识点，是大学考试要考察的内容。
test: It is not allowed to doubt, whether you have a comprehensive grasp of the basic knowledge points of a subject, it is the content of the college entrance examination.

src: 而本科知识基本都是学科基础理论和基本常识，从知识点而言，变化的空间并不大，基本是固定的。
test: The basic knowledge of undergraduate is the basic theory and basic knowledge of the discipline, from the knowledge point of view, the space of change is not big, it is basically fixed.

src: 就像有教师所言 ， “ 20年前学大学数学的基本知识，现在还在学，还是重点 。 ”
test: 20 years ago, I learned the basic knowledge of mathematics in college, and now I am still studying it.

src: 但知识点基本不变，并不代表考试题型单一、试题重复。
test: The knowledge points are basically unchanged, and it does not mean that the test questions are single-type and repeated.

src: 在很多大学，考试一般都会组成出题组，再由学科资深教师统筹组成试卷，考试阅卷也由承担该科的全体老师参与，这样就能在一定程度上克服试题重复的情况。
test: In many universities, the examinations are usually composed of a group of questions, and then the questions are composed by the senior teachers of the subject, and the examination is also participated by the teachers of the subject in the whole university, which can to some extent overcome the situation of repeated questions.

src: 但要拟出一套符合教与学实际的试题，题目根据学生学习整体情况，难易呈正态分布，还需综合掌握教学情况，全面分析学生学习的程度，从而使考试命题对难易、题型有动态把握，既能突出基础知识考察，又能兼顾能力考查，同时对题型进行创新设计。
test: But it is necessary to design a set of test questions that are in line with the teaching and learning situation, the difficulty distribution is normal, and the overall situation of the teaching and learning situation is comprehensively grasped, and the overall situation of the teaching and learning situation is comprehensively grasped, so that the test questions can be dynamically grasped in terms of difficulty and type, and can effectively test the basic knowledge and ability of the students, and at the same time, the test questions can be innovatively designed.

src: 考试是大学教育的指挥棒，有什么样的考试，学生就会有相应的备考方案，长此以往，将影响大学教育的成效。
test: The exam is the steering wheel of university education. Whatever kind of exam, students will have corresponding preparation plan. If it goes on like this, it will affect the effect of university education.

src: 对于学生的建议信，兰州交大校方高度重视，已在全校部署了整改的方案。
test: The school has formulated a rectification plan for the students' suggestion letter. The school attaches great importance to it and has deployed it in the whole school.

src: 要求各教学单位组织教师开展研讨和课程结课考试对照自查，制定考试试卷命题及相关制度，同时加强对考试试卷命题及审核环节的监督与检查，细化成绩评定，加强课程教学各环节的全面考核。
test: Require each teaching unit to organize teachers to carry out research and examination and evaluation of the course at the end of the course, formulate examination papers and relevant systems, at the same time strengthen the supervision and inspection of the examination paper drafting and reviewing section, refine the evaluation of the results, strengthen the comprehensive evaluation of the teaching process of each section.

src: 从机制上解决试题类型单一、题目重复等问题是大学考务需要面对的议题，当然需要出台相应的制度，但功夫贵在日常，需要教师对教学情况的全面掌握，不单要吃透教学内容，更须吃透学生学习情况，两头吃透，教与学将更好对接，形成良性互动，考试也将更加符合实际，从而让“学霸”和“学渣”各得其所。
test: The problem of single-type and repeated questions in the examination is a problem that the university examination needs to face, of course, corresponding measures need to be formulated, but the effort is worthwhile in daily work, and teachers need to fully grasp the teaching situation, not only to understand the teaching content, but also to understand the learning situation of students, two-sided understanding, teaching and learning will be better connected, and the examination will be more in line with reality, so that "students" and "dregs" can get what they deserve.

src: 如果无法为我变更分店位置，可以改为外送吗？
test: If you can't change the location of the store, can you change it to delivery?

src: 那我不必再多给次钱吧？
test: I don't need to give you any more money, do I?

src: 拍照之前因为我们时间没安排好，更换了两次时间，顾问兰兰很耐心地帮我们安排了时间。
test: Before taking photos, we didn't have time to arrange it, so we changed the time twice, and the consultant Lulu was very patient to help us arrange the time.

src: 后来选择了一个天气好的周末拍的。
test: I chose a good weather weekend to shoot.

src: 金夫人的工作人员，无论是顾问，化妆师还是摄影师都超赞的。
test: The staff of the makeup artist, hairdresser, and photographer of the wife of the gold are all praised.

src: 那是我生平第一次正式地化妆，哇～简直不敢相信，我有一天也会变得那么好看，哈哈。
test: That was my first time to wear makeup formally, wow~ I can't believe it, I will be that beautiful one day, haha.

src: 晓洁和另一个妹子（抱歉我记不得名字了）化妆超级有耐心，化妆也很自然。
test: Xiao Jie and another little sister (sorry I forgot her name) are very patient when they are doing makeup, and their makeup is very natural.

src: 外景在江湾城拍的，幸亏那天天气很好，没有觉得很冷，拍照的时候，化妆师时不时地留意我们的衣服，头饰，稍微有一点不好了就马上帮我们整理。
test: The scene was shot in the Jiangwan City, luckily the weather was good that day, I didn't feel cold, when we were shooting, the makeup artist was always paying attention to our clothes, accessories, and if there was a little bit of mess, he would help us to fix it immediately.

src: 摄影师也非常幽默，拍照一天下来都觉得很开心。
test: The photographer is very humorous, and he is very happy to take pictures every day.

src: 在选照片的时候，因为在网上看到很多案例，不愿意让客人删太多照片，但是我们选照片的时候，真的，一点没有让我们加照片的意思，直接套餐里的24张，一张都没有加（听说和我差不多时间拍婚纱照的表妹，七千多的套餐还加了一万多的照片，当时我就惊呆了，心里也很怕自己会选太多）
test: When we were taking photos, because I saw a lot of cases on the Internet, I didn't want to let the guests delete too many photos, but when we were taking photos, we didn't have any intention of adding photos, just the 24 photos in the package, and there was no addition of photos.

src: 今天照片修好了，兰兰发给我，我看了有两张觉得不太好，他们立刻就帮我重新修了。
test: The photo was retouched today, and Lan Lan sent it to me. I looked at it and there were two photos that I thought were not very good. They immediately helped me retouch them.

src: “小姐如果有时间的话，我们可以去公司里谈，片酬一定少不了。”

src: 沙巴3200名新生婴儿无报生纸 因特制防伪纸断货
test: 3,200 newborn babies in Sabah without birth certificates

src: （亚庇11日讯）沙巴国民登记局说，由于特制防伪纸存货用光，所以自10月初开始就无法颁发报生纸给初生婴儿，至今累积的受影响者达3200人。
test: (Borneo Post, 11/11/2009) The Sabah Immigration Department said that due to the shortage of counterfeit-proof paper, it has been unable to issue birth certificates to newborn babies since early October. The number of affected people has reached 3,200.

src: 不过，该局主任凯鲁阿米努斯保证，所有已经申请报生纸的婴儿，资料已经记录在系统，当防伪纸在下周运到后就会补发。
test: However, the director of the office, Kailu Amunus, promised that all the babies who have applied for birth certificates will be recorded in the system, and the certificates will be issued when the fake certificates arrive next week.

src: 他在新闻发布会上，针对一家网媒指沙巴报生纸印制问题出现长达10个月的报导，作出解释。
test: He made a statement at the press conference to explain the long-term report on the paper-making problem of the newspaper.

src: 他说，有关问题在2个月前就出现，砂拉越也面对同样的问题。
test: He said that the problem had appeared two months ago, and Sarawak was also facing the same problem.

src: “其中一个原因是生产特制防伪纸的中国厂家受疫情影响，导致延迟运抵我国 。 ”
test: “One of the reasons is that the Chinese factory that produces anti-counterfeiting paper is affected by the epidemic, which leads to the delay of transportation to China.”

src: 他解释，沙巴报生纸使用的防伪纸和其他地区不同，因此不能商借其他州属的存货。
test: He explained that the paper used in Shaba is different from that used in other provinces, so it cannot be borrowed from other provinces.

src: 凯鲁阿米努斯透露，最新一批防伪纸已经于本月6日运抵吉隆坡，过后于8日交给印刷公司，进行部分印制工作。
test: Kulau Amins revealed that the latest batch of anti-fake paper has arrived in Kuala Lumpur on 6th of this month and will be delivered to the printing company on 8th for some printing works.

src: “该局下周四将派人到吉隆坡取货，回到沙巴立刻进行最后阶段的打印，估计多2个工作日（12月20日）就可以交到申请者手上 。 ”
test: “The office will send someone to Kuala Lumpur next week to buy goods, and then return to Sabah to print the final stage. It is estimated that it will be delivered to the applicant in about 2 days (December 20). ”

src: “我们会通知申请者前往各地分局领取报生纸 。 ”
test: “We will notify the applicants to go to each district office to pick up the application form. ”

src: 他补充，沙巴今年至今共发出2万4801张报生纸。
test: He added, Sabah has issued 24,801 birth certificates this year.

test: Xinhua News Agency Beijing December 11, 2021, People's Daily Commentator Article: "The 14th Five-Year Plan" Realizes a Good Start - Comments on the Implementation of the Central Economic Work Conference Spirit

src: “实现了‘十四五’良好开局 ” ， 12月8日至10日举行的中央经济工作会议高度评价一年来我国经济社会发展取得的成绩。
test: “The 14th Five-Year Plan for National Economic and Social Development and the Long-Range Objectives Through the Year 2035 was successfully launched on December 8-10, 2020, when the Central Economic Work Conference was held.

src: 习近平总书记在会上发表重要讲话，深刻总结2021年经济工作，深入分析当前经济形势，对2022年经济工作作出重大部署，为我们做好明年经济工作，迎接党的二十大胜利召开，指明了前进方向、提供了根本遵循。
test: Xi Jinping, general secretary of the CPC Central Committee, delivered an important speech at the meeting, deeply summarizing the economic work in 2021, deeply analyzing the current economic situation, and making major arrangements for the economic work in 2022, to prepare for the successful convening of the 20th CPC National Congress.

src: 我们隆重庆祝中国共产党成立一百周年，正式宣布全面建成小康社会、实现第一个百年奋斗目标，开启全面建设社会主义现代化国家、向第二个百年奋斗目标进军新征程。
test: We solemnly celebrate the 100th anniversary of the founding of the Communist Party of China, officially announce the completion of the building of a moderately prosperous society in all respects, and achieve the first centenary goal of the great struggle. We will start a new journey to build a socialist modernization country and strive for the second centenary goal.

src: 我们召开党的十九届六中全会，总结党的百年奋斗重大成就和历史经验，通过百年党史上第三个历史决议《中共中央关于党的百年奋斗重大成就和历史经验的决议 》 ， 这是新时代中国共产党人牢记初心使命、坚持和发展中国特色社会主义的政治宣言，是以史为鉴、开创未来、实现中华民族伟大复兴的行动指南。
test: We are holding the 19th National Congress of the Communist Party of China, to summarize the great achievements and historical experience of the Party's hundred-year struggle, and to make a third historical resolution on the great achievements and historical experience of the Party's hundred-year struggle through the historical resolution of the third historical resolution on the great achievements and historical experience of the Party's hundred-year struggle. This is the political declaration of the new era of Chinese Communists, which is the political declaration of the Chinese Communists to remember their original heart, to adhere to and develop socialism with Chinese characteristics, and to take action as the action guide for the great revival of the Chinese nation.

src: 一年来，世界百年未有之大变局和新冠肺炎疫情全球大流行交织影响，外部环境更趋复杂严峻，国内新冠肺炎疫情防控和经济社会发展各项任务极为繁重艰巨。
test: Over the past year, the world has experienced a major change and the global spread of the novel coronavirus epidemic, which has never happened in a century. The external environment is becoming more complex and severe. The prevention and control of the novel coronavirus epidemic and the development of the economy and society are extremely heavy tasks.

test: The 14th Five-Year Plan period has made a good start, and one important aspect is to build a new development pattern and take new steps. High-quality development has achieved new results.

src: 我国经济发展和疫情防控保持全球领先地位，发展韧性强、潜力大、动力足的特点持续显现；国家战略科技力量加快壮大，重大创新成果竞相涌现，科技创新能力持续提升，关键核心技术攻关实现新突破；产业链韧性得到提升，对外贸易量增质升，结构继续优化，以新产业新业态新模式为代表的新动能成长壮大；改革开放向纵深推进，着力打通制约供需适配和要素流动的堵点，以高水平对外开放打造合作竞争新优势；民生保障有力有效，就业规模持续扩大，居民收入增长与经济增长基本同步，全年粮食连续7年保持在1.3万亿斤以上，喜获“十八连丰 ” ； 生态文明建设持续推进，碳达峰碳中和工作统筹推进，绿色低碳转型步伐稳健，生态环境保护取得新成效。
test: China's economic development and epidemic prevention and control maintain the global leading position, the development of resilience, strong potential, strong driving force, the characteristics of the continuous display; the national strategic science and technology strengthening, major breakthroughs in scientific and technological innovation, the innovation capacity of science and technology continues to improve, the key core technology breakthroughs achieved new breakthroughs; the industrial chain resilience is enhanced, the foreign trade volume increased, the structure is optimized, the new energy represented by new industries and new business models continue to grow; reform and opening up to the deepening of the horizontal, the obstacles to the adjustment and the flow of elements to break

test: The achievements in these results are the result of the strong leadership of the CPC Central Committee with Comrade Xi Jinping at its core, the result of the application of Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era, and the result of the hard work of the whole Party, the whole nation and all ethnic groups.

src: 实践再次证明，党确立习近平同志党中央的核心、全党的核心地位，确立习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想的指导地位，对新时代党和国家事业发展、对推进中华民族伟大复兴历史进程具有决定性意义。
test: The practice once again proves that the Party has established Comrade Xi Jinping as the core of the Central Committee and the core of the Party, has established Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era as the guiding ideology, and has established the new era of socialism with Chinese characteristics as the guiding era.

src: 有习近平总书记作为党中央的核心、全党的核心领航掌舵，有习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想科学指引，有全党全国各族人民团结一心、顽强奋斗，我们就一定能够战胜各种艰难险阻，在全面建设社会主义现代化国家新征程上创造新的时代辉煌、铸就新的历史伟业。
test: With Comrade Xi Jinping as the core of the Central Committee and the core of the whole Party, with the guidance of Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era, with the whole Party and the Chinese people of all ethnic groups united as one and with strong confidence and perseverance, we will surely be able to overcome various difficulties and obstacles and create a new era of glory and splendor in the new journey of building a modern socialist country in all respects.

src: 明年将召开党的二十大，这是党和国家政治生活中的一件大事。
test: The 20th Party Congress will be held next year, which is a major event in the political life of the Party and the country.

src: 弘扬伟大建党精神，坚持稳中求进工作总基调，完整、准确、全面贯彻新发展理念，加快构建新发展格局，全面深化改革开放，坚持创新驱动发展，推动高质量发展，坚持以供给侧结构性改革为主线，统筹疫情防控和经济社会发展，统筹发展和安全，继续做好“六稳 ” 、 “六保”工作，持续改善民生，着力稳定宏观经济大盘，保持经济运行在合理区间，保持社会大局稳定，我们就一定能保持平稳健康的经济环境、国泰民安的社会环境、风清气正的政治环境，以优异成绩迎接党的二十大胜利召开。
test: We should fully and accurately implement the spirit of the Party's 20th National Congress, adhere to the general tone of seeking progress while maintaining stability, and fully and accurately implement the new development concept, accelerate the construction of a new development pattern, comprehensively deepen reform and opening up, and drive high-quality development. We should adhere to the supply-side structural reform as the main line, and strive to achieve coordinated control of epidemic prevention and economic and social development, and strive to achieve coordinated development and security. We should continue to do a good job in stabilizing the macroeconomic situation, maintaining economic operation in a reasonable range, and maintain

src: 让我们更加紧密地团结在以习近平同志为核心的党中央周围，增强“四个意识 ” 、 坚定“四个自信 ” 、 做到“两个维护 ” ， 不断提高政治判断力、政治领悟力、政治执行力，以实际行动把党中央决策部署落实到位，不断把新时代中国特色社会主义事业推向前进。
test: Let us more closely unite around the CPC Central Committee with Comrade Xi Jinping at its core, strengthen the "four consciousnesses", firm the "four confidences", and strive to achieve the "two safeguards". We should enhance our political judgment, political cognition, and political execution, and implement the decisions of the CPC Central Committee in a realistic way, and strive to push the socialist cause with Chinese characteristics to a new level.

src: 教育资讯：北京压缩2016年初中入学特长生比例-新华网
test: Education and Information: Beijing compressed 2016 high school entrance examination special talents ratio - Xinhua Net

src: 21日、22日两日，北京市初中入学特长生考查工作由各区教委统一组织实施。
test: On 21st and 22nd, the entrance examination for special talents in middle schools in Beijing will be held unifiedly organized by each district education committee.

src: 今年，北京各区均压缩了特长生招生比例，特长生竞争更为激烈。
test: This year, the enrollment rate of specialized talents in Beijing has been reduced, and the competition is more intense.

src: 以东城区为例，今年该区小学升初中特长生入学比例总体不超过全区招生计划数的5 % ， 计划招生人数为380人，到校比例不超过学校招生计划数的10 % 。
test: In the East District, the proportion of primary school students who are admitted to junior high school with special talents is generally not higher than 5% of the total number of students admitted to junior high school in the district. The planned number of students admitted to junior high school is 380, and the admission rate is not higher than 10% of the planned number of students.

src: 凡具有体育、艺术、科技特长且在网上报名的学生均有资格参加特长生招生考查。
test: All students who have talents in sports, arts and technology and who have registered online are eligible to take the special talent examination.

src: 为方便学生就近参加考查，东城区延续去年的考查安排方式，在每个学区分别设置1~2个考查地点，共13个考查地点。
test: To facilitate students to take the examination nearby, the East District continues the arrangement of last year, setting up 1~2 examination sites in each school district, a total of 13 examination sites.

src: 考点均按考区划分考场，以小时为单位划分时段，考查当天学生将按时段进入考点在不同考区考场内进行考查。
test: The test sites are divided into test zones according to the test zones, and the test time is divided into test periods, and the test is carried out in the test zones in the test periods of the test sites.

src: 5月23日，区教育招生考试中心网上公示考查通过的学生名单，学生可在网上查询考查结果。
test: May 23, the list of students who passed the examination of the examination center of the education of the district was announced on the Internet, and the students could check the results on the Internet.

src: 波黑奥委会主席：坚信中国有能力在特殊时期办好冬奥盛会-新华网
test: IOC President: Confident China can host Winter Olympics in special period - Xinhua

src: 新华社萨拉热窝12月11日电 波黑奥委会主席克韦西奇近日表示，波方十分期待北京冬奥会，坚信中国有能力在特殊时期办好冬奥盛会。
test: Xinhua, Sarajevo, December 11, 2007: The President of the Olympic Committee of Bosnia and Herzegovina, Kvesic, recently said that Bosnia and Herzegovina is looking forward to the Beijing Winter Olympics, and believes that China has the ability to hold the Winter Olympics in a special period.

src: 日前中国驻波黑大使季平在萨拉热窝奥林匹克中心会见波黑奥委会主席克韦西奇。
test: The Chinese Ambassador to Bosnia and Herzegovina, Zhang Qi, met with the President of the Olympic Committee of Bosnia and Herzegovina, Kvesic, in Sarajevo Olympic Center.

src: 会见时，克韦西奇积极评价波中关系并表示，他曾于2008年北京夏奥会之际访华，对中方出色的组织工作印象极为深刻，坚信中国有能力在特殊时期办好冬奥盛会；波方十分期待北京冬奥会，波黑奥委会正在积极组织参会；波方希望以此为契机，同中方在体育领域开展更为广泛的交流合作。
test: When meeting, Kweisi Chi, the Chinese ambassador to Poland, actively evaluated the China-Poland relations and said that he had visited China in 2008 during the Beijing Olympic Games, and he had a deep impression on the excellent organization of the Chinese side. He believed that China had the ability to hold a good Winter Olympics in a special period. The Polish Olympic Committee is looking forward to the Beijing Winter Olympics, and the Polish Olympic Committee is actively organizing the participation. The Polish side hopes to use this opportunity to expand cooperation in sports with China.

src: 季平表示，中波两国有着特殊的“奥运纽带 ” 。
test: The Chinese and Brazilian teams have a special "Olympic belt" relationship.

src: 1984年萨拉热窝冬奥会在这里成功举办，再过两个月，2022年北京冬奥会也将拉开帷幕，将向世界呈现一场简约、安全、精彩的盛会。
test: The 1984 Sarajevo Winter Olympics were successfully held here, and two months later, the 2022 Beijing Winter Olympics will also be held here, and will present a simple, safe and spectacular show to the world.

src: 期待两国在冬季体育赛事筹备、运动员训练等方面深化交流合作，中国驻波黑使馆愿继续发挥桥梁作用，以北京冬奥会为契机，推动两国人文交流不断深化，让两国人民“一起向未来 ” ， 并祝波黑运动健儿在北京取得佳绩。
test: The Chinese Embassy in Bosnia and Herzegovina wishes to see the cooperation between China and Bosnia and Herzegovina in winter sports events, training of athletes and other fields deepened, and the embassy will continue to play a bridge role. We hope that the Beijing Winter Olympics will provide a platform for the people of China and Bosnia and Herzegovina to get together and move forward together, and wish the athletes of Bosnia and Herzegovina good results in the Beijing Winter Olympics.

src: 会见前，波黑奥委会举办了“第十届年度最佳运动员”颁奖典礼，季平作为特邀嘉宾为波黑最佳青年运动员颁奖。
test: Before the meeting, the Olympic Committee of Bosnia and Herzegovina held the "10th Annual Best Athlete Award Ceremony", and Tianping was invited as a special guest to present the award to the best young athlete in Bosnia and Herzegovina.

src: 活动现场循环播放北京冬奥会宣传视频。
test: The video of the Beijing Winter Olympics is played in a loop at the venue.

src: 新华社北京12月11日电（记者董瑞丰、顾天成）国务院联防联控机制日前印发关于加强口岸城市新冠肺炎疫情防控工作的通知，要求近期离开陆地边境口岸城市（与香港、澳门有口岸相连的除外）人员需持有48小时内核酸检测阴性证明，前往陆地边境口岸城市人员抵达后至少进行1次核酸检测。
test: The State Council’s Joint Prevention and Control Mechanism recently issued a notice on strengthening the epidemic prevention and control work at border cities. It requires that people who leave border cities within 48 hours must have a negative nucleic acid test within 48 hours, and people who arrive at border cities must undergo at least one nucleic acid test.

src: 根据通知，上述要求的时间范围为，从各省区市确定口岸城市范围并公告之日起，至2022年3月15日。
test: According to the notice, the time range of the above requirements is determined by each province, autonomous region, and municipality directly under the Central Government, and the time range is announced from the date of determination of the port city of each province, autonomous region, and municipality directly under the Central Government.

src: 此外，通知还提出，有条件的口岸城市可研究在辖区内设置疫情防控缓冲区。
test: In addition, the notice also proposed that under certain conditions, border cities with ports could set up quarantine buffer zones within their jurisdictions.

src: 国家卫生健康委疾病预防控制局有关负责人介绍，对于一些口岸城市来说，跨境边贸是当地主要经济支柱，双方边民往来频繁。
test: The National Health and Family Planning Commission of the People's Republic of China has made the following announcement:

src: 实行分区差异化管理政策，由一道防控外溢防线变为两道防线，有望实现关口前移，压缩疫情外溢风险，以最小社会影响、最低社会成本实现疫情防控最大成效。
test: Implement differential management policies, from a single control line to two control lines, it is hoped that the border can be moved forward, to compress the risk of epidemic overflow, and achieve the maximum effect of epidemic prevention and control with the minimum social impact and the lowest social cost.

src: 近期我国发生多起本土聚集性疫情，均是境外疫情经口岸城市输入。
test: Recently, there have been many outbreaks of local cluster infections in China, all of which are imported from abroad through border cities.

src: 上述通知指出，这暴露出一些地方疫情监测预警不及时、高风险岗位人员闭环管理不落实、定期核酸检测流于形式、冷链物品各环节消杀不到位、集中隔离场所管理不规范、疫情应急处置不够科学精准等问题。
test: The above notice points out that some places have not timely detected the epidemic, the high-risk personnel of the closed-loop management are not implemented, the regular nucleic acid testing is formal, the cold chain of the infected materials is not killed, the management of the centralized isolation area is not standardized, and the scientific and accurate handling of the epidemic is insufficient.

src: 通知要求，从完善口岸城市疫情防控机制、健全疫情监测预警体系、落实边境管控措施等9个方面着力，加快补齐口岸城市防控短板弱项，毫不放松、科学精准做好防控工作，织密扎牢外防输入防线。
test: The notice requires to strengthen the prevention and control of the epidemic in the city of the port, to complete the mechanism of the prevention and control of the epidemic in the city of the port, to strengthen the prevention and control of the epidemic in the city of the port, to strengthen the prevention and control of the epidemic in the city of the port, to strengthen the prevention and control of the epidemic in the city of the port, to strengthen the prevention and control of the epidemic in the city of the port, to strengthen the prevention and control of the epidemic in the city of the port, to strengthen the prevent

src: 通知强调，各口岸城市要将疫情防控与民生保障工作同步研究、同步部署，公布并畅通民生保障热线，定期排查基本生活物资供应、价格等方面的苗头隐患，及时解决和主动回应群众反映的突出问题。
test: Stress the importance of coordinating epidemic prevention and control with the people's livelihood guarantee work, and publish and disseminate the hotline for people's livelihood guarantee work in each city of the port, and regularly check the basic livelihood supply and price of the people, and timely solve and respond to the prominent problems reflected by the masses.

src: 根据通知，其中所指的口岸城市包括开放的陆路、水路、航空口岸所在县（市、区、旗 ） 、 所在市（地、州、盟）及所在直辖市，具体范围由各省（自治区、直辖市）根据疫情防控需要确定并及时公告。
test: According to the notice, the cities involved include the open land, water and air ports of the cities (districts, counties, banners), the cities (districts, prefectures, autonomous regions) where the ports are located, and the cities (districts, prefectures, autonomous regions) where the ports are located. The specific scope is determined by each province (autonomous region, direct-controlled city) according to the needs of epidemic prevention and control and is announced in time.

For 20 years, the United States has been poor, bloodthirsty, and addicted to violence, and has committed countless crimes against humanity.

src: 正如视频所说，美式“反恐”战争“越反越恐 ” 。
test: As the video says, the US "anti-terrorism" war is "the more you fight, the more terrorist".

src: 战争没有给阿富汗人民带去和平民主、繁荣希望，带去的只有满目疮痍的国家和无数的杀戮破坏。
test: War has not brought peace, democracy, prosperity and hope to the Afghan people. It has only brought misery, destruction and death.

src: 戳视频，让我们一起来揭穿美国以“反恐”为名，嗜血杀戮的真相，戳穿美式民主的虚伪假面！
test: Let's watch the video together and expose the truth of the US's bloodthirsty killing under the guise of "anti-terrorism"!

src: 无意中看到如下一篇文章，从商业的角度以及保存期的角度谈为什么这个客户要保税区里面的物流公司帮做罐装，虽然罐装属于深加工，不属于保税物流公司的经营范围，这里如下这篇文字也许可以解释 为什么客户想要这么做？
test: I came across the following article by chance, and from the perspective of business and storage period, I talked about why this customer wants to do in-house packaging in the bonded area, although in-house packaging belongs to deep processing, it does not belong to the business scope of the bonded area logistics company, here is the following article, maybe it can explain why the customer wants to do it?

src: 我去很多奶粉的厂家，接触很多奶粉的生产线。
test: I went to many milk powder factories, and I was in contact with many milk powder production lines.

src: 其实袋装跟听装的奶粉它们的原材料是一模一样的，没有任何区别的。
test: In fact, the ingredients of the milk powder in the bag and the milk powder in the bottle are the same, and there is no difference at all.

src: 那么大家肯定会问：为什么袋装保质期是一年，而听装的保质期是两年或更长呢？
test: So everyone will ask: Why is the bag packaging period one year, and the earphone packaging period is two years or longer?

src: 或者又问：听装与袋装的价格为什么差价这么大呢？
test: Or also ask: Why is the price difference between listening and bagging so big?

src: 其实从这点出发很多消费者，或者妈妈级的认为这是因为原材料不一样所以质量上会好很多。
test: Actually, from this point of view, many consumers, or even mothers, think that the quality is better because the raw materials are different.

src: 其实原材料一样，只是大家认为贵的就是好的。
test: In fact, the original materials are the same, but everyone thinks that the more expensive is better.

src: 也有消费者出于这种心态吃了后反应还说听装的口感或味道就是不一样！
test: There are also consumers who eat because of this kind of mentality, and then they say that the taste or taste of the packaging is different!

src: 现在我跟大家先说一下听装贵的原因，贵在哪里？
test: Now I'll tell you why I'm so expensive. Where are you from?

src: 它们的原材料相同为何差价如此之大呢？
test: Why are the prices so different if the materials are the same?

src: 因为厂家在定价的时候大多数都考虑到如果袋装定价太高，消费者很难去接受，这就意味着厂家产生的利润很低，或者说没有利润，那厂家靠什么去生存呢？
test: Because the factory is considering the price when it is pricing, most of them consider that if the price is too high, the consumers will not accept it, which means that the factory's profit is very low, or it means that there is no profit, so what does the factory do to survive?

src: 所以他们在听装的定价上，有了一个很大的上升幅度来保障他们的利润空间。
test: So they have a very large increase in the price of the goods to ensure their profit space.

src: 因此大多数厂家主推的是听装，而不是袋装。
test: Therefore, most manufacturers are promoting the earphone, rather than the box.

src: 还有你想那么多的厂家每年的广告费都要几千万甚至是几个亿，这个费用何来？
test: There are so many factories that spend so much money on advertising every year. Where does the money come from?

src: 大家可想而知。
test: You can guess it.

src: 那么随着社会的发展，市场的推广费用，比如说：商场的促销人员、商场的陈列费用、产品的赠品费用、广告费用等也在不断的增加。
test: As the society develops, the marketing expenses, such as the promotion expenses of the shopping mall, the display expenses of the shopping mall, the gifts of the shopping mall, the advertising expenses, etc. are also increasing.

src: 所以各个厂家也在不断地增加新品，而且是听装，其价格也是不断地上涨，其实这是随着市场费用的增加而出的新品。
test: So, each manufacturer is constantly adding new products, and they are all listening to the price, and the price is constantly rising, which is due to the increase in market costs.

src: 主要目的是为了获取更高的利润，其实他们的原材料增加的成本最多不会超过3、4元钱。
test: The main purpose is to get higher profits, in fact, their raw materials increase costs will not exceed 3, 4 yuan.

src: 还有一部分品牌，为了推广自己的产品，不择手段，跟医院的医生挂钩，由他们协助产品的推广，从一听里面抽成30元到80元不等的利润。
test: Some brands, in order to promote their products, do not hesitate to hook up with doctors in hospitals, and they will get 30 to 80 yuan per piece from the doctors.

src: 而中国的相关法律是绝对不允许这样的操作方式方法的，其实这种做法是在坑害消费者。
test: The relevant laws of China are absolutely not allowed to do such operations, in fact, this kind of behavior is to cheat consumers.

src: 建议大家在家里有罐的前提下买袋装的奶粉装入罐中，这样可以节省费用，而增加奶粉的保存性和密封性，对小孩子也没有任何影响。
test: Please buy the powdered milk in cans, and put it into the cans at home, which can save money and improve the sealing and storage of the powdered milk. It will not affect the baby.

src: 还有大家不要认为听装的保质期就比袋装长，如果在开包以后听装与袋装的保质期是一样的，只是说袋装开包以后不容易保存，容易受潮变质。
test: Don't think that the shelf life of the packaged goods is longer than the packaged goods, if the shelf life of the packaged goods and the packaged goods are the same after opening, only the packaged goods are not easy to preserve after opening, easy to change quality.

test: How to pay service fee to the driver?

src: 不要把人吓倒在起跑线-新华网
test: Don't scare people into starting a race

src: 逛书市时，往往能感受到成功学类书籍的火爆。
test: When browsing the book market, you can often feel the booming of success books.

src: 现今的成功学书籍，很多宣扬的都是“最好原则 ” — —即先假定或暗示你能“做到 ” ， 然后再告诉你需要做到的事情“是什么 ” 。
test: The most successful books on success nowadays are those that advocate “the best principles” — that is, they first assume or imply that you can “do it” and then tell you what you need to do.

src: 等于说一下子越过了“如何做到”这个其实最重要、最根本的环节。
test: It is equivalent to skipping over the most important and fundamental part of “how to do it” in one fell swoop.

src: 正因如此，这些书都有一个共同的特点 — — 要么就一鼓作气地干到最好，要么就干脆什么也别干；要么就是100，要么就是0；要么你就登泰山，要么你就干脆在原地待着。
test: Because of this, these books all have a common feature — — Either they are very enthusiastic and do their best, or they are very lazy and do nothing; Either they are 100, or they are 0; Either you climb to the top of Mount Tai, or you just stand still.

src: 这种“最好原则 ” ， 让谁看都会承认“正确无比 ” ， 但是99%的人都会被吓倒在起跑线前。
test: This “best principle” will make anyone who sees it admit that it is “perfect”, but 99% of people will be scared to death at the starting line.

src: 因为这种理论鼓吹的是一种“你要痛下决心，重新做人，来个180度的大转变”的路径，而这恰恰是很多人的致命弱项。
test: Because this theory advocates a "you have to be determined to hurt, remake a 180 degree turn" path, which is the fatal weakness of many people.

src: 对于墨守成规、因循守旧、拒绝变化的人，你偏偏要在他的耳旁大喊“你要转变 ” ， 无疑是自欺欺人、对牛弹琴之举。
test: To those who are rigid, who are sticking to the old, who are resisting change, you are shouting at them, “You must change!” It is definitely a self-deception, a deception of the donkey playing the piano.

src: 绝大多数人都会在“转变”两字面前露怯，裹足不前，难下决心；又或者凭着一时的冲动痛下了“转变”之决心，并勇敢地迈出了第一步，但往往是好景不长，坚持不了多一会儿就败下阵来，难见持续性。
test: Most people will be afraid of the word “change” in front of them, and they will not dare to step forward, and they will not be able to make a firm decision; or they will make a decision with a momentary impulse, and they will be brave enough to take the first step, but it is often a good scene, and it is not long, and it is difficult to persist for a while, and it is difficult to see the continuity.

src: 马三立先生那段著名的《从明天开始》的相声，就是最传神地表现了这一“普遍人性”的经典。
test: The famous comic monologue of Mr. Ma Sanli, the master of the famous "From tomorrow" of the Chinese, has expressed the "universal human nature" in a classic way.

src: “最好原则”的最大问题在于门槛太高，它往往超越了普通人的能力极限，让绝大多数人“望门兴叹 ” 。
test: The biggest problem of the “best principle” is that the threshold is too high, and it often exceeds the limit of the ability of ordinary people, making most people “sigh at the door and regret it.”

src: 或许 ， “ 次好原则”才是一种有可能让更多普通人走上相对成功之路的途径。
test: Maybe, “the second-best principle” is a path that more ordinary people can take to achieve relative success.

src: “次好原则”的核心在于“降低门槛 ” — —它鼓励的是一种“积小胜为大胜”的理论，即如果做不到100，只做到1也行：因为1永远大于0；如果登不上泰山，只登上你家门口的小沙丘也行，因为那也总比原地踏步强。
test: The core of the “principle of second-best” is to “lower the threshold” — it encourages the “small wins” theory, that is, if you can’t do 100, just do 10, because 1 is always bigger than 0; if you can’t climb Mount Tai, just climb the small sand hill in front of your house, because that is also stronger than standing still.

src: 总之，只要你做了点什么，就总比不做强。
test: In general, if you do something, you will be stronger than not doing it.

src: 由于门槛大幅度降低，因此就多了使普通人做到坚持的可能性，而凡事只要坚持，成功概率也会加大。
test: Due to the great reduction of the threshold, therefore, it has increased the possibility of ordinary people to persist, and the success rate will also increase if you persist in everything.

src: 只不过遵循“次好原则”的成功之路，其路程略长一些而已。
test: It is only by following the “secondary principle” that success can be achieved. The path is a little longer.

src: 总而言之 ， “ 最好原则”尽管在表面上打着让所有人都成功的旗号，但它最终能够激励的，实际上还是少数；而“次好原则 ” ， 才能有效激励更多的人，尽可能地让更多人受益。
test: In general, the “best principle” although it is playing the flag of making everyone successful, but it finally can inspire, in fact, only a few; while “secondary principle” can effectively inspire more people, and make more people benefit.

src: 青海湖裸鲤资源蕴藏量今年增加0.71万吨-新华网
test: Qinghai Lake carp resource reserve increased by 71,000 tons this year-Xinhua Net

src: 新华社西宁12月11日电（记者骆晓飞、张宏祥）记者从青海省农业农村厅获悉，最新监测结果显示，青海湖裸鲤资源蕴藏量今年较上年增加0.71万吨,达到10.85万吨，与2002年保护初期相比，累计增长40余倍。
test: Xinhua News Agency, December 11, 2003 (Reporter Luo Xiaofei, Zhang Hongxiang) Reporters from the Green Lake, Qinghai Province, learned from the Qinghai Provincial Department of Agriculture and Rural Affairs that the latest monitoring results showed that the resource reserves of the naked carp in Qinghai Lake had increased by 0.71 tons this year, reaching 10.85 tons, which was 40 times higher than that in 2002 when the protection was first started.

src: 青海湖裸鲤俗名“湟鱼 ” ， 是青海湖中特有的珍贵鱼种，对维系青海湖流域“水-鱼-鸟”生态链安全和生物多样性有着举足轻重的作用。
test: The Qinghai Lake carp is a native fish species in Qinghai Lake. It is an important species in the ecological chain of “water-fish-bird” in the Qinghai Lake basin.

src: 20世纪六七十年代，受人为大量捕杀、裸鲤繁殖水域环境日益退化等因素影响，青海湖裸鲤数量锐减，2002年青海湖裸鲤资源蕴藏量仅为2592吨。
test: In the 20th century, the massive killing and breeding of carp in the 1960s and 1970s, as well as the deterioration of the aquatic environment, led to a sharp decline in the number of carp in Qinghai Lake. In 2002, the resource reserve of Qinghai Lake carp was only 2592 tons.

src: 2004年在《中国物种红色名录》中青海湖裸鲤被列为濒危物种。
test: In 2004, the Chinese red list listed the naked carp in the Qinghai Lake as a threatened species.

src: 从2003年起，青海省实施封湖育鱼，禁止任何单位、集体和个人到青海湖及湖区主要河流及支流捕捞裸鲤，禁止销售裸鲤及其制品。
test: Since 2003, the province of Qinghai has implemented a ban on fishing in Qinghai Lake and its main tributaries. The ban prohibits any organization, group or individual from fishing for Qinghai Lake carp in Qinghai Lake and its main tributaries. The ban also prohibits the sale of Qinghai Lake carp and its products.

src: 与此同时，通过人工增殖放流以及清理青海湖主要入湖河流河道、设计科学合理的“过鱼通道”等措施持续加大保护力度，青海湖裸鲤资源蕴藏量逐年增加。
test: At the same time, through artificial breeding and releasing, and by cleaning the main inlet rivers of the lake, designing scientifically reasonable "passageways" for fish, the protection of the resources of the naked carp in the lake has been continuously strengthened.

src: 青海省农业农村厅副厅长杨林介绍，截至目前，青海湖裸鲤已累计实施人工增殖放流近1.8亿尾，对青海湖裸鲤资源恢复的贡献率超过23 % 。
test: The deputy director of the Department of Agriculture and Rural Affairs of Qinghai Province, Yang Lin, introduced that as of now, the artificial breeding and release of naked carp in Qinghai Lake has been implemented for 1.8 billion fish, which has made a great contribution to the recovery of the naked carp resources of Qinghai Lake.

src: 青海三江源地区是我国乃至亚洲重要的生态屏障和水源涵养区，而青海湖是控制西部荒漠化向东蔓延的天然屏障和生态功能区。
test: The Three Rivers Source Region in Qinghai Province is an important ecological barrier and water source area in China and Asia. The Qinghai Lake is a natural barrier and ecological function area to control the spread of desertification in the west.

src: 为了保护三江源地区和青海湖水域生态环境、保护水生野生动物，维护青藏高原生物多样性，今年以来，青海先后发布长江、黄河、青海湖重点水域禁捕通告，构建起了“一江一河一湖”全面禁捕管理体系。
test: In order to protect the Three Gorges and the Qinghai Lake ecological environment, to protect the water ecology of the Three Gorges, to protect the biodiversity of the Qinghai-Tibet Plateau, in recent years, Qinghai has issued a total ban on fishing in the Three Gorges, the Yellow River and the Qinghai Lake.

src: 李先生告诉记者，近日，他买了一个足浴盆送给父亲做生日礼物，可是父亲泡脚时却感觉脚底发麻。

src: 李先生用电笔一试，电笔居然亮了，李先生惊讶地发现足浴盆的水里居然带电。

src: 后来他联络了商家，商家的态度还不错，尽管退掉了足浴盆，李先生依然感到不快。

src: 因为他发现这个已经流行已久的足浴盆如今在最高温度的设定、适用于何种人群、何种材料保证无害等方面都没有一个明确详细的行业规定。
test: Because he found that this popular bath tub for a long time, now at the highest temperature setting, suitable for what groups of people, what materials to ensure safety in all aspects of the industry has no clear and detailed regulations.

src: 但是一般情况下足浴盆是不会有带电问题的，但也不排除少数产品在出厂时没有严格把关。
test: In general, the bathtub is not likely to have electric problems, but it is not ruled out that some products are not strictly checked when they are produced.

src: 因此在在购买的时候选择分体式的足浴盆。

test: In recent years, the provincial committee and provincial government have actively supported the development of the tea industry, and have promoted the construction of a billion-dollar tea industry in Hubei.

src: 省内茶界加大创新，绿茶、黑茶、红茶等主力茶类轮番发力，主产茶区推进茶旅融合，带动广大茶农增收。
test: The tea industry in the province has increased innovation, green tea, black tea, red tea and other main tea varieties successively launched, the main producing tea areas to promote tea tourism integration, driving a large number of tea farmers to increase income.

src: 风水轮流转，红茶又发力。
test: The wind changes direction, and the red tea is more powerful.

src: 省内茶界专家称，采完绿茶采红茶、黑茶，茶农一年四季有收入，茶园产值直线上升。
test: Tea experts in the province said that the green tea, black tea, and red tea, tea farmers have income all year round, the tea garden output value is directly rising.

src: 在开幕式上，省领导为第四批获权使用“湖南红茶”商标的企业进行授牌，新化喜捧“湖红之源 ” 。
test: At the opening ceremony, the provincial leaders awarded the fourth batch of enterprises with the right to use the "Hunan Red Tea" trademark, and New Happiness held the "Hunan Red Tea Source".

src: 在新化红茶展馆，福建茶商看中一款名为“冰里春”的高山茶，当即下订单。
test: In the New Haven Red Tea Exhibition, a tea merchant from Fujian saw a tea named "Ice Spring" in the high mountain tea, and immediately ordered it.

src: 省茶业协会秘书长王准高兴地说，当前疫情等因素或多或少影响茶叶市场，但从茶博会现场看，亮点纷呈。
test: Wang Jun, the secretary-general of the China Tea Association, said with joy that the epidemic situation and other factors may have affected the tea market, but from the tea exhibition, the highlights are everywhere.

src: 新化红茶一抹红，注入了茶文化内涵，人气旺、交易火，湘茶产业喜迎新的春天。
test: A sip of red tea in New Hui, injected with cultural connotations of tea, popularity is booming, and the tea industry is looking forward to a new spring.

src: 那如果这些食物不热的话，是不是可以取消？

src: 形而上学是指通过理性的推理和逻辑去研究不能直接透过感知而得到答案的问题。
test: Metaphysics is the study of those questions that cannot be answered by direct experience.

src: 形而上学是哲学的基本法则，旨在解释存在和世界的基本性质。
test: Metaphysics is the basic principle of philosophy, aiming to explain the basic nature of existence and the world.

src: 中文译名“形而上学”取自《易经•系辞上传》“形而上者谓之道，形而下者谓之器”一语，为日本人井上哲次郎（明治时代）由metaphysic翻译而来。
test: Metaphysics is a branch of philosophy concerned with explaining the fundamental nature of being and the world that encompasses it, although the term is not easily defined. Traditionally, metaphysics attempts to answer two basic questions in the broadest possible terms: ultimate causes (why is there something rather than nothing?) and the nature of reality (what is the ultimate substance or substances of which the world is composed?).

src: 形而上学分支包括本体论、自然神学及其延伸问题等。
test: Branches of metaphysics include ontology, natural theology and related problems.

src: 本体论就是“研究到底哪些名词代表真实的存在实体，哪些名词只是代表一种概念”。
test: The body theory is to study what kind of nouns represent real existence entities, and what kind of nouns only represent a concept.

src: 形而上学自然主义，指否认上帝存在。
test: Naturalism, a philosophical position that denies the existence of God.

src: 其理论基础认为所有现象皆可用自然理由的概念解释，由支持科学和演化论的哲学家提出。
test: The theory of naturalism holds that all phenomena can be explained by natural concepts, and is supported by philosophers who support science and evolution.

src: 而方法自然主义指对上帝不置一词的研究方法。
test: The method of naturalism is to study the word "God" without using the word "God".

src: 精神哲学是研究意识以及它们与肉体（尤其是大脑）的关系的本质的哲学分支。
test: Philosophy of mind is the branch of philosophy that studies the nature of the mind and its relationship to the physical body (especially the brain).

src: 二元论与一元论是讨论“心灵与肉体的关系”最主要的两派思想。
test: The two-wayism and one-wayism are the two main schools of thought in the discussion of the relationship between the soul and the body.

src: 知识论是探讨知识的本质、起源和范围的一个哲学分支。
test: Knowledge theory is a branch of philosophy that studies the nature, origin and scope of knowledge.

src: 伦理学是对人类道德生活进行系统性思考和研究的学科；在这里，道德定义为一群人或一种文化所认可的所有行为准则。
test: Ethics is a systematic study and research of human moral life; here, morality is defined as a set of all behavioral rules that are recognized by a group of people or a culture.

src: 主要分为元伦理学（抽象地研究伦理理论或批判的本质）、规范伦理学（评判各种不同的道德观，并且对于正确或错误行为给出道德准则建议。
test: 主要分为元伦理学（抽象地研究伦理理论或批判的本质）、规范伦理学（评判各种不同的道德观，并且对于正确或错误行为给出道德准则建议。

src: 它研究人们应该遵守什么样式的道德行为准则）、应用伦理学（将伦理理论应用于实际生活状况的学术，包括生物伦理学、政治伦理学等）、描述伦理学（搜集关于人们怎样生活的信息，从观察到的样式来作总结。
test: It studies what kind of moral standards people should follow, what kind of moral theories should be applied to real life, and what kind of moral information should be collected.

src: 它对于伦理的检视不是从预想的理论出发，而是调查实际道德主体（moral agent）所做出、并且被观察到的真实抉择，促成了这决择的所有道德因素，它研讨社会族群所持有的伦理观）。
test: It is not a moral evaluation from the presupposition of the theory, but a moral investigation of the actual moral agents (moral agents) made by the moral agents and observed, which promotes the moral choice of all moral factors. It studies the moral view of the social group held by the moral group.

src: 伦理学历史包括希腊罗马伦理学、中世纪基督教伦理学。
test: The history of ethics includes Greek and Roman ethics, medieval Christian ethics.

src: 第一部分：人文主义的伦理思想，以瓦拉与蒙田等人为代表。
test: The first part: The humanistic ethics of representatives such as Vara and Meng Tian.

src: 第二部分：宗教改革的伦理思想，以加尔文为代表。
test: The second part: The moral thought of the Reformation, represented by Calvin.

src: 第三部分：政治的伦理学，以马基雅维利等人为代表、近代伦理学（17-18世纪，英国经验主义伦理学，代表人物：休谟等，17-18世纪，欧陆理性主义伦理学，代表人物：斯宾诺莎等，18世纪，法国启蒙派伦理学，代表人物：伏尔泰等，18-19世纪，德国学院派伦理学，代表人物：康德与黑格尔等，18-19世纪，英国功利主义伦理学，代表人物：边沁与西基维克等，19世纪，英国进化论伦理学，代表人物：史宾塞与赫胥黎等，19世纪后期，德国新康德主义伦理学，代表人物：李凯儿等，19世纪后期，新黑格尔主义伦理学，代表人物：托马斯·希尔·格林等）、过渡时期伦理学（非理性主义伦理学，代表人物：克尔凯郭儿、叔本华与尼采等）。
test: The third part: political ethics, represented by Machiavelli, etc., modern ethics (17-18th century, British empiricism ethics, represented by Hume, etc., 17-18th century, rationalism ethics, represented by Spinoza, etc., 18th century, French Enlightenment ethics, represented by Voltaire, etc., 18-19th century, German Academy ethics, represented by Kant and Hegel, etc., 18-19th century, British utilitarianism ethics, represented by Bentham and Sidgwick, etc., 19th century, German evolutionary ethics,

src: 逻辑学是研究“有效推论和证明的原则与标准”的一门学科。
test: Logic is the study of the principles and standards of valid inference and proof.

src: 逻辑通常包括三个部份：归纳推理、溯因推理和演绎推理，可分为形式逻辑和非形式逻辑。
test: Logic usually includes three parts: induction, deduction and abduction, which can be divided into formal logic and non-formal logic.

src: 美学是以对美的本质及其意义的研究为主题的学科。
test: Aesthetics is the study of the nature of beauty and its significance.

test: I don't want to go downstairs to buy things, so I will spend so much money to order takeout

src: 丁子霖：致友人。
test: Ding Zilin: To my friends.

src: 本人在此衷心感谢各位朋友在我们亲人遇难后的30多年漫长期间内所给予的人道救助，尤其是在我1994年初曾以个人名义向国内外友人发出过人道救助呼吁以来，迄今为止未曾中断的救助。
test: I sincerely thank all friends for their kindness and help to our family in the 30 years after the accident. Especially, I would like to thank all friends who have given help to me in 1994 when I made a personal appeal for help to friends in China and abroad.

src: 现如今绝大多数遇难者的老父母均已谢世，遗孤们也已长大成家就业。
test: Nowadays, most of the victims' parents have passed away, and their orphans have grown up and have their own families and jobs.

src: 是你们的义举帮助我们这些蒙难家庭度过了最为艰难的时刻。
test: Your generous donation has helped us, the poor families, to overcome the most difficult time.

src: 目前新冠疫情正在全球肆虐，大多数的捐款者也已年届退休。
test: The current COVID-19 pandemic is spreading rapidly around the world, and most donors are already retired.

src: 因此，我恳切地请求你们中止给我们难属——天安门母亲群体人道捐款，这项人道救助活动早就应该画上完美的句号了。
test: Therefore, I earnestly request you to stop giving us the humanitarian aid from the Tiananmen Mothers Group, which is a humanitarian aid activity that should have been completed long ago.

src: 我将永远铭记你们的爱心，并坚信你们的义举必将为历史铭记。
test: I will always remember your love and I believe your actions will be recorded in history.

src: 由于种种原因，我只能以此方式表达自己的意愿，请朋友们谅解！
test: Due to various reasons, I can only express my own wishes in this way, please forgive me!

src: 请接受我诚挚的祝福。
test: Please accept my sincere blessings.

src: 陶业按：请允许我借此机会，对全美学自联（IFCSS）和明尼苏达中国民主基金会（MCDF）从事人道主义救助32年的历史作一个简单介绍。
test: I would like to take this opportunity to introduce the IFCSS and MCDF to you.

src: 在从事人道主义救助的过程中，全美学自联与明尼苏达中国民主基金会是平行的两个组织，项目的执行者常有交叉。
test: In the process of humanitarian relief, the American Association for Self-Reliance and the Minnesota China Democracy Foundation are parallel organizations, and the project implementers are often cross-cut.

src: （苹果日报图：天安門母親網站由陶業負責打理。）pic.twitter.com/UxID9ZGjzm
test: (Apple Daily photo: The Mothers of Tiananmen Square website is managed by Dao Yi.) pic.twitter.com/UxID9ZGjzm

src: 救助款常常不能顺利送达六四难属手中。
test: The relief fund is often not smoothly delivered to the June 4th victims.

src: 1994年，经丁老师建议，由“天安门母亲”成立专门小组，统筹和负责人道救助款的接收与分发。
test: In 1994, after the suggestion of Mr. Ding, the special group was established to take charge of the reception and distribution of the relief funds.

src: 1998年，MCDF设立《六四孤儿教育基金》，执行11年后，于2009年，在所有六四孤儿都大学毕业后，MCDF继而设立《六四孤苦老人特困户救助基金》，并一直执行至今。
test: In 1998, MCDF established the “6/4 Orphan Education Fund”, which was implemented for 11 years. In 2009, all the 6/4 orphans graduated from university. MCDF then established the “6/4 Orphan Poverty-stricken Elderly Assistance Fund” and has been implementing it until now.

src: 这些项目的资金，主要来自六四当年的校园和社会捐款，来自个人的慷慨捐助，并受到兄弟大学民主基金会的支持。
test: The funding for these projects comes mainly from donations from the campus and society after the June 4th incident, from individual donations, and from the support of the Democracy Foundation of the Big Brother University.

src: 自2018年起，还得到了劳改研究基金会的支持。
test: Since 2018, I also received support from the Labor Reform Research Fund.

src: 直到去年，时隔31年后，六四难属们终于收到了一笔来自香港的当年以六四的名义募捐来的部分捐款。
test: Until last year, it took 31 years for the Tiananmen Mothers to receive a portion of the donations raised in Hong Kong in the name of the June 4th incident.

src: 在此期间，《中国人权》也在独立地执行它们的人道救助项目。
test: During this period, the China Human Rights also carried out its humanitarian assistance projects independently.

src: 我们理解，丁老师叫停六四捐助，是为捐款人考虑，我们也确实都是一些退休老人，收入并非如退休前充裕，特此对丁老师的“致友人”一信表示感谢。
test: We understand, Mr. Ding has stopped the donation to the June 4th Victims, it is for the consideration of the donor, we are also some retired old people, the income is not as rich as before retirement, so we express our gratitude to Mr. Ding's letter to the "Friends".

src: 我们会尊重难属们的决定，在两年内终止这一项目，并在需要时，立即恢复。
test: We will respect the decision of the people, and will terminate this project within two years, and will resume it when necessary.

src: 对于那些多年来一直坚持慷慨解囊，冒着风险递送人道救助款的那些侠肝义胆的同道们，一并表示感谢和敬意。
test: To those who have been donating for many years, and have been risking their lives to deliver humanitarian aid, I would like to express my gratitude and respect.

src: 如果是打算在这一行业入行倒是可以选择去找一个地方进行培训，但如果没这方面的想法的话，最好还是自学的好，毕竟培训要花的钱是非常多的，而且还要用6个月的时间去学习。
test: If you want to enter this industry, you can choose to go to a place to train, but if you don't have this idea, it's better to self-study, because the training cost is very expensive, and you have to spend 6 months to learn.

src: 但如果是打算在这一行业入坑的话培训确实是非常不错的选择，尤其是那些自制力及其弱的人，培训更是非常好的选择。
test: But if you want to enter this industry, training is a very good choice, especially for those who are weak in self-made and their own strength, training is a very good choice.

src: 要是自身自制力比较强的话也可以选择自学，只不过会比较累。
test: If you have a strong self-study ability, you can choose to self-study. But it will be more tired.

src: 当然选择一个好的培训机构是非常重要的事情。
test: Of course, choosing a good training institution is very important.

src: 首先要看这个机构的师资力量，如果师资力量不够强大的话，这个培训机构就没有什么意义了，当然一些新开的培训机构师资力量都不是特别强。
test: First of all, we should look at the strength of the teacher of this training institution, if the teacher's strength is not strong enough, this training institution has no meaning. Of course, some new training institutions have not been established for a long time and their teacher strength is not very strong.

src: 其次在选择之前打探一下这个培训机构，最好可以打探一下这个机构出来的学生，毕竟只有机构的学生才知道这个机构到底怎么样，讲解的课程是好或者不好。
test: Secondly, before choosing a training institution, it is best to investigate the students of this institution, because only the students of this institution know how good this institution is, and what kind of courses are taught.

src: 你好，其实你这个问题问的我也不知道怎么回答，因为对于你自身的情况并没有做一定的介绍，而学习这个东西和个人自身的情况有很大的关系的。
test: Hello, I don't know how to answer your question, because I don't know your situation.

src: 比如专业、年龄、想学习的语言，甚至在哪个城市，这些都会和你学习或者想要从事的行业有关系的。
test: Like what kind of professional, age, language you want to learn, even where you want to study, these will be related to your study or work.

src: 如果你是学生的话并且还没有毕业，或者是计算机专业的已经毕业的，那么如果时间充足我个人建议自学，这个是效率和成本最低的，现在很多的线下线上的培训机构其实也很不错，但是一学习成本高，二投入的时间比较多，基本需要集中培训3-6个月。
test: If you are a student and have not graduated yet, or you are a computer major who has graduated, then if you have time, I personally recommend self-study, this is the most efficient and cost-effective, now many offline and online training institutions are not bad, but the cost is high, and the investment of time is relatively large, basically need to concentrate training 3-6 months.

src: 但是如果是我说的这些情况的话，自学就很方便，现在网络上的很多学习资源都是免费的，或者去b站也有很多的培训资源，如果你不会找资源，你也可以通过简介联系到我，获取免费的资源，或者详细的咨询也行。
test: But if it is the situation I said, self-study is very convenient, there are many free learning resources on the Internet, or you can go to B station to find many training resources, if you don't find resources, you can also contact me through the introduction to get free resources, or detailed consultation.

src: 另外还有一些比较经典的书籍可以结合视频综合学习。
test: There are also some classic books that can be combined with videos to learn.

src: 如果你不是计算机专业的，但是也能够支付一定的学习金钱和时间成本，那么建议去培训机构学习，这样学习不用很费劲，老师讲解的也很详细，有问题也有人专门解答，另外在学习规划或者监督方面也有帮助。
test: If you are not a computer professional, but you can pay a certain amount of learning cost and time cost, then I suggest you go to the training institution to learn, this way of learning does not have to be very tired, the teacher's explanation is also detailed, there are questions and answers, and there is also help in learning planning and supervision.

src: 而且现在很多的培训机构都会签就业协议，有内推名额，学习之后推荐去公司，这样后面找工作的面试环节也能够省不少事情。
test: And now many training institutions will sign employment agreements, with internal recommendations, after studying, they will recommend you to go to the company, which can save a lot of trouble in the interview process later.

src: 以上就是我的一些看法，前面说的因为不了解你的情况，所以只大概介绍也并不详细，如果你有其他的想咨询的，可以随时联系我进行交流沟通。
test: The above is my own views, the introduction of the previous because I do not understand your situation, so only roughly introduce and not detailed, if you have other consultation, you can contact me at any time to communicate.

test: A good day begins with a good morning. I hope you bring happiness, luck, health and good luck to start a new day. Keep a good mood all day long. Good morning.

src: 小时候，幸福是一件东西，拥有就幸福； 长大后，幸福是一个目标，达到就幸福； 成熟后发现，幸福原来是一种心态，领悟就幸福。
test: When we were young, happiness was a thing, to have it was happiness; when we grew up, happiness was a goal, to achieve it was happiness; when we grew up, we found that happiness was a state of mind, to realize it was happiness.

src: 做最真实最善良的自己，依心而行，无憾今生；人生一条路，走自己的路；人生两件宝：身体好、心情好，漂漂亮亮活到老！
test: Do your best to be the most sincere and kindest version of yourself, follow your heart and live without regrets. Life is one road, walk your own road. The two most precious things in life are a healthy body and a happy heart, live beautifully and happily until you are old!

src: 人生的每个阶段，都会遇到不同的难题。
test: Every stage of life will encounter different problems.

src: 很多时候，束缚住你的并不是能力，而是积极面对的勇气。

test: If you can't avoid it, you might as well face it.

src: 你越害怕，越会被困难击倒；你若迎难而上，问题终会迎刃而解。
test: The more you fear, the more you will be trapped; if you face the difficulties, the problems will be solved.

src: 中沙策展人携手举办沙特首届当代艺术双年展-新华网
test: Saudi Arabia to host first contemporary art biennial - Xinhua

src: 新华社利雅得12月12日电（记者王海洲 胡冠）沙特阿拉伯首届当代艺术双年展 — — 迪里耶当代艺术双年展，于11日在位于沙特首都利雅得西北部的迪里耶JAX艺术区正式向公众开放，共有来自沙特、中国等地的64位艺术家参展。
test: Xinhua, December 12, 2012 (Reporter Wang Hai Zhou, Hu Guan) Saudi Arabia's first contemporary art biennial - Dhahran Contemporary Art Biennial, opened on December 11 in Dhahran, the capital of Saudi Arabia's northeast JAX Art District. A total of 64 artists from Saudi Arabia, China and other countries participated in the exhibition.

src: 本次双年展由沙特迪里耶双年展基金会和中国UCCA尤伦斯当代艺术中心联合策划，中国UCCA尤伦斯当代艺术中心馆长田霏宇担任艺术总监。
test: The 2018 UCCA Dune Art Foundation Triennial is co-organized by the UCCA Dune Art Foundation and UCCA Center for Contemporary Art, Beijing. UCCA Center for Contemporary Art, Beijing Director Ronghui Chen serves as Artistic Director.

src: 据策展团队介绍，本次双年展的主题为“摸着石头过河 ” ， 隐喻社会经济转型时期所采取的改革策略，也反映沙特社会文化发展的当下境遇。
test: According to the curatorial team, the theme of this year's exhibition is "Crossing the River by Feeling the Stones", which reflects the reform strategies adopted by the Saudi economy during the period of social transformation.

src: 本次双年展占地近12000平方米，展厅横跨六个相互连接的建筑，以六个单元呈现 ： 《 摸着石头过河 》 《 传承作为实验 》 《 边缘思考 》 《 走向公众 》 《 美丽新世界》以及《论艺术的精神 》 。
test: The 2012 Shanghai Biennale will be held in the Shanghai Exhibition Center, covering an area of 12,000 square meters, with six exhibition halls connected by six buildings. The six exhibition units are: "Touching the Stones to Cross the River", "Tradition as Experiment", "Edge Thinking", "Public Art", "Beautiful New World" and "On the Spirit of Art".

src: 其中，27位沙特艺术家的作品数量占本次展品总量的四成以上，囊括绘画、装置艺术和表演艺术等多种形式；12位中国艺术家的作品同样备受关注，有的艺术家以新颖的方式使用回收材料进行创作，例如徐冰在《背后的故事系列之溪山无尽图 》 （ 2014）中，用废弃物重构了一幅经典山水画。
test: Among the 27 Saudi artists, the number of works accounted for more than 40% of the total number of works, covering painting, installation art and performance art, etc. 12 Chinese artists also attracted attention, some artists used recycled materials to create new works, such as Xu Bing's "The Story Behind the Waterfall" (2014), which reconstructed a classic landscape painting using discarded materials.

src: 迪里耶双年展基金会首席执行官巴克利表示，希望本届双年展能够建立国际对话，让全球观众有机会了解沙特蓬勃发展的文化产业和创意社区，加强互动往来。
test: The executive director of the Dhahran-based King Abdulaziz Center for World Culture, Badr Al-Badr, said he hoped the 2019 edition of the Dhahran International Festival would establish an international dialogue and give the global audience a chance to learn about the cultural and creative industries in Saudi Arabia and the Kingdom’s vibrant creative community.

src: 田霏宇说 ： “ 双年展的目标是双重的，既能让沙特当代艺术参与全球对话，也能让沙特观众融入当代艺术世界 。 ”
test: Tian Yuan said: “The goal of the biennial is double, to let Saudi Arabia participate in the global dialogue, and to let Saudi audiences participate in the contemporary art world.”

src: 据了解，在双年展开幕周期间还将举办系列讲座，艺术家、策展人和创意行业的意见领袖将就跨文化交流、当代艺术发展等主题展开讨论。
test: According to the understanding, during the opening period of the two-year exhibition, a series of lectures will be held, artists, curators and opinion leaders in the creative industry will discuss topics such as cross-cultural communication, contemporary art development, etc.

src: 云南：统筹规范乡村公益性岗位管理-新华网
test: Yunnan: Coordinate and standardize the management of public welfare posts in rural areas - Xinhua Net

src: 新华社昆明12月12日电（记者林碧锋）为持续做好脱贫人口就业帮扶，巩固拓展脱贫攻坚成果，云南省日前出台促进乡村振兴乡村公益性岗位管理相关政策，助力全面推进乡村振兴。
test: Xinhua News Agency Kunming December 12, 2012 (reporter Lin Bifeng) to continue to do well in poverty alleviation and employment of the population, consolidate and expand the poverty alleviation and development achievements, Yunnan Province recently issued to promote rural revitalization and rural public welfare-related policy, to help the full implementation of rural revitalization.

src: 云南省人社厅有关负责人介绍，目前，云南共开发44.83万个乡村公益性岗位，用于安置脱贫劳动力等农村困难群体就业，在帮助脱贫群众实现就业增收、巩固脱贫攻坚成果、有效提升乡村各项公共服务能力等方面发挥重要作用。
test: The Department of Civil Affairs of Yunnan Province introduces the responsible person, at present, Yunnan has developed 44.83 million rural public welfare positions, which are used for the employment of poverty-stricken labor force and other rural difficult groups, and play an important role in helping poverty-stricken groups achieve employment income increase, consolidate poverty alleviation achievements, and effectively improve the public service capacity of rural areas.

src: 此次新规由云南人社、乡村振兴、财政等七部门联合印发，主要对基层招聘乡村公益性岗位人员的对象范围、资金管理、岗位开发、岗位管理等方面进行统一规范。
test: This new regulation was jointly issued by the departments of Rural Revitalization, Human Resources and Social Security, Finance, and others in Yunnan Province, mainly to standardize the scope of recruitment of rural public welfare positions, the management of funds, the development of positions, and the management of positions.

src: 在岗位开发设置方面，新规明确，按照“按需设岗、以岗定人、动态管理、总量控制 ” “ 谁开发、谁使用、谁负责”及“一人一岗、自愿公开、统一管理”的原则进行设置。
test: In terms of job development, the new regulations are clear, and according to the principles of "as needed, according to the person, dynamic management, and total control" "who develops, who uses, who is responsible" and "one person, one post, voluntary disclosure, unified management".

src: 招聘程序必须按照公告、申报、审核、公示、聘用、岗前培训及安排上岗等步骤进行。
test: The recruitment process must be carried out in accordance with the announcement, application, review, publication, hiring, pre-job training and placement.

src: 此外，新规还明确了乡村公益性岗位主要开发部门的具体职责、乡村公益性岗位的补贴标准和补贴方式，规定各乡村公益性岗位开发部门应为乡村公益性岗位安置人员购买意外伤害商业保险；要求有关部门定期对乡村公益性岗位补贴发放情况进行监督。
test: In addition, the new regulations also clearly stipulate the specific responsibilities of the main development units of rural public welfare posts, the standards and methods of subsidies for rural public welfare posts, and the subsidies for rural public welfare posts. The regulations require the relevant departments to regularly monitor the subsidy distribution of rural public welfare posts.
