src: 二、虽然右派在历史上有得志时代，但不长，所以短是因为给点儿阳光就灿烂，喝点儿开水就出汗；稍得志便得陇望蜀，遭打击便毛将焉附。
test: 2. Although the rightists have had some glorious days in history, they are not long-lived. This is because they are given a little sunshine and they shine brightly; they are given a little water and they sweat. When they are given a little glory, they are given a little hope. When they are given a little hope, they are given a little glory.

src: 但实事求是来说，右派在社会进步过程中起到过积极作用。
test: But in fact, the rightists played a positive role in the progress of socialism.

src: 从结束文革定义真理标准，发展经济提高科技以及促进行政制度化和人权保障等方面，右派的积极意义不该否定。
test: From the definition of the standard of truth after the end of the Cultural Revolution, the development of economy, the promotion of science and technology, and the promotion of political system and human rights, the positive significance of the right cannot be denied.

src: 三、就我而言，尽管不完全同意李伟东的有些说法，但我很在意他的说法，也很尊重李伟东这个人；因为他是认真的，他对中国是认真的，对中国的社会问题也是认真看待的。
test: 3. Although I do not completely agree with some of Li Weidong's views, I am very concerned about his views, and I also respect Li Weidong very much; because he is serious, he is serious about China, and he is serious about China's social problems.

src: 但我反对他的反共理论，我认为反必要革命，革命则必然导致社会动荡，民生受损，政治团体鱼龙混杂泥沙俱下，再就是外国趁虚而入。
test: I disagree with his anti-communist theory, I think anti-revolution is unnecessary, revolution is inevitable, and revolution will inevitably lead to social turmoil, people's livelihood will be damaged, and political parties will be mixed with mud and sand.

src: 四、改变或改善中国要有耐心和为国为民负责的态度，政治投机企图火中取栗者，那不是右派，是混蛋。
test: 4. To change or improve China, we need patience and a responsible attitude for the country and the people. Those who are trying to make a political profit out of the fire, are not rightists, they are scoundrels.

src: 再聊聊左。
test: Let's talk again.

src: 左，其实是一帮时代和政治的弃儿。
test: Left is actually a bunch of abandoned children of history and politics.

src: 如果说右具有对社会的积极意义，共产党还会在需要的时候听取一些右的言论和分析他们的思想，那么左就没这造化了，因为左所要的正是共产党所扔掉的糟粕！
test: If the right has a positive meaning for society, the Communist Party will listen to some of the right's words and analysis of their thoughts when they are needed, but the left has no such meaning, because the left wants what the Communist Party has thrown away!

src: 五、最近看到一些朋友边怼反贼边驳左癫，还挺动真气，我觉得大可不必。
test: 5、 Recently, I saw some friends criticizing the leftists and refuting the leftists, and they were very angry, I think it is not necessary.

src: 跟汉奸跟左癫都不要试图讲理，都是一根儿筋，无理可讲。
test: Don't try to argue with the traitors and the lunatics, they are all the same, a bunch of idiots.

src: 也不要试图证明咱们是正确的，更不要想着让反贼和左癫承认，何必呢？
test: Don't try to prove that we are right, and don't try to make the leftists and the lunatics admit that we are right.

src: 我这样告诉朋友们：当反贼骂你五毛，当左癫骂你右狗的时候，恰恰证明我们的这条中间道路是正确的！
test: I tell my friends: When the enemy curses you as a five-cent piece, and when the leftist curses you as a right-wing dog, it proves that our middle way is correct!

src: 许多人少年时候也有理想，老了之后，却忘了理想，或追求理想，却沦为偏执。
test: Many people have dreams when they are young, but when they grow old, they forget their dreams, or pursue their dreams, but become stubborn.

src: 和理想渐行渐远，甚至屠龙少年终成恶龙。
test: Even if you walk with your ideal, you will eventually become a dragon.

src: 左右我觉得一般是指约束和自由，中国从历史文化的先天基因导致中国整体应该是偏左。
test: I think the left and right in China is generally about constraints and freedom, China's overall genetic inheritance from history and culture should make China lean left.

src: 而国内右派自由，注重效率和发展，左派加强监管，更注重公平以及安全。
test: The right-wing in China is concerned with efficiency and development, while the left-wing is concerned with regulation and fairness.

src: 现在社会总体希望更注重公平，同时中美相争，偏左是肯定的，估计还得持续很多年。
test: Nowadays, the society in general is more concerned about fairness, while China and the US are in conflict, the left is definitely confirmed, and it will continue for a long time.

src: 虽然看不懂，点赞就完事儿啦
test: Although I don't understand, I still give you a thumbs up.

src: 啥也不说了，花花就是这么仗义
test: What's the use of saying anything? It's just like being fair.

src: 近两年，美帝对华为芯片的封锁和围堵，不仅让华为陷入前所未有的困境，也让“美系”企业遭遇巨大的损失。
test: In the past two years, the US embargo on China's semiconductors has not only put Huawei in an unprecedented predicament, but also caused huge losses to "US-based" companies.

src: 美帝打压中国芯片产业，要求自家企业及盟友国相关企业同时对我国芯片产业进行封锁，直接导致的后果就是全球芯片供应商的订单和利润受到影响，造成芯片生产企业的研发投入降低、产能下降，从而造成了全球范围内芯片供应链的短缺的紊乱。
test: The US is suppressing China's semiconductor industry, requiring its own companies and allied companies in related industries to simultaneously block China's semiconductor industry, which directly leads to the orders and profits of global semiconductor suppliers being affected, resulting in a reduction in research and development investment and a decrease in production capacity, which in turn leads to a shortage of semiconductor supply chains in the global range.

src: 如今“缺芯”已经波及到了全球各大行业，比如车企停产、手机涨价，几乎所有用到芯片的行业都深受其害。
test: Nowadays, the shortage of chips has already affected the global industry, such as car manufacturers suspending production, and mobile phone prices rising, almost all industries that use chips are affected.

src: 为了掌握“芯片”自主权，越来越多国家的科技巨头开始走向“去美化”的道路。
test: In order to grasp the "chip" self-sufficiency, more and more countries' science and technology giants are starting to walk the road of "de-Americanization".

src: 为了牢牢把控全球半导体控制权，牵制中国半导体行业的发展，最近老美动作频频，又是主持“芯片峰会”；又是邀请64国巨头成立半导体联盟，并拔款扶持美国本土科技巨头，比如，美帝老牌科技巨头英特尔为了夺回在芯片领域的主导地位，斥资200亿美元在美国亚利桑那州建2座晶圆加工厂，并对外开放芯片代工业务。
test: In order to tighten control over the global semiconductor industry, to suppress the development of China's semiconductor industry, the United States has been acting frequently recently, and has hosted the "Semiconductor Summit" again and again; it has also invited 64 major powers to establish a semiconductor alliance, and has provided subsidies to support the development of American domestic technology giants, such as Intel, the United States, the old technology giant, in order to regain the leading position in the semiconductor field, it has invested 200 billion US dollars in Arizona, USA, to build two wafer processing plants, and opened up semiconductor

src: 当大多数人都以为，英特尔此番举动将对台积电造成一定冲击，并很有可能抢走台积电的“饭碗”。
test: Most people think that Intel's move will have a certain impact on TSMC, and it is very likely to snatch TSMC's "bowl".

src: 之所以这么肯定，是因为，英特尔作为美帝老牌科技巨头，在半导体领域深耕几十年，拥有大量的人才队伍和技术储备，必定能在短期内迅速崛起，打败台积电。
test: The reason why I am so sure is because Intel, as the old giant of the United States, has been cultivating in the semiconductor field for decades, and has a large number of talent teams and technical reserves. It must be able to rise rapidly in the short term and defeat TSMC.

src: 然而，对于英特尔的这个决定，台积电创始人张忠谋却不屑一顾。
test: However, for Intel's decision, TSMC founder Zhang Zhongmou was not at all disdainful.

src: 在今年四月举行的“2021大师智库论坛”上，张忠谋语出惊人，对于英特尔斥资建晶圆厂这个举动，张忠谋毫无顾忌直言：英特尔建芯片代工厂，相当讽刺。
test: At the “2021 Master Forum” held in April this year, Zhang Zhongmou’s words were shocking. He said that Intel’s investment in the construction of the wafer factory was a joke. Zhang Zhongmou was not afraid to say: Intel’s investment in the construction of the wafer factory is a joke.

src: 张忠谋之所以对英特尔进军晶圆领域颇为不屑，是因为张忠谋对30多年前台积电与英特尔的一段恩怨依然耿耿于怀。
test: Zhang Zhongmou's reason for not being very pleased with Intel's entry into the DRAM field is because Zhang Zhongmou has a grudge against Intel for more than 30 years ago.

src: 上世纪六七十年代，英特尔一直是美帝制造业中的明珠，雄居全球巅峰的位置，是世界半导体领域的霸主。
test: In the 1960s and 1970s, Intel was the jewel of the US empire, and it was the world's leading semiconductor manufacturer.

src: 到上世纪80年代，世界半导体高端芯片一直被少数强者掌握。
test: In the 1980s, the world's high-end semiconductor chips were still in the hands of a few strong.

src: 当时半导体行业以IDM模式为特征，芯片从设计、制造到封测都是由一家工厂来完成，英特尔就是那个时代的代表。
test: At that time, the semiconductor industry was characterized by IDM mode, and the chip from design, manufacturing to packaging was completed by one factory, and Intel was the representative of that era.

src: 然而这样的模式让一些小企业不堪重负，很多半导体创业者面对巨额的产线建设费用只能望而却步。
test: However, this kind of model makes some small enterprises unbearable, and many semiconductor entrepreneurs face the huge construction costs of production lines and can only give up.

src: 在市场需求的感召下，进入80年代后，芯片行业开始出现分工合作的现象，1984年张忠谋听说有专门做芯片设计的公司，便认为既然有专门做设计的，那么就可以成立一家专门用于晶圆制造的工厂。
test: Inspired by market demand, after entering the 80s, the chip industry began to show the phenomenon of division of labor and cooperation, in 1984, Zhang Zhongmou heard that there was a special company to do chip design, so he thought that since there is a special company to do design, then it can be established a special factory to do the production of crystals.

src: 不久之后，张忠谋的设想变成了现实，台积电应运而生。
test: Soon after, Zhang Zhongmou's plan became a reality, and TSMC was born.

src: 台积电把主营业务瞄准了“晶圆加工”这个单一环节，不进行设计，只提供晶圆制造的代工服务。
test: TSMC has focused its main business on the "polishing" segment, without design, only providing polishing services for the production of polished crystals.

src: 当时刚创立的台积电，在英特尔这个巨无霸面前就是小喽啰。
test: At that time, just newly established TSMC, in front of Intel, the giant, is a little shit.

src: 为了获取资本支持，张忠谋就曾找英特尔投资，但当时英特尔一听说台积电只做芯片行业的制造环节，显然有些自视甚高，看不起台积电，果断拒绝对台积电进行投资。
test: In order to obtain capital support, Zhang Zhongmou had once sought investment from Intel, but when Intel heard that TSMC only made the manufacturing process of the chip industry, it was obviously a little self-righteous, and looked down on TSMC, and decisively refused to invest in TSMC.

src: 张忠谋也认定英特尔当时是看不起晶圆制程服务的。
test: Zhang Zhongmou also determined that Intel at that time did not take the quartz crystal service seriously.

src: 没想到当年看不起晶圆制造服务的巨头，如今却也要开始做晶圆代工。
test: I didn't expect that the company that used to look down on the crystal manufacturing service, now also has to start doing crystal processing.

src: 所以，张忠谋觉得英特尔进入晶圆代工很讽刺。
test: So, Zhang Zhongmou felt that Intel's entry into the wafer foundry was very ironic.

src: 如今台积电的市值已经超过了英特尔。
test: Intel's market value is now higher than that of TSMC.

src: 面对台积电的强势进攻，英特尔自然也是不敢固步自封。
test: Facing the strong offensive of TSMC, Intel naturally cannot stand still.

src: 如今，台积电已经向着3nm芯片冲刺，而英特尔仍然停留在7年前的14nm。
test: Now, TSMC is rushing to 3nm chips, while Intel is still stuck at 14nm.

test: It is not easy to catch up with others.

src: 【孤峰状】即人为加热，迅速冲榜热搜，引起大众关注；【锯齿状】即周期性加热，确保话题盘踞热搜榜单；【断崖状】即集体撤离，该热搜发挥完“功能”，接到新任务、冲向新战场。
test: 【孤峰状】即人为加热，迅速冲榜热搜，引起大众关注；【锯齿状】即周期性加热，确保话题盘踞热搜榜单；【断崖状】即集体撤离，该热搜发挥完“功能”，接到新任务、冲向新战场。

src: 图9中，一个事件的热度波峰恰好是另一事件的波谷，时间分秒不差，必定是统一批水军接到任务，开启新一轮攻势。
test: 9th picture, the heat peak of one event is exactly the trough of another event, time is second, must be unified to start a new round of offensive.

src: 黑公关的专业化可见一斑：几十个热搜同时上榜，哪些吸引目光、哪些负责科普、哪些引战造势、哪些转移视线、哪些影响认知、哪些误导判断、哪些煽动情感、哪些裹挟决策，黑产账号分批次、分节点精细化作战，几乎考虑到舆情传播扩散中的所有要素。
test: The professionalization of black public relations is obvious: dozens of hot searches at the same time, which attracts attention, which is responsible for publicity, which is used to stir up emotions, which is used to influence cognition, which is used to mislead judgment, which is used to trap decisions, black accounts are divided into batches, and nodes are fine-tuned. Almost all elements of the propaganda and diffusion of public opinion are considered.

src: 传播是一门科学，抛开立场、情感所有主观因素，仅从客观数据，黑公关也会无处遁形。
test: Publicity is a science, discarding all subjective factors, only from the objective data, black public relations will also be no place to hide.

src: 毛里求斯等国首次发现奥密克戎毒株感染病例-新华网
test: Mauritius and other countries first discovered omicron infection cases-Xinhua Net

src: 新华社北京12月12日电 综合新华社驻外记者报道：毛里求斯、塞浦路斯和马拉维近日首次报告发现新冠变异病毒奥密克戎毒株感染病例。
test: Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, December 12, 2021. Comprehensive report by Xinhua News Agency's foreign correspondent: Mauritius, Cyprus and Malawi have recently reported the first cases of the new coronavirus Omicron variant.

src: 毛里求斯10日首次报告该国两例奥密克戎毒株感染病例。
test: Mauritius reports its first two cases of the Omicron variant of COVID-19.

src: 据毛卫生部长凯莱什·贾古特帕尔介绍，一名感染者为自南非出发于11月27日抵达毛里求斯的游客；另一名感染者为毛里求斯本地居民，他与一名近期曾前往南非后返回的人员接触后，于11月30日核酸检测呈阳性。
test: According to the introduction of Mao Wencheng, the Minister of Health, a patient was infected from South Africa on November 27, 2021, and a local resident was infected in Mauritius.

src: 经医院隔离治疗后，这两名感染者核酸检测结果均转为阴性，目前已返回各自的居住地。
test: After being isolated and treated in the hospital, the two patients with infection turned to negative, and they returned to their residence.

src: 塞浦路斯卫生部10日宣布该国首次确诊3例奥密克戎毒株感染病例。
test: The Cyprus Ministry of Health announced on November 10 that the first three cases of omicron infection were confirmed in Cyprus.

src: 这3人都是学生，本月初从国外旅行回来，由于均为轻症，并未入院治疗。
test: This 3 people are students, they came back from abroad at the beginning of this month, because they are all light patients, they did not enter the hospital for treatment.

src: 为防范奥密克戎毒株蔓延，塞政府不断加大防控力度。
test: To prevent the spread of the Omicron variant, the government has been strengthening its control measures.

src: 从12月6日到明年1月10日，乘飞机入境的12岁以上旅客抵塞后都需自费在机场接受核酸检测。
test: From December 6th to January 10th, 12 years old and above passengers entering China by air must pay for nucleic acid testing at the airport.

src: 塞卫生部10日还宣布，将开始为该国5岁至11岁的儿童接种辉瑞新冠疫苗。
test: The Chinese health authority announced on 10th that it will start to vaccinate children aged 5 to 11 in China with Pfizer's new coronavirus vaccine.

src: 马拉维卫生部长昆比泽·奇蓬达9日说，该国首次发现3例奥密克戎毒株感染病例。
test: Malawi's Health Minister Khumbize Kandodo Chiponda said on 9th that the country has discovered the first three cases of omicron infection.

src: 该国卫生部门对从11月9日至12月2日采集的12个新冠阳性样本开展基因组测序，发现了这3例感染病例。
test: The health authorities of this country have conducted genome sequencing on 12 samples collected from November 9 to December 2, and found that 3 cases of infection were detected.

src: 新华社天津12月12日电（记者周润健）天文科普专家介绍，作为本年度最后一场大规模流星雨，北半球三大流星雨之一的双子座流星雨将在12月14日迎来极大，喜欢流星雨的朋友可在当日后半夜进行观测。
test: Xinhua, December 12, 2008 (Reporter Zhou Runnan) Astronomical experts introduced that as the last large-scale meteor shower of the year, the annual Geminid meteor shower, one of the three major meteor showers in the northern hemisphere, will be at its peak on December 14. Meteor enthusiasts can observe the meteor shower after midnight on that day.

src: 北京市天文爱好者安久2018年12月13日在青海拍摄的双子座流星雨。
test: 2018 December 13, Beijing, China, Chinese amateur astronomer Ankui captured the Geminid meteor shower in the sky of Qinghai.

src: 大部分流星雨的母天体都是周期彗星，但双子座流星雨的母天体却是3200号小行星法厄同，这是一颗阿波罗型小行星。
test: Most of the meteor showers are caused by periodic comets, but the parent body of the Geminid meteor shower is 3200 Phaethon, an Apollo asteroid.

src: 双子座流星雨也是目前已知第二个不是由彗星“孕育”的流星雨。
test: The Geminid meteor shower is the second known meteor shower that is not produced by a comet.

src: 天津市天文学会理事、天文科普专家修立鹏介绍说，就如贺岁大片一样，双子座流星雨一般在岁末出现 ， “ 上映档期”可以从12月4日持续到17日。
test: The Chinese Astronomical Society Vice President, astronomy popular expert Zhang Li introduced, just like the Spring Festival, the Geminid meteor shower is also expected to appear at the end of the year, "screening period" can be from December 4 to 17.

src: 该流星雨以流量大且稳定著称，与象限仪流星雨、英仙座流星雨一起被称为北半球三大流星雨。
test: The Perseids are famous for their high rate and stability, and are often referred to as one of the three major meteor showers of the northern hemisphere, along with the Geminids and the Quadrantids.

src: 双子座流星雨的一个显著特点是流星体速度较慢，色彩丰富，火流星也不少，既适合目视，也适合天文摄影的初学者进行拍摄。
test: One of the significant features of the Geminid meteor shower is that the meteoroids have a slow speed, colorful, and many fireballs, which are suitable for both observation and photography for beginners.

src: 天津市天文爱好者杨婧2020年12月13日在天津蓟州拍摄的双子座流星雨。
test: 2020-12-13, 天津市天文爱好者杨婧拍摄的双子座流星雨。

src: 天文预报显示，今年的双子座流星雨将于12月14日15时左右迎来极大，极大时ZHR（在理想观测条件下，辐射点位于头顶正上方时，每小时能看到的流星数量）为150。
test: The Chinese astronomical forecast shows that the Geminid meteor shower will reach its peak at 15:00 on December 14, with a ZHR (the number of meteors that can be seen per hour under ideal viewing conditions) of 150.

src: 双子座流星雨推荐指数图。
test: The recommendation index chart of the meteor shower of Gemini.

src: “去年 ， ‘ 落英缤纷’的双子座流星雨给人们留下了深刻印象，但今年的双子座流星雨会受到月光干扰，精彩程度会打一点折扣。
test: Last year, the ‘twins’ meteor shower left a deep impression on people, but this year’s ‘twins’ meteor shower will be affected by the moon, and the level of brilliance will be slightly reduced.

src: 14日为农历十一月十一，月相为盈凸月，明亮的月光会对观测造成干扰，好在后半夜月亮就会落下，此时双子座流星雨的辐射点也会升得比较高。
test: November 14th is the eleventh day of the eleventh month of the Chinese lunar calendar. The moon is in the waxing phase, and the bright moonlight will interfere with observation. Fortunately, the moon will set in the evening, and the radiant point of the Geminids will be higher.

src: 喜欢流星雨的朋友可在后半夜月落后的这几个小时进行观测，但要注意防寒保暖 。 ”
test: Friends who like meteor showers can observe them after the moon sets in the evening. However, they should pay attention to preventing cold and keeping warm.

src: 如何才能尽可能地观测到更多的流星呢？
test: How can I observe as many meteorites as possible?

src: “不建议在城市进行观测，可以在郊区或是乡村选择一个海拔高、光害小、面向东北方向的视野开阔之处，然后耐心地等到月亮落下后，目视观测即可。
test: “Do not conduct observation in the city, but in the suburbs or countryside, choose a high altitude, light pollution small, facing the northeast direction of the open view, then patiently wait until the moon falls, and then observe.”

src: 需要注意的是，双子座流星雨朝各个方向的流量都很大，观测时不用一直盯着双子座流星雨的辐射点看。
test: Note that the radiant of the Geminid meteor shower is in the constellation Gemini, and the meteors will appear to radiate from that point.

src: 喜欢摄影的朋友要想拍摄出绚丽的‘流星雨大片 ’ ， 最好选择广角、大光圈的镜头，拍摄时使用高ISO和最大光圈。
test: If you are a friend who likes photography, you want to shoot a beautiful “meteor shower” film, the best choice is a wide-angle lens with a large aperture. When shooting, use high ISO and maximum aperture.

src: 基于稳定性和持续性考虑，三脚架、备用电池和快门线也必不可少 。 ”
test: Considering stability and continuity, the tripod, spare battery and shutter cable are also indispensable.

src: 修立鹏提醒说。
test: 鹏提醒说。

src: 激光电视和传统电视在市场定位上有何差异？
test: What is the difference between laser TV and traditional TV in terms of market positioning?

src: 以我的理解，题主所说的传统电视应该指的就是液晶电视，而激光电视和液晶电视在市场定位上的差异，主要有以下两点：
test: As I understand, the traditional TV that the author mentioned should be liquid crystal TV, and the difference between the laser TV and the liquid crystal TV in the market positioning is mainly two points:

src: 第一，激光电视更聚焦大屏市场。
test: The first, laser TV will focus on the large screen market.

src: 相比液晶电视全面铺开的市场定位，激光电视显然更聚焦大屏市场，或者说激光电视本身就是为大屏而生的产物。
test: Compared with the liquid crystal TV market, laser TV is obviously more focused on the large screen market, or laser TV itself is a product born for the large screen market.

src: 目前，主流液晶电视尺寸多在55英寸到65英寸，而激光电视的尺寸一般在75英寸以上，最大的超过100英寸，充分满足用户对大屏彩电的需求。
test: At present, the mainstream liquid crystal TV size is mostly 55 to 65 inches, and the size of the laser TV is generally 75 inches and above, and the maximum is more than 100 inches, which fully meets the needs of users for large-screen color TV.

src: 近年来，激光电视在全球的出货量和销量占比都在不断增加，在80英寸及以上总体电视销量中占比超六成。
test: In recent years, laser TV has been increasing in global shipments and sales, accounting for more than 60% of the total sales of TVs over 80 inches.

src: 根据中怡康的预测，2020年，激光电视市场销量增长将超过140%，继续保持高速增长。
test: According to the forecast of China Huayi, the sales volume of laser TV in 2020 will exceed 140%, and the growth rate will continue to maintain high speed.

src: 之所以在大屏市场有如此好的成绩，主要归功于激光电视在护眼方面的出色表现。
test: The reason why the laser TV has such a good performance in the big screen market is mainly due to its excellent performance in protecting the eyes.

src: 基于激光电视漫反射的成像原理，激光光源发出的光线并不直射入眼球，相比液晶电视的背光源发光，成像过程更接近自然条件下物体的成像过程，对眼睛产生的刺激也更小。
test: The principle of image formation by laser television is based on the reflection of light by the human eye. Compared with the backlight source of liquid crystal television, the light source of laser television does not directly irradiate the eye, and the image formation process is closer to the natural conditions of the object, and the stimulation to the eye is also smaller.

src: 中国电子技术标准化研究院赛西实验室和北京协和医院眼科专家，通过人群相同条件下观看激光电视和液晶电视的严格对比试验，得出了144组测试数据。
test: The State Key Laboratory of Electro-Optical Engineering at Sias University and the Eye Hospital of Peking Union Medical College, Beijing, China, conducted a strict comparison test of LCD and LCD TV under the same viewing conditions by the same group of people. 144 sets of test data were obtained.

src: 数据证实：激光电视的确具有很强的护眼特性，在特定方面甚至具有一定的改善作用。
test: Data verification: Laser TVs do have very strong protective effects on the eyes, and in some respects even have a certain improvement effect.

src: 在视力健康越来越受重视的当下，激光电视不仅凭借护眼优势吸引了越来越多用户，也打开了彩电市场的另一个突破口。
test: With the increasing attention to eye health in the current, laser TV not only attracted more and more users by its protective eye advantages, but also opened a new breakthrough in the color TV market.

src: 第二，激光电视更聚焦高端市场。
test: The second, laser TV focuses on the high-end market.

src: 与液晶电视价格不断下探相反，目前市售激光电视的价格大多在万元以上，随着尺寸和光源的升级，价格逐步攀升。
test: The price of liquid crystal TV is constantly downward, and the price of laser TV is generally more than 10,000 yuan. With the improvement of size and light source, the price is gradually rising.

src: 激光电视凭什么卖这么贵呢？
test: Why is the laser TV so expensive?

src: 肯定是有道理的。
test: I agree with you.

src: 在光源和技术水平的不断发展下，激光电视有很多液晶电视和投影都无法实现的优势。
test: With the development of light source and technology, laser TV has many advantages that cannot be achieved by liquid crystal TV and projection.

src: 凭借超短焦距投影技术，激光电视的投影距离相对传统投影设备来说要更短，能够在短距离内实现100英寸大屏体验，所需空间不大，而且主机小巧，占用地方很小。
test: With the help of short-focus projection technology, laser TV's projection distance is relatively short compared to traditional projection equipment, and it can achieve 100-inch large screen experience within a short distance, the space required is not large, and the host is small, and the occupied area is small.

src: 在亮度方面，大品牌激光电视可以达到2000以上的流明。
test: In terms of brightness, the big brand laser TV can reach 2000 or more.

src: 加之发热量更低，对设备损耗小，电视的使用寿命也更长。
test: The heat generation is lower, which is more beneficial to the equipment. The service life of the TV is also longer.

src: 除此之外，很多高端激光电视机型还搭载了真4K超高清画质、人工智能系统、仿生屏等众多前沿技术，能够给用户带来更震撼的视听体验。
test: Except for this, many high-end laser TV models are also equipped with true 4K ultra-high-definition picture quality, artificial intelligence systems, and holographic screens, which can bring users more shocking visual and auditory experiences.

src: 谈不上伪需求，而是需求细分的产物，论画质和投入产出比，激光电视不是影音玩家的菜，想兼顾大屏和观看环境不足，可以尝试，凡事皆有利弊，权衡过后自己判断即可，就怕听信一面之词。
test: It is not about fake needs, but about the needs of products, discussing the quality of painting and investment and output ratio, laser TV is not the food of the video player, if you want to consider the big screen and the viewing environment is not enough, you can try, everything has advantages and disadvantages, weighing after the judgment can be.

src: 简单说，超广角近焦投影机--激光电视，为了贴近幕布，不得不使用价格昂贵的超广角透镜和反射镜，这不符合光学最佳设计。
test: Simply said, super wide angle close focus lens--laser TV, in order to get close to the screen, it is necessary to use expensive super wide angle lens and reflector, which is not in line with the best optical design.

src: 为了屏蔽部分环境光，使用微结构的菲涅尔幕布，代价高昂，80寸的价格基本能换个65寸液晶。
test: To filter some environmental light, use a micro-structured Fresnel screen, the cost is high, and the 80-inch price is basically equivalent to a 65-inch liquid crystal.

src: 还有一点，我特别讨厌投影厂商拿漫反射对眼睛好这种当卖点，拜托，眼睛能够看到的幕布上的光线对于眼睛而言就是直射光，你漫反射到天花板上，眼睛也看不到，非要较真液晶电视也是漫“直射”，打开电视天花板不也被照亮吗？
test: There is one more thing, I really hate projection factory to sell the mirrors that reflect the light to the eyes, please help, the light reflected to the eyes is the direct light, the light reflected to the ceiling is not visible to the eyes, even if the liquid crystal TV is also reflected, the light is also reflected, is not the TV ceiling also lit?

src: 而且，投影幕布如果不是漫反射，根本成不了像。
test: And if the screen is not a mirror, it will not become a picture.

src: 恰恰被忽略了高增益幕布的热斑（光斑）效应，某一角度大量光线反射到眼睛，那才是真难受。
test: The hot spot effect of the high-gain screen cloth is ignored, and the large amount of light reflected to the eyes at a certain angle is really unbearable.

src: 小雨伞买保险，靠谱吗?
test: Buy an umbrella, is it reliable?

src: 小雨伞是一个互联网的保险经纪平台。
test: 小雨伞是一个互联网的保险经纪平台。

src: 从设置条件来看：按照《保险经纪机构监管规定(2015年修订)》提示来看，成为保险经纪公司的，必须满足三个关键词：股东、发起人最近3年无重大违法记录、最低限额为人民币5000万元才可以成立、必须经过中国保监会同意。
test: From the conditions of setting: according to the "Insurance Brokerage Institution Supervision Regulations (2015 Revision)" to see, to become an insurance brokerage company, must meet three key words: shareholders, founders, no major violations in the past three years, the minimum amount of 5000 million yuan can be established, must be approved by the China Insurance Regulatory Commission.

src: 这三条其实就是很苛刻的，总结起来就是要有实力，要经过银保监会（监管全国内的保险公司、银行）的国家权威部门批准、股东要有良好的作风，作为保险经纪公司的小雨伞保险，投保者是不用过多质疑小雨伞保险是正规的与否，毕竟有这3条门槛，不是什么保险公司都能达到的。
test: These three are actually very strict, summarized it is to have strength, to go through the silver supervision (supervision of the country's national authority of the insurance company, banks) of the gold, shareholders have good behavior, as a small umbrella insurance, the insured is not too much to doubt the small umbrella insurance is legitimate, after all, there are these three barriers, not all insurance companies can achieve.

src: 在这一点上，还不错，是值得信赖的。
test: On this point, it is not bad, it is worth relying on.

src: 从保险产品来看：小雨伞保险就是一个保险超市，很多公司的明星重疾险都在这家平台上出售，如最新上架的和泰超级玛丽5号重疾险，理赔方和承保方都是和泰人寿，小雨伞保险只是第三方中介，不用质疑它的靠谱性。
test: From the perspective of insurance products: umbrella insurance is just an insurance supermarket, many companies' star disease insurance are sold on this platform, such as the latest launched and Tai super marvel 5 star disease insurance, the claiming method and the insurance company are both and Tai people's life, umbrella insurance is just a third party intermediary, there is no need to doubt its credibility.

src: 从缴费模式来看：互联网平台的产品，因为少了营业网点的经营费用，和业务员工资的成本，所以互联网产品普遍性价比比较高，而且缴费方式灵活，支持月缴，减轻投保人的缴费压力，同时可以最大限度的撬动保险的杠杆。
test: From the perspective of the payment model: Internet platforms' products, because there is no sales network's operation cost and the cost of the salesman, so the Internet products are generally more expensive, and the payment method is flexible, it supports monthly payment, it reduces the pressure of payment for the insurance buyer, and it can maximize the lever of the insurance company.

src: 这点还是非常不错的。
test: This is very good.

src: 可以考虑。
test: I can consider.

src: 从业务员专业度来看：这点尤为重要，因为保险是一个专业度要求非常强的行业，很多互联网产品客户可以自己投保，这种就会存在很多的误区，在健康告知和职业这块，非保险从业人员往往在投保的时候会添加自己的主观意识，觉得自己健康或者符合，这样容易存在很多理赔隐患，有可能被拒赔的风险。
test: From the perspective of professionalism: This is particularly important, because insurance is a very professional industry, and many Internet products customers can self-insure, which will lead to many misunderstandings, in terms of health and occupational diseases, non-insurance personnel often add their subjective ideas when they are insured, they think they are healthy or meet the requirements, which is easy to have many hidden risks of compensation, and there is a risk of being rejected.

src: 我自己曾在“腾讯微保”（和小雨伞一样，也是互联网保险经纪平台）做过保险电话销售，非常负责任的告诉大家。
test: I used to work in “Tencent Wealth” (and the same as the umbrella, it is an Internet insurance brokerage platform) to sell insurance by phone, very responsible to tell everyone.

src: 互联网的保险是真的，也靠谱，不靠谱的是人，互联网渠道没有专业的从业人员，也有很多的销售误导。
test: The insurance of the Internet is really true, also reliable, not reliable is people, the Internet channel has no professional sales personnel, there are also many sales misleading.

src: 比如：1元保险保600万，买保险送手机，免费领取6万重疾保额，这些营销策略没有错，可是却避重就轻，不会告诉投保人，首月1元，次月是需要按正常收费的，几十到200不等，很多客户扣费一两年自己买的是个啥不清楚。
test: 1. Like: 1 yuan insurance for 600,000 yuan, buy insurance and get a mobile phone, free to receive 600,000 yuan in critical illness, these marketing strategies are not wrong, but they are light and heavy, they will not tell the insured person, the first month is 1 yuan, the second month is the normal payment, which is 100 to 200, many customers do not know what they are paying for.

src: 以为可以花1块钱，保险公司赔600万（天下掉馅饼）。
test: I thought I could spend 1 yuan, but the insurance company paid 600,000 yuan (the whole world fell into the pie).

src: 免费送手机，是保单尾号比如6666，8888这种特殊保单号段才送的，并且如果中奖短信发出，自己不兑换，也没有人提醒的。
test: Free phone, it is a special number like 6666, 8888, which is sent to the end of the insurance. If the prize is sent, you don't need to exchange it yourself, and no one will remind you.

src: （这对于投保人来说，就又是一个坑）免费领6万重疾保额，是短期的，如果只靠这个，没有其他商业险，万一真发生重疾，6万能干嘛，解决不了问题，以后的生活开始裸奔。
test: (This is a pit for insurance buyers) Free 600,000 yuan for major diseases, it is short-term, if only relying on this, without other commercial insurance, if really major diseases, 600,000 can do what, solve the problem, later life naked.

src: 目前对于互联网保险销售的误导，国家也在严厉打击。
test: At present, the misleading of Internet insurance sales is strictly prohibited by the state.

src: 所以综合来看，平台是没有问题，产品也没有问题，有问题的是业务员的专业度和职业操守。
test: So, in general, the platform is not a problem, the product is not a problem, the problem is the professionalism and professionalism of the business staff.

src: 建议题主综合慎重考虑，其实很多线下保险经纪公司的产品更广，客户可以选择的机会和产品更多，有些产品的性价比也优于互联网产品。
test: Please consider carefully when you are making a decision. In fact, there are many more products in the offline insurance agency, and the opportunities and products for customers are also more, and the price performance ratio of some products is better than the Internet products.

src: 我自己就帮助过59位互联网客户，承保线下产品，保费每个人节约2000-3000元/年。
test: I have helped 59 internet customers, and I have insured their products. The insurance premium is saved by each person by 2000-3000 yuan per year.

src: 如果大家有什么疑问，欢迎与我沟通和交流。
test: If you have any questions, please feel free to communicate with me.

src: 我：明亚保险经纪人，有过3年企业管理培训经验，服务过近千家企业用户，合作超过100家保险公司，在投保前，我会从客户需求出发，为客户量身定制保险产品，投保中，为客户货比三家，尽力为客户争取最好的核保结果，投保后，为客户做保单整理，保单托管，让客户放心无忧。
test: I am a Chinese insurance agent, I have 3 years of management training experience, I have served more than 1,000 enterprise users, I have cooperated with more than 100 insurance companies, before purchasing insurance, I will start from the needs of customers, and customize insurance products for customers, during the purchase, I will strive for the best insurance results for customers, after the purchase, I will do the insurance contract, and the insurance contract management, so that customers can rest assured.

src: 跟每个客户一起终身成长。
test: Grow with every customer for a lifetime.

src: 希望我的回答能够对题主有所帮助！
test: I hope my answer can help the OP!

src: 根据保险监管部门的定义，互联网保险就是投保人点击投保链接后，可以自主完成所有的投保流程的保险业务。
test: According to the definition of the China Insurance Regulatory Commission, Internet insurance is an insurance business in which the insured person completes the entire insurance process by clicking on the insurance purchase link.

src: 在这个过程中，投保人不需要签字，保险顾问也不需要签字，所有步骤全部都可以由投保人自主完成。
test: In this process, the insured person does not need to sign, the insurance consultant does not need to sign, and all steps can be completed by the insured person independently.

src: 虽然互联网保险的投保没太有“仪式感”，甚至可能连打印版的纸质合同都没有，但是这丝毫不影响电子版合同的有效性与法律效力。
test: Although the insurance of the Internet is not very "ceremony", even without the printing version of the paper contract, but this does not affect the validity and legal effect of the electronic contract.

src: 这种模式，有点类似于“电话销售”一般的流水线作业，但如此购买保险也会有一个致命的问题，那就是——后续的服务可能会跟不上。
test: This kind of model is similar to the "telephone sales" in general, but if you buy insurance in this way, there will be a fatal problem, that is, the service may not keep up with it.

src: 保险通常是一份长达几十年的长期契约，我们在购买保险的时候，是不是应该认真思考一下，我们所选择的这个“中介”，是不是一个可以与我们长期相伴、在很多年后也会给我们提供服务的“保险中介人”呢？
test: Insurance is a long-term contract that lasts for several decades. When we buy insurance, we should seriously consider whether the "intermediary" we choose is a "long-term companion" who can provide us with services in the future.

test: Thank you for helping me

src: 从以前到现在，我都反对任何形式的污蔑和谩骂，更不能接受这类人身攻击的行为。
test: From the past to the present, I have always opposed any form of slander and abuse, and I cannot accept such personal attacks.

src: 在文明社会，我们可以包容一切，但就是要杜绝这种恶棍。
test: In a civilized society, we can tolerate everything, but we must eliminate this evil.

src: 如果不看政党和派系，要先抵制的，就是这种不文明的作风。
test: If you don't look at the political parties and factions, the first thing to resist is this kind of uncivilized behavior.

src: 从你开始发来脸书加好友请求开始，进而发表具调侃性的帖子，再到你试图把所谓我的家地点和父亲名字发布在社交媒体上，我都已经采取不回应的态度。
test: From the beginning of your sending friend requests on Facebook, and then posting posts with a humorous tone, to the point where you try to publish my so-called home address and father's name on social media, I have already taken a non-responsive attitude.

src: 你过后变本加厉地不只按一日六餐的频率持续tag我，更在脸书跟你的所谓朋友们继续肆无忌惮地讨论着关于我一些隐晦、羞辱的言论，样貌、身材、好生养、又什么床上种草莓、要不要插之类的留言，我...也算了。
test: You've been harassing me for a long time, not only by tagging me every day, but also by discussing about me with your so-called friends on Facebook, and even talking about my appearance, body, diet, and whether I'm a virgin or not. I'm sick of it.

src: 怎知后来我更收到多位朋友发来有关你的脸书朋友户口上载一张你的照片和具性骚扰成分的言论。
test: How did you know that I received more than one friend's Facebook account and uploaded a photo of you and the sexual harassment content of the message.

src: 抱歉，作为一位女生，我再也无法继续沉默了。
test: Sorry, as a girl, I can't keep silent anymore.

src: 我报警的新闻上载后，你完全没有收敛，反而更越发嚣张。
test: After I reported the news, you didn't calm down at all, but became more and more arrogant.

src: 我不理你是什么政治背景，也不管你是什么身份地位，在我们的社会，是需要两性尊重的。
test: I don't care what your political background is, or what your social status is, in our society, we need to respect both men and women.

src: 是的，你们可以继续这种具调侃性、隐晦、羞辱、辱骂的言论，你也可以继续说你只是关爱和关注我，你可以继续认为这并不是骚扰、你甚至可以继续否认那不是你制的图或者继续发表一切攻击性言论。
test: Yes, you can continue this kind of teasing, ambiguous, humiliating, insulting, and abusive language, you can continue to say that you only care and pay attention to me, you can continue to believe that this is not harassment, you can even continue to deny that it is not your drawing or continue to publish all the attacking language.

src: 没错，我不能，也没有能力阻止你们。
test: I can't stop you.

src: 我既不认识你，也不想认识你，我的样貌和身材更不需要你评头论足。
test: I don't know you, and I don't want to know you. My appearance and figure don't need you to praise them.

src: 我甚至不认为会有哪一位女生愿意让别人如此地羞辱自己来换来出名。
test: I don't think any girl would be willing to be humiliated by others to get fame.

src: 朋友问我，还好吗？
test: How are you?

src: 我说好，你也不会信。
test: I said so, you won't believe it.

src: 我觉得不会有任何一位女生被如此霸凌后还可以说自己还好。
test: I think no girl will be able to say that she is fine after being bullied like this.

src: 无论在工作、社会、政坛或商界，只有那些连基本品德都没有的人，才会选择用这种方式来伤害任何一位女性。
test: No matter in work, society, politics or business, only those who have no basic morality will choose to hurt any woman in this way.

src: 我相信，公道自在人心。
test: I believe that justice is in the heart of man.

src: 我截了部分留言给大家评理
test: I cut some comments for everyone to read

src: 你自己发的贴应该没有人可以冒充你了吧
test: You should not be able to impersonate yourself.

src: 我只能说你是文明的公敌
test: I can only say you are the enemy of civilization

src: 会心一笑
test: A smile can cheer up a person's heart.

src: 越南人民报网 - 越南政府总理范明正出席第三次越南国家数字技术企业发展论坛
test: Vietnamese Prime Minister Phạm Minh Chính attends the third Vietnam Digital Technology Enterprise Development Forum

src: 第三次越南国家数字技术企业发展论坛期间举行两场主要会议，讨论议题围绕着数字技术企业与国家数字化转型、数字技术企业与新冠肺炎疫情中和疫情后经济复苏与发展两大主题。
test: The third Vietnam Digital Technology Enterprise Development Forum was held in two sessions during the forum, discussing topics around digital technology enterprises and the digital transformation of the country, digital technology enterprises and the COVID-19 epidemic, and the post-epidemic economic recovery and development.

src: 通信传媒部部长阮孟雄表示，2021年，尽管新冠肺炎疫情持续蔓延，但越南数字技术企业的数量和营业收入仍保持增长势头，达近10 % 。
test: The Minister of Information and Communications Nguyen Manh Hung said that in 2021, although the COVID-19 epidemic continued to spread, the number of digital technology enterprises in Vietnam and their revenue continued to grow, reaching nearly 10%.

src: 2021年，越南典型数字产品数量耕作，集中解决越南面临的各大难题，许多数字产品已走出国门，越南数字技术排名已提升。
test: 2021年，越南典型数字产品数量耕作，集中解决越南面临的各大难题，许多数字产品已走出国门，越南数字技术排名已提升。

src: 阮孟雄部长呼吁数字技术企业负起发展国家数字化转型平台的责任，担当发展这些国家数字平台的任务就是担当国家使命。
test: The Minister of Industry and Information Technology, Mr. Miao Wei, called on digital technology enterprises to shoulder the responsibility of developing the country's digital transformation platform, and to take on the mission of developing these national digital platforms.

src: 在论坛上，各部门和国家机关领导，正在研究、发展、应用、转让数字技术的企业、组织和个人分享了动员和汇集全社会资源来发展越南技术企业，携手推动国家数字化转型，朱慧疫情后经济复苏等的各突破性设想和解决方案。
test: In the forum, the leaders of the departments and the national authorities are studying, developing, applying and transferring digital technologies to the enterprises, organizations and individuals to mobilize and gather the resources of the whole society to develop Vietnamese technology enterprises, and to work together to promote the digital transformation of the country, to overcome the challenges after the epidemic of the economy and to revive.

src: 范明正总理在论坛上发表讲话时强调，数字化转型是世界必由之路，是发展的客观需求。
test: The Prime Minister of China, Fan Mingzheng, emphasized in his speech at the forum that digital transformation is the inevitable path of the world, and the objective demand for development.

src: 数字化转型已成为全球性问题，数字化转型服务全民，因此需动员全民参与。
test: Digital transformation has become a global issue, digital transformation services are for all people, therefore we need to mobilize all people to participate.

src: 人民和企业是数字化转型的核心、主体、目标和动力。
test: The people and enterprises are the core, subject, target and driving force of digital transformation.

src: 因此，一切政策需为了人民和企业。
test: Therefore, all policies should be for the people and enterprises.

src: 范明正总理强调，数字化转型需体现民族精神，需以内力为主、战略、长期和决定性因素，外力为重要和突破口。
test: Premier Li Keqiang stressed that the digital transformation needs to reflect the national spirit, needs to be based on internal strength, with strategic, long-term and decisive factors, and external forces as important and breakthroughs.

src: 他同时认为，数字化转型需驱动向纵深发展和可持续发展，参与新冠肺炎疫情防控、经济复苏和发展、应对其后变化、克服自然资源枯竭现象，助力绿色转型、发展绿色能源。
test: He also believes that digital transformation needs to drive horizontal and deep development and sustainable development, participate in the prevention and control of the new crown pneumonia epidemic, economic recovery and development, and deal with changes after the epidemic, overcome the problem of resource depletion, and help green development and green energy development.

src: 数字化转型需参与保护和弘扬有关国家文化价值、历史传统、国家风土人情等的数据库建立工作，推动银行、税务、土地管理和开发数据库以及物流等领域数字化转型。
test: The digital transformation needs to involve the protection and promotion of the cultural values, traditions, and humanities of the country, as well as the establishment of databases for the protection of national cultural heritage, historical traditions, and national characteristics.

src: 数字化转型的最大目标是让人民更幸福，国家日益繁荣发展。
test: The goal of digital transformation is to make people happier, and the country is developing more and more prosperous.

src: 范明正总理要求各级政府、各级机关和企业在发展数字技术中需加大领导和指导力度，提高对数字化转型的认识，继续制定和完善关于数字化转型的体制，加强国家管理度和本着尊重、沟通、倾听、积极和主动的精神上推动对数字技术企业发展。
test: Premier Li Keqiang stressed that all levels of government, all levels of departments and enterprises should increase their leadership and guidance in developing digital technology, enhance their understanding of digital transformation, continue to formulate and improve the relevant systems, strengthen the management level of the country and promote the development of digital technology enterprises in a positive and proactive manner.

src: 论坛期间，范明正总理出席了2021年“越南制造”优秀数字产品奖颁奖仪式及“越南制造”数字产品展开幕式。
test: During the forum, Prime Minister Phạm Minh Chính attended the 2021 Vietnam Digital Products Excellence Awards and the Opening Ceremony of the Vietnam Digital Products Exhibition.

src: “智汇潇湘”2021中国国际轨道交通和装备制造产业人才峰会开幕 - 滚动新闻 - 湖南日报网 - 华声在线
test: “智汇潇湘”2021中国国际轨道交通和装备制造产业人才峰会开幕 - 滚动新闻 - 湖南日报网 - 华声在线

src: 湖南日报12月10日讯（全媒体记者 周帙恒）9日 ， “ 智汇潇湘”2021中国国际轨道交通和装备制造产业人才峰会在株洲开幕。
test: 12th December 2021, “China International Railway and Equipment Manufacturing Talent Summit” was held in Changsha, Hunan Province.

src: 省委常委、省委组织部部长王成出席启动仪式并讲话。
test: The Standing Committee of the Provincial Committee, the Provincial Committee Organization Department Director Wang Cheng attended the opening ceremony and made a speech.

src: 王成指出，举办人才峰会是贯彻落实中央人才工作会议和省第十二次党代会精神的重要举措，彰显了湖南重视人才、渴求人才、用好人才的真心诚意。
test: Wang Chengzhi pointed out that the talent summit is an important measure to implement the spirit of the Central Talent Work Conference and the 12th Provincial Party Congress, and it fully demonstrates Hunan's determination to use talents, pursue talents, and love talents.

src: 湖南有识才爱才敬才的优良传统、助力人才发展的广阔平台、实现美好生活的环境条件，近年来深入实施人才引领发展战略，以芙蓉人才行动计划为牵引，构建起引育留用全链条人才工作格局，成为了人才成长成就的沃土、创新创业的热土、宜居宜业的乐土。
test: The province of Hunan has a long history of excellent traditional culture, a broad platform for the development of talents, and a good environment for realizing a beautiful life. In recent years, the province has deeply implemented the strategy of talent leading development, and the Fuling Talent Action Plan has been used as a driving force to build a full-chain talent work system. It has become a fertile land for talent growth, a hotbed for innovation and entrepreneurship, and a pleasant land for living and working.

src: 当前，湖南正在全面落实“三高四新”战略定位和使命任务，将进一步广开引贤纳才之门，为人才创新创业出台更优政策、集中更多资源、创造更好条件，期待各界优秀人才共同为湖南高质量发展聚智汇力。
test: At present, Hunan is fully implementing the strategic positioning and mission of "three highs and four new" and is striving to open the door to talents and attract talents. It will further expand the policy of creating a better environment for innovation and entrepreneurship, concentrate more resources, and create better conditions. We look forward to the joint efforts of all sectors of society to create high-quality development in Hunan.

src: 活动现场设置了长沙、株洲、湘潭展馆和湖南自贸试验区展馆，省科技厅、省工信厅、省人社厅发布了先进制造相关产业科技创新重点需求清单、智能制造产业人才需求目录、博士后流动站智能制造产业青年人才需求目录。

src: 长江干流实现水上绿色综合服务区全覆盖-新华网
test: The Yangtze River Basin achieves full coverage of green integrated services area

src: 新华社武汉12月11日电（记者王贤）重庆市涪陵水上绿色综合服务区10日如期建成投入运营，这是继8日四川省泸州水上绿色综合服务区挂牌运营后，长江上游正式运营的第2个水上绿色综合服务区。
test: The Chongqing Municipal Government announced on December 11 that the Chongqing Waterfront Green Comprehensive Service Area in the Dazu District was officially put into operation on December 10. This is the second waterfront green comprehensive service area in the upper reaches of the Yangtze River after the Lushan Waterfront Green Comprehensive Service Area in the Eryuan District of Yunnan Province was officially put into operation on December 8.

src: 至此，水上绿色综合服务区已覆盖长江上、中、下游。
test: With this, the green water service area on the Yangtze River has covered the upper, middle and lower reaches.

src: 交通运输部长江航务管理局副局长邱健华介绍说，此前，湖北、湖南、江西、安徽、江苏等省份已在长江中游、下游建成运行10个水上绿色综合服务区，得到了广大船员的认可，为推进长江航运高质量发展发挥了重要作用。
test: The Vice Minister of the Ministry of Transport, Mr. Qiu Jianhua, introduced that in the past, Hubei, Hunan, Jiangxi, Anhui and Jiangsu provinces have built 10 green integrated service areas on the upper and lower reaches of the Yangtze River, which have been recognized by a large number of ship crews, and have played an important role in promoting the high-quality development of Yangtze River shipping.

src: 水上绿色综合服务区全覆盖是长江绿色航运建设的又一里程碑事件，长江船舶污染物接收、航运服务能力得到显著提升。
test: Water-based green integrated service area is another milestone event in the construction of green navigation of the Yangtze River, the Yangtze River ship pollutant reception, navigation service capacity has been significantly improved.

src: 据介绍，水上绿色综合服务区是为广大船舶、船员提供全方位生产、生活服务，帮助广大船员解决“急难愁盼”问题的重要设施。
test: According to introduction, the waterfront green comprehensive service area is for the broad ship, ship personnel to provide all-round production, life service, help broad ship personnel to solve "urgent, difficult, anxious, hope" problem.

src: 此次建成运行的长江上游两处水上绿色综合服务区，集生活服务、生产服务和政务服务为一体，以绿色环保为主题，以船舶维修与船舶应急救援服务为特色，实现港内船舶“一次靠泊、多项服务 ” ， 将使得常年航行在长江的船员工作更高效、生活更便捷。
test: This time, two water service areas on the upper reaches of the Yangtze River were successfully put into operation, which are integrated with living services, production services and government services, and the green environmental protection is the main theme. The ship repair and ship emergency rescue services are the highlights, which can realize the "one-stop docking and multiple services" of ships in the port, and make the work of ships sailing on the Yangtze River more efficient and convenient.

src: 美三航母集结中国周边 最强大武器罕见访问关岛 2022-01-17 多维 亲中共媒体多维报道：中美关系最新消息：最新卫星图像显示，美国三艘航母正在中国周边集结；美媒还披露，美国海军武器库中最强大的武器之一罕见访问关岛，对印太地区美国的盟友与敌手释放重要信号。

src: 据中国智库“南海战略态势感知平台”消息，1月9日，卫星在巴拉巴克海峡附近发现了美军“卡尔·文森”号（USS Carl Vinson）航母。
test: According to the China Strategic Situation Sensing Platform of the China Institute of International Strategic Studies, on January 9, a satellite detected the US aircraft carrier "Carl Vinson" in the Balabac Strait.

src: 巴拉巴克海峡连通南海和苏禄海，是西太平洋第一岛链上的战略要地。
test: The Strait of Malacca connects the South China Sea and the Sulu Sea, and is a strategic location in the first island chain of the West Pacific.

src: 该平台预计，“卡尔·文森”号将前往南海部署。
test: The carrier "Carl Vinson" is expected to be deployed to the South China Sea.

src: 这是“卡尔·文森”号航母首次搭载F-35C战斗机和CMV-22“鱼鹰”舰载运输机进行部署。
test: This is the first time that the “Carl Vinson” aircraft carrier has been equipped with F-35C fighter jets and CMV-22 “Osprey” ship-based transport aircraft for deployment.

src: 现在正在太平洋上游弋的美军航母，除了“卡尔·文森”号外，还有1月3日从美国出发的“亚伯拉罕·林肯”号（USS Abraham Lincoln）航母。
test: The U.S. aircraft carrier USS Carl Vinson is now sailing in the Pacific Ocean, except for the "Carl Vinson" carrier, which left the United States on January 3, the "Abraham Lincoln" carrier (USS Abraham Lincoln) is also sailing.

src: “林肯”号也首次搭载了F-35C舰载机中队，该中队隶属美国海军陆战队的第314战斗机攻击中队。
test: The USS Lincoln (CVN-72) also carried the F-35C carrier-based aircraft for the first time, the aircraft squadron is under the command of the 314th Fighter Attack Squadron of the United States Marine Corps.

src: 除了上述两艘航母外，目前美国海军部署在亚太地区的还有停靠在日本横须贺的“里根”号（USS Ronald Reagan）航母。
test: Besides the two aircraft carriers mentioned above, the US Navy also has the USS Ronald Reagan (CVN-76) aircraft carrier docked in Yokosuka, Japan.

src: 航母战斗群中还包括“尚普兰湖”号导弹巡洋舰、“斯托克达尔”号导弹驱逐舰等。
test: The carrier battle group also includes the "Shangdong Lake" missile destroyer, the "Stockdale" missile destroyer, etc.

src: 美三航母集结中国周边 最强大武器罕见访问关岛 2022年1月17日，“南海战略态势感知平台”公布最新卫星图片，显示美军三艘航母正在中国周边集结。
test: The US three aircraft carriers are gathering in the vicinity of China, and the most powerful weapon is rarely visited to the island of Guangdong.

src: （微博@南海战略态势感知） 美三航母集结中国周边 最强大武器罕见访问关岛 2022年1月17日，美军舰载运输机CMV-22B飞行路线。

src: 跟朋友聊起最近Meta大跌 26%，市值蒸发 2510 亿美元，扎克伯格回应「面临前所未有的竞争」，原因为何？
test: Meta stock plunges 26% after earnings, market cap evaporates $251 billion, Zuckerberg responds to "unprecedented competition"

src: Meta（原 Facebook）实质是一家广告公司，收入主要来自于广告，今时今日赚钱的广告公司，自己是有流量渠道的。
test: Meta（original Facebook） is a company that makes money from advertising, and its income mainly comes from advertising. Today, the company that makes money from advertising is the one with the most traffic.

src: Facebook，Instagram，Whatsapp 等等，无论什么样的功能定位，都是 Meta 的流量渠道。
test: Facebook，Instagram，Whatsapp 等等，无论什么样的功能定位，都是 Meta 的流量渠道。

src: 不仅如此，Meta 还是最大的”广告联盟”,很多 App 外接 Meta 的广告，通过 Meta 的广告平台是实现变现。
test: Not only that, Meta is also the largest "advertising alliance", many Apps are attached to Meta's advertising platform, through Meta's advertising platform to achieve the conversion.

src: 但是，时代变了。
test: But, the times have changed.

src: 第一，因为苹果隐私政策的调整，Meta 很难再拿到用户的数据信息，影响了广告投放的效率。
test: 1. Because of the adjustment of Apple's privacy policy, Meta is very difficult to get user data information, which affects the efficiency of advertising placement.

src: 苹果现在的隐私政策对用户很友好，会很明显的提示用户是否允许 App 获取自己的信息，大多数人的正常反应肯定是不允许。
test: Apple's privacy policy is very friendly to users now, and it will be very obvious to remind users whether to allow the app to obtain their information. Most people's normal reaction should be not to allow.

src: 接下来如果 Google 再捅一刀，对 Meta 的收入影响还会更大。
test: If Google were to stab another blow to Meta, the impact on Meta's revenue would be even greater.

src: 第二，以前 Meta 的收入增长里的中国因素也弱化了（这个因素的比重不确定有多高，但确实存在）。
test: The second, the growth of Meta's revenue in China has weakened (the proportion of this factor is not clear, but it is definitely there).

src: 大家平时都知道 Meta 在中国是没有业务的，但是这个理解并不准确。
test: Everyone knows that Meta is not doing business in China, but this understanding is not accurate.

src: 每年 Meta 至少10%的收入都来自中国，主要是中国做出海业务的公司贡献的。
test: At least 10% of our income comes from China, mainly from Chinese companies doing business overseas.

src: Meta 在香港的办公室大概几百人，在大陆还有几大代理商。
test: There are about a thousand people working in the office in Hong Kong, and there are several large agents on the mainland.

src: 中国公司想要拓展海外市场，Meta 都是绕不过的广告渠道，烧的钱大多都给了 Meta。
test: Chinese companies want to expand their overseas markets, Meta is an unavoidable advertising channel, and most of the money is spent on Meta.

src: 有意思的是，现在字节的 TT 是 Meta 主要的竞争对手之一，但是前两年 Meta 从字节身上可赚到不少钱。
test: It is interesting that, nowadays, TT is one of Meta's main competitors, but in the past two years, Meta has made a lot of money from TT.

src: 国内各个代理都在帮字节去 Meta 那里投广告，Meta 大中华区的业绩也很不错。
test: All the agents in China are helping ByteDance to advertise on Meta, and the performance of the Greater China region of Meta is also not bad.

src: 最近我没有专门去了解，但是肯定不会比之前好。
test: I haven't been specifically studying recently, but I'm sure it's better than before.

src: 中国公司在海外大规模烧钱的阶段已经过去了。
test: The stage of large-scale burning of money by Chinese companies overseas has passed.

src: 第三，新的流量渠道拓展不顺利。
test: The third, the new traffic channel expansion is not smooth.

src: Facebook 越来越老了，新的包括 TT 在内的平台，都不在 Meta 手中。
test: Facebook is getting older and older, and the new platform including TT is not in Meta's hands.

src: 最大的问题不仅仅是收入下滑，而是缺乏增长预期。
test: The biggest problem is not only the decline in income, but also the lack of growth expectations.

src: 资本市场不仅仅看中收入，更重要的是看未来的预期怎么样。
test: The capital market is not only looking at the current income, but also looking at the future expected.

src: 很显然，Meta 的预期是不够的。
test: It is obvious that Meta's expectations are not enough.

src: 为了给市场讲出新的故事，扎克伯格讲了 “元宇宙”.
test: To tell a new story to the market, Zuckerberg talked about “Metaverse”.

src: 元宇宙确实应该是未来的方向之一，但是元宇宙的实现周期比较长，这个故事在这两三年应该不足以支撑起 Meta 的市值。
test: The metaverse is definitely one of the directions of the future, but the implementation period of the metaverse is relatively long, and this story cannot support Meta's value in the next two to three years.

src: 所以未来这两年，应该是 Meta 比较艰难的时期。
test: So in the next two years, Meta should be a relatively difficult period.

src: 别看脸书现在非常的风光，每年也有1,000亿到2,000亿美元的收入，实际上脸书现在危机感非常强，跟其他的互联网企业和高科技公司相比，没有什么好的安全的护城河。
test: Don't look at the face of WeChat now, it is very beautiful, with annual revenue of 100 billion to 200 billion US dollars, in fact, WeChat now has a strong crisis, compared with other Internet companies and high-tech companies, there is no good security moat.

src: 虽然他的几款社交软件现在的日活比较高，也是主流的社交软件，比如Facebook，WhatsApp等等，但是面对tiktok的快速发展，脸书也没有什么信心，颠覆之间也就是眨眼的功夫。
test: Although his several social software are now more active than the day, they are also the mainstream social software, such as Facebook, WhatsApp, etc., but in the face of the rapid development of TikTok, Facebook also has no confidence, and the disruption is just a blink of an eye.

src: 而搞元宇宙这个可望而不可及的概念，短时间之内完全没有成功的希望，因此脸书非常的危险，这也是为什么扎克伯格又是换公司的名字，又是不停的寻找新的赛道的根本原因，但是我觉得他的赛道选择是错的，是一条不归路 以上是我的一些思考，供参考。
test: But the concept of the universe is a concept that is possible but not possible in the short term, so there is no hope of success in the near future, so Facebook is very dangerous, this is why Zuckerberg changed his company name again, and he is always looking for a new track, but I think his track selection is wrong, it is a track that does not return.

src: 第十七条 国家对注册消防工程师资格实行注册执业管理制度。
test: Article 17: The State implements a registration system for the qualification of fire engineering technicians.

src: 取得一级、二级注册消防工程师资格证书的人员，经注册方可以相应级别注册消防工程师名义执业。
test: Persons who have obtained the first-class and second-class registration certificates of fire engineering engineers can be registered by the registration authority to practice as fire engineering engineers of the corresponding level.

src: 第十八条 公安部消防局是一级注册消防工程师资格的注册审批部门。
test: Article 18: The Ministry of Public Security Fire Department is a first-level registration of fire engineering qualification registration review unit.

src: 省、自治区、直辖市公安机关消防机构为二级注册消防工程师资格的注册审批部门，并负责一级注册消防工程师资格注册的初步审查工作。
test: The provincial public security fire brigade, the autonomous region, the direct-controlled city public security fire brigade is the second-level registration of fire engineering qualification registration review department, and is responsible for the initial review of the first-level registration of fire engineering qualification registration.

src: 第十九条 取得一级、二级注册消防工程师资格证书并申请注册的人员，应当受聘于一个经批准的消防技术服务机构或者消防安全重点单位，并通过聘用单位向本单位所在地(聘用单位属企业的，通过本企业向工商注册所在地)的公安机关消防机构提交注册申请材料。
test: Article 19: Persons who have obtained the first-class and second-class registration certificates of fire engineering technicians and applied for registration shall be employed by a fire technology service organization or a fire safety key unit that has been approved by the competent authority.

src: 第二十条 省、自治区、直辖市公安机关消防机构在收到申请人的注册申请材料后，对申请材料不齐全或者不符合法定形式的，应当当场或者在5个工作日内，一次 性告知申请人需要补正的全部内容，逾期不告知的，自收到申请材料之日起即为受理。
test: Article 20: The public security and fire departments of the provinces, autonomous regions, and municipalities directly under the Central Government shall, within five working days of receiving the application materials from the applicant, notify the applicant of any deficiencies in the application materials or any deficiencies in the application materials that do not conform to the legal form, and shall notify the applicant of the deficiencies in the application materials within five working days of receiving the application materials. If the notification is not made within the prescribed time limit, the application materials shall be deemed to have been accepted.

src: 对受理或者不予受理的注册申请，均应当出具加盖本级公安机关消防机构专用印章和注明日期的书面凭证。
test: For the registration or non-registration of the application, the relevant public security fire brigade should be affixed with the seal of the public security fire brigade and the date of the letter.

src: 第二十一条 省、自治区、直辖市公安机关消防机构自受理注册申请之日起20个工作日内，按规定条件和程序完成一级注册消防工程师资格注册申请材料的初步审查工作和二级注册消防工程师资格的注册审批工作，并将一级注册消防工程师资格注册申请材料和初步审查意见报公安部消防局审批。
test: Article 21: Within 20 working days from the date of receipt of the application for registration of the first-level registered fire engineers, the provincial public security organs, the autonomous region, the direct-controlled city fire brigade, the fire brigade, the fire brigade, the fire brigade, the fire brigade, the fire brigade, the fire brigade, the fire brigade, the fire brigade, the fire brigade, the fire brigade, the fire brigade, the fire brigade, the fire brigade, the fire brigade, the fire brigade, the fire brigade, the fire brigade, the fire brigade, the fire brigade, the

src: 公安部消防局应当自收到省级公安机关消防机构报送的申请材料和初步审查意见之日起，20个工作日内作出是否批准的决定。
test: The fire department of the Ministry of Public Security should make a decision on whether to approve the application within 20 working days from the date of receipt of the application materials and the preliminary review opinions submitted by the provincial public security fire departments.

src: 在规定的期限内不能作出批准决定的，应当将延长的期限和理由告知申请人。
test: The decision on the application should be made within the prescribed time limit. If it is not possible to make a decision within the prescribed time limit, the extension of the time limit and the reason should be notified to the applicant.

src: 对作出不予批准决定的，应当书面说明理由，并告知申请人享有依法申请行政复议或者提起行政诉讼的权利。
test: If the decision is not approved, the reasons should be explained in writing and the applicant should be notified of the right to apply for administrative reconsideration or to bring an administrative suit.

src: 第二十二条 注册审批部门应当自作出批准决定之日起10个工作日内，颁发、送达相应级别的注册证。
test: Article 22: The registration approval department shall, within 10 working days from the date of approval, issue the registration certificate.

src: 第二十三条 注册证的每一注册有效期为3年。
test: Article 23. The registration certificate is valid for 3 years.

src: 注册证在有效期内是相应级别注册消防工程师的执业凭证，由注册消防工程师本人保管、使用。
test: The registration certificate is valid within the validity period of the corresponding level of registration of fire engineering technicians, and is the practicing certificate of fire engineering technicians.

src: 第二十四条 申请初始注册的，应当自取得一级、二级注册消防工程师资格证书之日起1年内提出申请。
test: Article 24: The applicant for initial registration shall apply for registration within one year from the date of obtaining the first-class and second-class registration qualification certificate.

src: 逾期申请初始注册时，须符合本规定继续教育要求。
test: When applying for initial registration, the applicant must meet the continuing education requirements.

src: 初始注册、延续注册、变更注册、注销注册和不予注册等注册管理的具体办法，由公安部另行规定。
test: The specific measures for registration management, including initial registration, renewal registration, change registration, cancellation registration and non-registration, are formulated by the public security department.

src: 第二十五条 继续教育是注册消防工程师延续注册、重新注册和逾期初始注册的必备条件。
test: Article 25 Continuing education is a necessary condition for the renewal of registration, re-registration and re-registration of registered fire engineers.

src: 在每个注册有效期内，各级别注册消防工程师应当按照规定完成相应的继续教育。
test: During the validity period of each level of registration, the fire engineering technicians at each level should complete the corresponding continuing education in accordance with the regulations.

src: 第二十六条 注册审批部门应当及时向社会公告注册消防工程师注册有关情况，建立注册消防工程师诚信档案，对其执业活动实行信用管理。
test: Article 26: The registration and approval department shall timely publicize the registration of fire engineering technicians, establish a credit record of fire engineering technicians, and implement credit management of their business activities.

src: 第二十七条 各级注册消防工程师资格的注册管理部门，应当严格执行《中华人民共和国行政许可法》有关规定。
test: Article 27 Each level of the registration management department of the fire engineering technician qualification shall strictly implement the relevant provisions of the Administrative Licensing Law of the People's Republic of China.

src: 中越两军“和平救援-2021”卫勤联合演习圆满结束-新华网
test: China-Vietnam Joint Military Drill “Peace and Friendship-2021” Concludes Successfully-Xinhua

src: 新华社河内12月12日电（周娜 滕怀金）12日上午，参加中越两军“和平救援-2021”卫勤联合演习的中方参演分队全部安全返回中国广西境内，标志着此次持续7天的演训任务顺利完成。
test: 12th December 2021, 10:00, Hanoi, Vietnam. The Chinese military medical team participating in the “Peace and Relief-2021” joint exercise between the Chinese and Vietnamese armies has successfully completed the 7-day exercise.

src: 此次联演，中越两军围绕人道主义医学救援这一重大课题，紧扣卫勤救死扶伤使命任务，按照实战化标准完成了联合卫勤指挥、联合现场救援、批量伤员处置等课目内容，有效提升了两军卫勤保障能力。
test: This time, the joint exercise between the Chinese and Vietnamese armies focused on humanitarian medical rescue, and the two armies closely followed the mission of rescue, relief, and treatment of the wounded. According to the standard of real combat, the joint command of rescue, the joint rescue on the spot, and the mass treatment of the wounded were completed, effectively improving the joint rescue capabilities of the two armies.

src: 演习成果得到中越两军的肯定。
test: The results of the joint exercises between the Chinese and Vietnamese armies have been recognized by both sides.

src: 越方演习指导委员会主任、越南人民军后勤总局副主任兼参谋长阮雄胜在演习结束仪式上说，通过此次演习，越南军医从中国军医身上学到了演习组织及专业活动方面的知识，也见识了中方的医疗、保障设备。
test: The Chairman of the Vietnamese People's Army Training and Guidance Committee, the Deputy Chief of the General Staff of the Vietnamese People's Army and the Chief of Staff of the Vietnamese People's Army, Nguyen Xuan Son, said at the closing ceremony of the exercise that through this exercise, Vietnamese military doctors have learned about the organization and professional activities of the exercise from Chinese military doctors, and have also become familiar with the medical and protection equipment of the Chinese military.

src: 演习取得的成果证明了两国军医力量在医疗援助、疫情防控方面的专业能力。
test: The results obtained through the drill demonstrated the professional capabilities of the two countries in medical assistance and epidemic prevention and control.

src: 中方指导协调组组长、中央军委后勤保障部卫生局副局长陈春明表示，此次演习是在2018年成功举办联合义诊活动的基础上又一次开拓创新实践，具有非常重要的里程碑意义。
test: The Chinese side is pleased to announce that the 2019 China-ASEAN Joint Military Medicine Exercise (CJMMEX-2019) will be held in Kunming, Yunnan Province, China from 25 November to 6 December 2019.

src: 演习期间，中国人民解放军向越南人民军捐赠了医用防护口罩、医用防护服、快速核酸检测仪器等卫生防疫物资。
test: During the training period, the Chinese People's Liberation Army donated medical protective masks, medical protective clothing, and rapid nucleic acid testing equipment to the Vietnamese People's Army.
